69 namespace MQTT_NS {
70 
71 namespace as = boost::asio;
72 namespace mi = boost::multi_index;
73 
74 template <typename Mutex = std::mutex, template<typename...> class LockGuard = std::lock_guard, std::size_t PacketIdBytes = 2>
75 class endpoint : public std::enable_shared_from_this<endpoint<Mutex, LockGuard, PacketIdBytes>> {
76  using this_type = endpoint<Mutex, LockGuard, PacketIdBytes>;
77  using this_type_sp = std::shared_ptr<this_type>;
78 
79 public:
80  using async_handler_t = std::function<void(boost::system::error_code const& ec)>;
81  using packet_id_t = typename packet_id_type<PacketIdBytes>::type;
82 
86  endpoint(protocol_version version = protocol_version::undetermined, bool async_send_store = false)
87  :async_send_store_{async_send_store},
88  version_(version)
89  {}
90 
95  template <typename Socket>
96  explicit endpoint(std::shared_ptr<Socket> socket, protocol_version version = protocol_version::undetermined, bool async_send_store = false)
97  :socket_(force_move(socket)),
98  connected_(true),
99  async_send_store_{async_send_store},
100  version_(version)
101  {}
102 
103  // MQTT Common handlers
104 
111  virtual bool on_pingreq() = 0;
112 
119  virtual bool on_pingresp() = 0;
120

161  virtual bool on_connect(MQTT_NS::buffer client_id,
162  MQTT_NS::optional<MQTT_NS::buffer> user_name,
163  MQTT_NS::optional<MQTT_NS::buffer> password,
164  MQTT_NS::optional<will> will,
165  bool clean_session,
166  std::uint16_t keep_alive) = 0;
167 
180  virtual bool on_connack(bool session_present, connect_return_code return_code) = 0;
181

200  qos qos_value,
201  bool retain,
202  MQTT_NS::optional<packet_id_t> packet_id,
203  MQTT_NS::buffer topic_name,
204  MQTT_NS::buffer contents) = 0;

257  std::vector<std::tuple<MQTT_NS::buffer, subscribe_options>> entries) = 0;

679 
685  MQTT_ALWAYS_INLINE virtual void on_mqtt_message_processed(MQTT_NS::any session_life_keeper)
686  {
687  if(async_read_on_message_processed_)
688  {
689  async_read_control_packet_type(force_move(session_life_keeper));
690  }
691  }
692 
693  endpoint(this_type const&) = delete;
694  endpoint(this_type&&) = delete;
695  endpoint& operator=(this_type const&) = delete;
696  endpoint& operator=(this_type&&) = delete;
697 
706  bool clean_session() const {
707  return clean_session_;
708  }
709 
718  bool clean_start() const {
719  return clean_session();
720  }
721 
729  void set_auto_pub_response(bool b = true, bool async = true) {
730  auto_pub_response_ = b;
731  auto_pub_response_async_ = async;
732  }
733 
734  void set_packet_bulk_read_limit(std::size_t size) {
735  packet_bulk_read_limit_ = size;
736  }
737 
738  void set_props_bulk_read_limit(std::size_t size) {
739  props_bulk_read_limit_ = size;
740  }
741 
747  void start_session(any session_life_keeper = any()) {
748  async_read_control_packet_type(force_move(session_life_keeper));
749  }
750 
751  // Blocking APIs
752 
775  packet_id_t publish(
776  std::string topic_name,
777  std::string contents,
778  qos qos_value = qos::at_most_once,
779  bool retain = false,
780  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
781  ) {
782  BOOST_ASSERT(qos_value == qos::at_most_once || qos_value == qos::at_least_once || qos_value == qos::exactly_once);
783  if(qos_value == qos::at_most_once) {
784  acquired_publish(
785  0,
786  force_move(topic_name),
787  force_move(contents),
788  qos::at_most_once,
789  retain,
790  force_move(props)
791  );
792  return 0;
793  }
794  else {
795  auto sp_topic = std::make_shared<std::string>(force_move(topic_name));
796  auto sp_contents = std::make_shared<std::string>(force_move(contents));
797 
798  as::const_buffer topic_buf = as::buffer(sp_topic->data(), sp_topic->size());
799  as::const_buffer contents_buf = as::buffer(sp_contents->data(), sp_contents->size());
800 
801  packet_id_t packet_id = acquire_unique_packet_id();
802  acquired_publish(packet_id, topic_buf, contents_buf, std::make_pair(force_move(sp_topic), force_move(sp_contents)), qos_value, retain, force_move(props));
803  return packet_id;
804  }
805  }
806 
829  packet_id_t publish(
830  as::const_buffer topic_name,
831  as::const_buffer contents,
832  any life_keeper,
833  qos qos_value = qos::at_most_once,
834  bool retain = false,
835  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
836  ) {
837  BOOST_ASSERT(qos_value == qos::at_most_once || qos_value == qos::at_least_once || qos_value == qos::exactly_once);
838  if(qos_value == qos::at_most_once) {
839  acquired_publish(0, topic_name, contents, any(), qos::at_most_once, retain, force_move(props));
840  return 0;
841  }
842  else {
843  packet_id_t packet_id = acquire_unique_packet_id();
844  acquired_publish(packet_id, topic_name, contents, force_move(life_keeper), qos_value, retain, force_move(props));
845  return packet_id;
846  }
847  }
848 
868  packet_id_t publish(
869  buffer topic_name,
870  buffer contents,
871  qos qos_value = qos::at_most_once,
872  bool retain = false,
873  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
874  ) {
875  BOOST_ASSERT(qos_value == qos::at_most_once || qos_value == qos::at_least_once || qos_value == qos::exactly_once);
876  packet_id_t packet_id = (qos_value == qos::at_most_once) ? 0 : acquire_unique_packet_id();
877  acquired_publish(packet_id, force_move(topic_name), force_move(contents), qos_value, retain, force_move(props));
878  return packet_id;
879  }
880 
898  packet_id_t subscribe(
899  string_view topic_name,
900  subscribe_options option,
901  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
902  ) {
903  packet_id_t packet_id = acquire_unique_packet_id();
904  acquired_subscribe(packet_id, topic_name, option, force_move(props));
905  return packet_id;
906  }
907 
925  packet_id_t subscribe(
926  as::const_buffer topic_name,
927  subscribe_options option,
928  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
929  ) {
930  packet_id_t packet_id = acquire_unique_packet_id();
931  acquired_subscribe(packet_id, topic_name, option, force_move(props));
932  return packet_id;
933  }
934 
952  packet_id_t subscribe(
953  buffer topic_name,
954  subscribe_options option,
955  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
956  ) {
957  packet_id_t packet_id = acquire_unique_packet_id();
958  acquired_subscribe(packet_id, force_move(topic_name), option, force_move(props));
959  return packet_id;
960  }
961 
976  packet_id_t subscribe(
977  std::vector<std::tuple<string_view, subscribe_options>> params,
978  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
979  ) {
980  packet_id_t packet_id = acquire_unique_packet_id();
981  std::vector<std::tuple<buffer, subscribe_options>> buf_params;
982  buf_params.reserve(params.size());
983  for(auto&& p : params)
984  {
985  buf_params.emplace_back(buffer(force_move(std::get<0>(p))), std::get<1>(p));
986  }
987  acquired_subscribe(packet_id, force_move(buf_params), force_move(props));
988  return packet_id;
989  }
990 
1005  packet_id_t subscribe(
1006  std::vector<std::tuple<as::const_buffer, subscribe_options>> params,
1007  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
1008  ) {
1009  packet_id_t packet_id = acquire_unique_packet_id();
1010  acquired_subscribe(packet_id, force_move(params), force_move(props));
1011  return packet_id;
1012  }
1013 
1028  packet_id_t subscribe(
1029  std::vector<std::tuple<buffer, subscribe_options>> params,
1030  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
1031  ) {
1032  packet_id_t packet_id = acquire_unique_packet_id();
1033  acquired_subscribe(packet_id, force_move(params), force_move(props));
1034  return packet_id;
1035  }
1036 
1050  packet_id_t unsubscribe(
1051  string_view topic_name,
1052  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
1053  ) {
1054  return unsubscribe(as::buffer(topic_name.data(), topic_name.size()), force_move(props));
1055  }

1070  packet_id_t unsubscribe(
1071  as::const_buffer topic_name,
1072  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
1073  ) {
1074  packet_id_t packet_id = acquire_unique_packet_id();
1075  acquired_unsubscribe(packet_id, topic_name, force_move(props));
1076  return packet_id;
1077  }
1078 
1092  packet_id_t unsubscribe(
1093  buffer topic_name,
1094  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
1095  ) {
1096  packet_id_t packet_id = acquire_unique_packet_id();
1097  acquired_unsubscribe(packet_id, force_move(topic_name), force_move(props));
1098  return packet_id;
1099  }
1100 
1113  packet_id_t unsubscribe(
1114  std::vector<string_view> params,
1115  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
1116  ) {
1117  std::vector<buffer> buf_params;
1118  buf_params.reserve(params.size());
1119  for(auto&& p : params)
1120  {
1121  buf_params.emplace_back(buffer(force_move(p)));
1122  }
1123  packet_id_t packet_id = acquire_unique_packet_id();
1124  acquired_unsubscribe(packet_id, force_move(buf_params), force_move(props));
1125  return packet_id;
1126  }
1127 
1140  packet_id_t unsubscribe(
1141  std::vector<as::const_buffer> params,
1142  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
1143  ) {
1144  packet_id_t packet_id = acquire_unique_packet_id();
1145  acquired_unsubscribe(packet_id, force_move(params), force_move(props));
1146  return packet_id;
1147  }
1148 
1161  packet_id_t unsubscribe(
1162  std::vector<buffer> params,
1163  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
1164  ) {
1165  packet_id_t packet_id = acquire_unique_packet_id();
1166  acquired_unsubscribe(packet_id, force_move(params), force_move(props));
1167  return packet_id;
1168  }
1169 
1185  void disconnect(
1186  v5::disconnect_reason_code reason = v5::disconnect_reason_code::normal_disconnection,
1187  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
1188  ) {
1189  if (connected_ && mqtt_connected_) {
1190  disconnect_requested_ = true;
1191  send_disconnect(reason, force_move(props));
1192  }
1193  }
1194 
1200  void force_disconnect() {
1201  connected_ = false;
1202  mqtt_connected_ = false;
1203  shutdown_from_client(*socket_);
1204  }
1205 
1206  // packet_id manual setting version
1207 
1229  bool publish(
1230  packet_id_t packet_id,
1231  std::string topic_name,
1232  std::string contents,
1233  qos qos_value = qos::at_most_once,
1234  bool retain = false,
1235  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
1236  ) {
1237  auto sp_topic = std::make_shared<std::string>(force_move(topic_name));
1238  auto sp_contents = std::make_shared<std::string>(force_move(contents));
1239 
1240  as::const_buffer topic_buf = as::buffer(sp_topic->data(), sp_topic->size());
1241  as::const_buffer contents_buf = as::buffer(sp_contents->data(), sp_contents->size());
1242 
1243  return publish(packet_id, topic_buf, contents_buf, std::make_pair(force_move(sp_topic), force_move(sp_contents)), qos_value, retain, force_move(props));
1244  }
1245 
1269  bool publish(
1270  packet_id_t packet_id,
1271  as::const_buffer topic_name,
1272  as::const_buffer contents,
1273  any life_keeper,
1274  qos qos_value = qos::at_most_once,
1275  bool retain = false,
1276  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
1277  ) {
1278  BOOST_ASSERT(qos_value == qos::at_most_once || qos_value == qos::at_least_once || qos_value == qos::exactly_once);
1279  if (register_packet_id(packet_id)) {
1280  acquired_publish(packet_id, topic_name, contents, force_move(life_keeper), qos_value, retain, force_move(props));
1281  return true;
1282  }
1283  return false;
1284  }
1285 
1309  bool publish(
1310  packet_id_t packet_id,
1311  buffer topic_name,
1312  buffer contents,
1313  any life_keeper,
1314  qos qos_value = qos::at_most_once,
1315  bool retain = false,
1316  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
1317  ) {
1318  BOOST_ASSERT(qos_value == qos::at_most_once || qos_value == qos::at_least_once || qos_value == qos::exactly_once);
1319  if (register_packet_id(packet_id)) {
1320  acquired_publish(packet_id, force_move(topic_name), force_move(contents), force_move(life_keeper), qos_value, retain, force_move(props));
1321  return true;
1322  }
1323  return false;
1324  }
1325 
1347  bool publish_dup(
1348  packet_id_t packet_id,
1349  std::string topic_name,
1350  std::string contents,
1351  qos qos_value = qos::at_most_once,
1352  bool retain = false,
1353  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
1354  ) {
1355  auto sp_topic = std::make_shared<std::string>(force_move(topic_name));
1356  auto sp_contents = std::make_shared<std::string>(force_move(contents));
1357 
1358  as::const_buffer topic_buf = as::buffer(sp_topic->data(), sp_topic->size());
1359  as::const_buffer contents_buf = as::buffer(sp_contents->data(), sp_contents->size());
1360 
1361  return publish_dup(packet_id, topic_buf, contents_buf, std::make_pair(force_move(sp_topic), force_move(sp_contents)), qos_value, retain, force_move(props));
1362  }
1363 
1387  bool publish_dup(
1388  packet_id_t packet_id,
1389  as::const_buffer topic_name,
1390  as::const_buffer contents,
1391  any life_keeper,
1392  qos qos_value = qos::at_most_once,
1393  bool retain = false,
1394  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
1395  ) {
1396  BOOST_ASSERT(qos_value == qos::at_most_once || qos_value == qos::at_least_once || qos_value == qos::exactly_once);
1397  if (register_packet_id(packet_id)) {
1398  acquired_publish_dup(packet_id, topic_name, contents, force_move(life_keeper), qos_value, retain, force_move(props));
1399  return true;
1400  }
1401  return false;
1402  }

1425  bool publish_dup(
1426  packet_id_t packet_id,
1427  buffer topic_name,
1428  buffer contents,
1429  qos qos_value = qos::at_most_once,
1430  bool retain = false,
1431  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
1432  ) {
1433  BOOST_ASSERT(qos_value == qos::at_most_once || qos_value == qos::at_least_once || qos_value == qos::exactly_once);
1434  if (register_packet_id(packet_id)) {
1435  acquired_publish_dup(packet_id, force_move(topic_name), force_move(contents), qos_value, retain, force_move(props));
1436  return true;
1437  }
1438  return false;
1439  }
1440 
1460  bool subscribe(
1461  packet_id_t packet_id,
1462  string_view topic_name,
1463  subscribe_options option,
1464  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
1465  ) {
1466  if (register_packet_id(packet_id)) {
1467  acquired_subscribe(packet_id, topic_name, option, force_move(props));
1468  return true;
1469  }
1470  return false;
1471  }
1472 
1492  bool subscribe(
1493  packet_id_t packet_id,
1494  as::const_buffer topic_name,
1495  subscribe_options option,
1496  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
1497  ) {
1498  if (register_packet_id(packet_id)) {
1499  acquired_subscribe(packet_id, topic_name, option, force_move(props));
1500  return true;
1501  }
1502  return false;
1503  }
1504 
1519  bool subscribe(
1520  packet_id_t packet_id,
1521  std::vector<std::tuple<string_view, subscribe_options>> params,
1522  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
1523  ) {
1524  if (register_packet_id(packet_id)) {
1525  std::vector<std::tuple<buffer, subscribe_options>> buf_params;
1526  buf_params.reserve(params.size());
1527  for(auto&& p : params)
1528  {
1529  buf_params.emplace_back(buffer(std::get<0>(p)), std::get<1>(p));
1530  }
1531  acquired_subscribe(packet_id, force_move(buf_params), force_move(props));
1532  return true;
1533  }
1534  return false;
1535  }
1536 
1551  bool subscribe(
1552  packet_id_t packet_id,
1553  std::vector<std::tuple<as::const_buffer, subscribe_options>> params,
1554  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
1555  ) {
1556  if (register_packet_id(packet_id)) {
1557  acquired_subscribe(packet_id, force_move(params), force_move(props));
1558  return true;
1559  }
1560  return false;
1561  }
1562 
1577  bool subscribe(
1578  packet_id_t packet_id,
1579  std::vector<std::tuple<buffer, subscribe_options>> params,
1580  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
1581  ) {
1582  if (register_packet_id(packet_id)) {
1583  acquired_subscribe(packet_id, force_move(params), force_move(props));
1584  return true;
1585  }
1586  return false;
1587  }
1588 
1604  bool unsubscribe(
1605  packet_id_t packet_id,
1606  string_view topic_name,
1607  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
1608  ) {
1609  if (register_packet_id(packet_id)) {
1610  acquired_unsubscribe(packet_id, topic_name, force_move(props));
1611  return true;
1612  }
1613  return false;
1614  }

1632  packet_id_t packet_id,
1633  as::const_buffer topic_name,
1634  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
1635  ) {
1636  if (register_packet_id(packet_id)) {
1637  acquired_unsubscribe(packet_id, topic_name, force_move(props));
1638  return true;
1639  }
1640  return false;
1641  }
1642 
1657  bool unsubscribe(
1658  packet_id_t packet_id,
1659  std::vector<string_view> params,
1660  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
1661  ) {
1662  if (register_packet_id(packet_id)) {
1663  std::vector<buffer> buf_params;
1664  buf_params.reserve(params.size());
1665  for(auto&& p : params)
1666  {
1667  buf_params.emplace_back(buffer(force_move(p)));
1668  }
1669  acquired_unsubscribe(packet_id, force_move(buf_params), force_move(props));
1670  return true;
1671  }
1672  return false;
1673  }

1689  bool unsubscribe(
1690  packet_id_t packet_id,
1691  std::vector<as::const_buffer> params,
1692  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
1693  ) {
1694  if (register_packet_id(packet_id)) {
1695  acquired_unsubscribe(packet_id, force_move(params), force_move(props));
1696  return true;
1697  }
1698  return false;
1699  }
1700 
1715  bool unsubscribe(
1716  packet_id_t packet_id,
1717  std::vector<buffer> params,
1718  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
1719  ) {
1720  if (register_packet_id(packet_id)) {
1721  acquired_unsubscribe(packet_id, force_move(params), force_move(props));
1722  return true;
1723  }
1724  return false;
1725  }
1726 
1727  // packet_id has already been acquired version
1728 
1750  void acquired_publish(
1751  packet_id_t packet_id,
1752  std::string topic_name,
1753  std::string contents,
1754  qos qos_value = qos::at_most_once,
1755  bool retain = false,
1756  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
1757  ) {
1758  if(qos_value == qos::at_most_once) {
1759  // In the at_most_once case, we know a priori that send_publish won't track the lifetime.
1760  acquired_publish(packet_id,
1761  as::buffer(topic_name),
1762  as::buffer(contents),
1763  any(),
1764  qos_value,
1765  retain,
1766  force_move(props));
1767  }
1768  else {
1769  auto sp_topic_name = std::make_shared<std::string>(force_move(topic_name));
1770  auto sp_contents = std::make_shared<std::string>(force_move(contents));
1771 
1772  auto topic_buf = as::buffer(*sp_topic_name);
1773  auto contents_buf = as::buffer(*sp_contents);
1774 
1775  acquired_publish(packet_id,
1776  topic_buf,
1777  contents_buf,
1778  std::make_pair(force_move(sp_topic_name), force_move(sp_contents)),
1779  qos_value,
1780  retain,
1781  force_move(props));
1782  }
1783  }
1784 
1808  void acquired_publish(
1809  packet_id_t packet_id,
1810  as::const_buffer topic_name,
1811  as::const_buffer contents,
1812  any life_keeper,
1813  qos qos_value = qos::at_most_once,
1814  bool retain = false,
1815  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
1816  ) {
1817  BOOST_ASSERT(qos_value == qos::at_most_once || qos_value == qos::at_least_once || qos_value == qos::exactly_once);
1818  BOOST_ASSERT((qos_value == qos::at_most_once && packet_id == 0) || (qos_value != qos::at_most_once && packet_id != 0));
1819 
1820  send_publish(
1821  buffer(string_view(get_pointer(topic_name), get_size(topic_name))),
1822  qos_value,
1823  retain,
1824  false,
1825  packet_id,
1826  force_move(props),
1827  buffer(string_view(get_pointer(contents), get_size(contents))),
1828  force_move(life_keeper)
1829  );
1830  }
1831 
1853  void acquired_publish(
1854  packet_id_t packet_id,
1855  buffer topic_name,
1856  buffer contents,
1857  qos qos_value = qos::at_most_once,
1858  bool retain = false,
1859  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
1860  ) {
1861  BOOST_ASSERT(qos_value == qos::at_most_once || qos_value == qos::at_least_once || qos_value == qos::exactly_once);
1862  BOOST_ASSERT((qos_value == qos::at_most_once && packet_id == 0) || (qos_value != qos::at_most_once && packet_id != 0));
1863 
1864  send_publish(
1865  force_move(topic_name),
1866  qos_value,
1867  retain,
1868  false,
1869  packet_id,
1870  force_move(props),
1871  force_move(contents),
1872  any()
1873  );
1874  }
1875 
1897  void acquired_publish_dup(
1898  packet_id_t packet_id,
1899  std::string topic_name,
1900  std::string contents,
1901  qos qos_value = qos::at_most_once,
1902  bool retain = false,
1903  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
1904  ) {
1905  if(qos_value == qos::at_most_once)
1906  {
1907  // In the at_most_once case, we know a priori that send_publish won't track the lifetime.
1908  acquired_publish_dup(packet_id,
1909  as::buffer(topic_name),
1910  as::buffer(contents),
1911  any(),
1912  qos::at_most_once,
1913  retain,
1914  force_move(props));
1915  }
1916  else
1917  {
1918  auto sp_topic_name = std::make_shared<std::string>(force_move(topic_name));
1919  auto sp_contents = std::make_shared<std::string>(force_move(contents));
1920 
1921  auto topic_buf = as::buffer(*sp_topic_name);
1922  auto contents_buf = as::buffer(*sp_contents);
1923 
1924  acquired_publish_dup(packet_id,
1925  topic_buf,
1926  contents_buf,
1927  std::make_pair(force_move(sp_topic_name), force_move(sp_contents)),
1928  qos_value,
1929  retain,
1930  force_move(props));
1931  }
1932  }
1933 
1957  void acquired_publish_dup(
1958  packet_id_t packet_id,
1959  as::const_buffer topic_name,
1960  as::const_buffer contents,
1961  any life_keeper,
1962  qos qos_value = qos::at_most_once,
1963  bool retain = false,
1964  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
1965  ) {
1966  BOOST_ASSERT(qos_value == qos::at_most_once || qos_value == qos::at_least_once || qos_value == qos::exactly_once);
1967  BOOST_ASSERT((qos_value == qos::at_most_once && packet_id == 0) || (qos_value != qos::at_most_once && packet_id != 0));
1968 
1969  send_publish(
1970  buffer(string_view(get_pointer(topic_name), get_size(topic_name))),
1971  qos_value,
1972  retain,
1973  true,
1974  packet_id,
1975  force_move(props),
1976  buffer(string_view(get_pointer(contents), get_size(contents))),
1977  force_move(life_keeper)
1978  );
1979  }
1980 
2002  void acquired_publish_dup(
2003  packet_id_t packet_id,
2004  buffer topic_name,
2005  buffer contents,
2006  qos qos_value = qos::at_most_once,
2007  bool retain = false,
2008  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
2009  ) {
2010  BOOST_ASSERT(qos_value == qos::at_most_once || qos_value == qos::at_least_once || qos_value == qos::exactly_once);
2011  BOOST_ASSERT((qos_value == qos::at_most_once && packet_id == 0) || (qos_value != qos::at_most_once && packet_id != 0));
2012 
2013  send_publish(
2014  force_move(topic_name),
2015  qos_value,
2016  retain,
2017  true,
2018  packet_id,
2019  force_move(props),
2020  force_move(contents),
2021  any()
2022  );
2023  }
2024 
2043  void acquired_subscribe(
2044  packet_id_t packet_id,
2045  string_view topic_name,
2046  subscribe_options option,
2047  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
2048  ) {
2049  std::vector<std::tuple<buffer, subscribe_options>> params;
2050  send_subscribe(force_move(params), packet_id, topic_name, option, force_move(props));
2051  }

2071  void acquired_subscribe(
2072  packet_id_t packet_id,
2073  as::const_buffer topic_name,
2074  subscribe_options option,
2075  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
2076  ) {
2077  std::vector<std::tuple<buffer, subscribe_options>> params;
2078  send_subscribe(force_move(params), packet_id, topic_name, option, force_move(props));
2079  }
2080 
2094  void acquired_subscribe(
2095  packet_id_t packet_id,
2096  std::vector<std::tuple<string_view, subscribe_options>> params,
2097  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
2098  ) {
2099  std::vector<std::tuple<buffer, subscribe_options>> cb_params;
2100  cb_params.reserve(params.size());
2101  for (auto const& e : params) {
2102  cb_params.emplace_back(as::buffer(std::get<0>(e).data(), std::get<0>(e).size()), std::get<1>(e));
2103  }
2104  send_subscribe(force_move(cb_params), packet_id, force_move(props));
2105  }

2122  std::vector<std::tuple<buffer, subscribe_options>> params,
2123  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
2124  ) {
2125  send_subscribe(force_move(params), packet_id, force_move(props));
2126  }

2146  ) {

2149

2151  }

2201  }

2281  void auth(
2282  v5::auth_reason_code reason_code = v5::auth_reason_code::success,

2287 
2318  void connect(
2319  std::string const& client_id,
2320  optional<std::string> const& user_name,
2321  optional<std::string> const& password,
2322  optional<will> w,
2323  std::uint16_t keep_alive_sec,
2324  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
2325  ) {
2326  connect_requested_ = true;
2327  send_connect(
2328  buffer(string_view(client_id)),
2329  [&] {
2330  if (user_name) {
2331  return buffer(string_view(user_name.value()));
2332  }
2333  else {
2334  return buffer();
2335  }
2336  } (),
2337  [&] {
2338  if (password) {
2339  return buffer(string_view(password.value()));
2340  }
2341  else {
2342  return buffer();
2343  }
2344  } (),
2345  force_move(w),
2346  keep_alive_sec,
2347  force_move(props)
2348  );
2349  }
2350 
2381  void connect(
2382  buffer client_id,
2383  optional<buffer> user_name,
2384  optional<buffer> password,
2385  optional<will> w,
2386  std::uint16_t keep_alive_sec,
2387  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
2388  ) {
2389  connect_requested_ = true;
2390  send_connect(
2391  force_move(client_id),
2392  force_move(user_name),
2393  force_move(password),
2394  force_move(w),
2395  keep_alive_sec,
2396  force_move(props)
2397  );
2398  }

2413  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
2414  ) {

2416  }

2501 
2514  template <typename... Args>
2515  MQTT_DEPRECATED(MQTT_DEPRECATED_MSG_SUBACK)
2516  void suback(
2517  packet_id_t packet_id,
2518  variant<suback_return_code, v5::suback_reason_code> arg0,
2519  Args&&... args) {
2520  variant<std::vector<suback_return_code>, std::vector<v5::suback_reason_code>> params;
2521  visit([](auto & vect){ vect.reserve(1 + sizeof...(args)); }, params);
2522  send_suback(force_move(params), packet_id, std::move(arg0), std::forward<Args>(args)...);
2523  }
2524 
2537  void suback(
2538  packet_id_t packet_id,
2539  variant<suback_return_code, v5::suback_reason_code> reason,
2540  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
2541  ) {
2542  variant<std::vector<suback_return_code>, std::vector<v5::suback_reason_code>> params;
2543  send_suback(force_move(params), packet_id, std::move(reason), std::move(props));
2544  }

2558  void suback(
2559  packet_id_t packet_id,
2560  variant<std::vector<suback_return_code>, std::vector<v5::suback_reason_code>> reasons,
2561  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
2562  ) {
2563  send_suback(force_move(reasons), packet_id, force_move(props));
2564  }

2588  template <typename... Args>
2589  MQTT_DEPRECATED(MQTT_DEPRECATED_MSG_UNSUBACK)
2590  void unsuback(
2591  packet_id_t packet_id,
2592  v5::unsuback_reason_code reason,
2593  Args&&... args) {
2594  send_unsuback(std::vector<v5::unsuback_reason_code>{}, packet_id, reason, std::forward<Args>(args)...);
2595  }

2637 
2655  packet_id_t async_publish(
2656  std::string topic_name,
2657  std::string contents,
2658  qos qos_value = qos::at_most_once,
2659  bool retain = false,
2660  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
2661  ) {
2662  BOOST_ASSERT(qos_value == qos::at_most_once || qos_value == qos::at_least_once || qos_value == qos::exactly_once);
2663  packet_id_t packet_id = (qos_value == qos::at_most_once) ? 0 : acquire_unique_packet_id();
2664  acquired_async_publish(packet_id, force_move(topic_name), force_move(contents), qos_value, retain, force_move(func));
2665  return packet_id;
2666  }
2667 
2689  packet_id_t async_publish(
2690  std::string topic_name,
2691  std::string contents,
2692  qos qos_value,
2693  bool retain,
2694  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
2695  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
2696  ) {
2697  BOOST_ASSERT(qos_value == qos::at_most_once || qos_value == qos::at_least_once || qos_value == qos::exactly_once);
2698  packet_id_t packet_id = (qos_value == qos::at_most_once) ? 0 : acquire_unique_packet_id();
2699  acquired_async_publish(packet_id, force_move(topic_name), force_move(contents), qos_value, retain, force_move(props), force_move(func));
2700  return packet_id;
2701  }
2702 
2722  packet_id_t async_publish(
2723  as::const_buffer topic_name,
2724  as::const_buffer contents,
2725  any life_keeper,
2726  qos qos_value = qos::at_most_once,
2727  bool retain = false,
2728  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
2729  ) {
2730  BOOST_ASSERT(qos_value == qos::at_most_once || qos_value == qos::at_least_once || qos_value == qos::exactly_once);
2731  packet_id_t packet_id = (qos_value == qos::at_most_once) ? 0 : acquire_unique_packet_id();
2732  acquired_async_publish(packet_id, topic_name, contents, force_move(life_keeper), qos_value, retain, force_move(func));
2733  return packet_id;
2734  }
2735 
2759  packet_id_t async_publish(
2760  as::const_buffer topic_name,
2761  as::const_buffer contents,
2762  any life_keeper,
2763  qos qos_value,
2764  bool retain,
2765  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
2766  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
2767  ) {
2768  BOOST_ASSERT(qos_value == qos::at_most_once || qos_value == qos::at_least_once || qos_value == qos::exactly_once);
2769  packet_id_t packet_id = (qos_value == qos::at_most_once) ? 0 : acquire_unique_packet_id();
2770  acquired_async_publish(packet_id, topic_name, contents, force_move(life_keeper), qos_value, retain, force_move(props), force_move(func));
2771  return packet_id;
2772  }
2773 
2791  packet_id_t async_publish(
2792  buffer topic_name,
2793  buffer contents,
2794  qos qos_value = qos::at_most_once,
2795  bool retain = false,
2796  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
2797  ) {
2798  BOOST_ASSERT(qos_value == qos::at_most_once || qos_value == qos::at_least_once || qos_value == qos::exactly_once);
2799  packet_id_t packet_id = (qos_value == qos::at_most_once) ? 0 : acquire_unique_packet_id();
2800  acquired_async_publish(packet_id, force_move(topic_name), force_move(contents), qos_value, retain, force_move(func));
2801  return packet_id;
2802  }

3421 
3430  void async_disconnect(
3431  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
3432  ) {
3433  if (connected_ && mqtt_connected_) {
3434  disconnect_requested_ = true;
3435  // The reason code and property vector are only used if we're using mqttv5.
3436  async_send_disconnect(v5::disconnect_reason_code::normal_disconnection,
3437  std::vector<v5::property_variant>{},
3438  force_move(func));
3439  }
3440  }
3441 
3458  void async_disconnect(
3459  v5::disconnect_reason_code reason,
3460  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
3461  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
3462  ) {
3463  if (connected_ && mqtt_connected_) {
3464  disconnect_requested_ = true;
3465  async_send_disconnect(reason, force_move(props), force_move(func));
3466  }
3467  }
3468 
3469  // packet_id manual setting version
3470 
3490  bool async_publish(
3491  packet_id_t packet_id,
3492  std::string topic_name,
3493  std::string contents,
3494  qos qos_value = qos::at_most_once,
3495  bool retain = false,
3496  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
3497  ) {
3498  BOOST_ASSERT(qos_value == qos::at_most_once || qos_value == qos::at_least_once || qos_value == qos::exactly_once);
3499  if (register_packet_id(packet_id)) {
3500  acquired_async_publish(packet_id, force_move(topic_name), force_move(contents), qos_value, retain, force_move(func));
3501  return true;
3502  }
3503  return false;
3504  }
3505 
3529  bool async_publish(
3530  packet_id_t packet_id,
3531  std::string topic_name,
3532  std::string contents,
3533  qos qos_value,
3534  bool retain,
3535  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
3536  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
3537  ) {
3538  BOOST_ASSERT(qos_value == qos::at_most_once || qos_value == qos::at_least_once || qos_value == qos::exactly_once);
3539  if (register_packet_id(packet_id)) {
3540  acquired_async_publish(packet_id, force_move(topic_name), force_move(contents), qos_value, retain, force_move(props), force_move(func));
3541  return true;
3542  }
3543  return false;
3544  }

3579  }

4088 
4110  bool async_subscribe(
4111  packet_id_t packet_id,
4112  buffer topic_name,
4113  subscribe_options option,
4114  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
4115  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
4116  ) {
4117  if (register_packet_id(packet_id)) {
4118  acquired_async_subscribe(packet_id, force_move(topic_name), option, force_move(props), force_move(func));
4119  return true;
4120  }
4121  return false;
4122  }
4123 
4138  bool async_subscribe(
4139  packet_id_t packet_id,
4140  std::vector<std::tuple<std::string, subscribe_options>> const& params,
4141  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
4142  ) {
4143  if (register_packet_id(packet_id)) {
4144  acquired_async_subscribe(packet_id, params, force_move(func));
4145  return true;
4146  }
4147  return false;
4148  }

4502  bool async_unsubscribe(
4503  packet_id_t packet_id,
4504  std::vector<buffer> params,
4505  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
4506  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
4507  ) {

4514 
4515  // packet_id has already been acquired version
4516 
4536  void acquired_async_publish(
4537  packet_id_t packet_id,
4538  std::string topic_name,
4539  std::string contents,
4540  qos qos_value = qos::at_most_once,
4541  bool retain = false,
4542  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
4543  ) {
4544  BOOST_ASSERT(qos_value == qos::at_most_once || qos_value == qos::at_least_once || qos_value == qos::exactly_once);
4545  BOOST_ASSERT((qos_value == qos::at_most_once && packet_id == 0) || (qos_value != qos::at_most_once && packet_id != 0));
4546 
4547  auto sp_topic_name = std::make_shared<std::string>(topic_name);
4548  auto sp_contents = std::make_shared<std::string>(contents);
4549  auto sv_topic_name = string_view(*sp_topic_name);
4550  auto sv_contents = string_view(*sp_contents);
4551 
4552  async_send_publish(
4553  buffer(sv_topic_name),
4554  qos_value,
4555  retain,
4556  false,
4557  packet_id,
4558  std::vector<v5::property_variant>{},
4559  buffer(sv_contents),
4560  force_move(func),
4561  std::make_pair(force_move(sp_topic_name), force_move(sp_contents))
4562  );
4563  }
4564 
4588  void acquired_async_publish(
4589  packet_id_t packet_id,
4590  std::string topic_name,
4591  std::string contents,
4592  qos qos_value,
4593  bool retain,
4594  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
4595  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
4596  ) {
4597  BOOST_ASSERT(qos_value == qos::at_most_once || qos_value == qos::at_least_once || qos_value == qos::exactly_once);
4598  BOOST_ASSERT((qos_value == qos::at_most_once && packet_id == 0) || (qos_value != qos::at_most_once && packet_id != 0));
4599 
4600  auto sp_topic_name = std::make_shared<std::string>(force_move(topic_name));
4601  auto sp_contents = std::make_shared<std::string>(force_move(contents));
4602  auto sv_topic_name = string_view(*sp_topic_name);
4603  auto sv_contents = string_view(*sp_contents);
4604 
4605  async_send_publish(
4606  buffer(sv_topic_name),
4607  qos_value,
4608  retain,
4609  false,
4610  packet_id,
4611  force_move(props),
4612  buffer(sv_contents),
4613  force_move(func),
4614  std::make_pair(force_move(sp_topic_name), force_move(sp_contents))
4615  );
4616  }
4617 
4639  void acquired_async_publish(
4640  packet_id_t packet_id,
4641  as::const_buffer topic_name,
4642  as::const_buffer contents,
4643  any life_keeper,
4644  qos qos_value = qos::at_most_once,
4645  bool retain = false,
4646  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
4647  ) {
4648  BOOST_ASSERT(qos_value == qos::at_most_once || qos_value == qos::at_least_once || qos_value == qos::exactly_once);
4649  BOOST_ASSERT((qos_value == qos::at_most_once && packet_id == 0) || (qos_value != qos::at_most_once && packet_id != 0));
4650 
4651  async_send_publish(
4652  buffer(string_view(get_pointer(topic_name), get_size(topic_name))),
4653  qos_value,
4654  retain,
4655  false,
4656  packet_id,
4657  std::vector<v5::property_variant>{},
4658  buffer(string_view(get_pointer(contents), get_size(contents))),
4659  force_move(func),
4660  force_move(life_keeper)
4661  );
4662  }
4663

4690  packet_id_t packet_id,
4691  as::const_buffer topic_name,
4692  as::const_buffer contents,
4693  any life_keeper,
4694  qos qos_value,
4695  bool retain,
4696  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
4697  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
4698  ) {
4699  BOOST_ASSERT(qos_value == qos::at_most_once || qos_value == qos::at_least_once || qos_value == qos::exactly_once);
4700  BOOST_ASSERT((qos_value == qos::at_most_once && packet_id == 0) || (qos_value != qos::at_most_once && packet_id != 0));
4701 
4702  async_send_publish(
4703  buffer(string_view(get_pointer(topic_name), get_size(topic_name))),
4704  qos_value,
4705  retain,
4706  false,
4707  packet_id,
4708  force_move(props),

5115  void acquired_async_subscribe(
5116  packet_id_t packet_id,
5117  std::string topic_name,
5118  subscribe_options option,
5119  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
5120  ) {
5121  auto sp_topic_name = std::make_shared<std::string>(force_move(topic_name));
5122  auto sv_topic_name = string_view(*sp_topic_name);
5123 
5124  async_send_subscribe(
5125  std::vector<std::tuple<buffer, subscribe_options>>({std::make_tuple(buffer(sv_topic_name), option)}),
5126  force_move(sp_topic_name),
5127  packet_id,
5128  force_move(func)
5129  );
5130  }

5161 
5162  async_send_subscribe(
5163  std::vector<std::tuple<buffer, subscribe_options>>({std::make_tuple(buffer(sv_topic_name), option)}),
5164  force_move(sp_topic_name),
5165  packet_id,
5166  force_move(props),
5167  force_move(func)
5168  );

5303  void acquired_async_subscribe(
5304  packet_id_t packet_id,
5305  buffer topic_name,
5306  subscribe_options option,
5307  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
5308  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
5309  ) {
5310 
5311  async_send_subscribe(
5312  std::vector<std::tuple<buffer, subscribe_options>>({
5313  std::make_tuple(
5314  force_move(topic_name),
5315  option
5316  )
5317  }),
5318  any(),
5319  packet_id,
5320  force_move(props),
5321  force_move(func)
5322  );
5323  }
5324 
5339  void acquired_async_subscribe(
5340  packet_id_t packet_id,
5341  std::vector<std::tuple<std::string, subscribe_options>> params,
5342  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
5343  ) {
5344 
5345  std::vector<std::tuple<buffer, subscribe_options>> cb_params;
5346  cb_params.reserve(params.size());
5347 
5348  std::vector<std::shared_ptr<std::string>> life_keepers;
5349  life_keepers.reserve(params.size());
5350 
5351  for (auto&& e : params) {
5352  auto sp_topic_name = std::make_shared<std::string>(force_move(std::get<0>(e)));
5353  cb_params.emplace_back(buffer(string_view(*sp_topic_name)), std::get<1>(e));
5354  life_keepers.emplace_back(force_move(sp_topic_name));
5355  }
5356  async_send_subscribe(
5357  force_move(cb_params),
5358  force_move(life_keepers),
5359  packet_id,
5360  force_move(func)
5361  );
5362  }
5363 
5382  void acquired_async_subscribe(
5383  packet_id_t packet_id,
5384  std::vector<std::tuple<std::string, subscribe_options>> params,
5385  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
5386  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
5387  ) {
5388 
5389  std::vector<std::tuple<buffer, subscribe_options>> cb_params;
5390  cb_params.reserve(params.size());
5391 
5392  std::vector<std::shared_ptr<std::string>> life_keepers;
5393  life_keepers.reserve(params.size());
5394 
5395  for (auto&& e : params) {
5396  auto sp_topic_name = std::make_shared<std::string>(force_move(std::get<0>(e)));
5397  cb_params.emplace_back(buffer(string_view(*sp_topic_name)), std::get<1>(e));
5398  life_keepers.emplace_back(force_move(sp_topic_name));
5399  }
5400  async_send_subscribe(
5401  force_move(cb_params),
5402  life_keepers,
5403  packet_id,
5404  force_move(props),
5405  force_move(func)
5406  );
5407  }
5408 
5420  void acquired_async_subscribe(
5421  packet_id_t packet_id,
5422  std::vector<std::tuple<as::const_buffer, subscribe_options>> params,
5423  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
5424  ) {
5425 
5426  std::vector<std::tuple<buffer, subscribe_options>> cb_params;
5427  cb_params.reserve(params.size());
5428 
5429  for (auto const& e : params) {
5430  cb_params.emplace_back(
5431  buffer(
5432  string_view(
5433  get_pointer(std::get<0>(e)),
5434  get_size(std::get<0>(e))
5435  )
5436  ),
5437  std::get<1>(e)
5438  );
5439  }
5440 
5441  async_send_subscribe(
5442  force_move(cb_params),
5443  any(),
5444  packet_id,
5445  force_move(func)
5446  );
5447  }

5479  )
5480  ),

5482  );
5483  }

5486  force_move(cb_params),

5664  void acquired_async_unsubscribe(
5665  packet_id_t packet_id,
5666  std::vector<std::string> params,
5667  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
5668  ) {
5669 
5670  std::vector<buffer> cb_params;
5671  cb_params.reserve(params.size());
5672 
5673  std::vector<std::shared_ptr<std::string>> life_keepers;
5674  life_keepers.reserve(params.size());
5675 
5676  for (auto&& e : params) {
5677  life_keepers.emplace_back(std::make_shared<std::string>(force_move(e)));
5678  cb_params.emplace_back(buffer(string_view(*life_keepers.back())));
5679  }
5680 
5681  async_send_unsubscribe(
5682  force_move(cb_params),
5683  force_move(life_keepers),
5684  packet_id,
5685  force_move(func)
5686  );
5687  }

5705  void acquired_async_unsubscribe(
5706  packet_id_t packet_id,
5707  std::vector<std::string> params,
5708  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
5709  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
5710  ) {

5714

5716  life_keepers.reserve(params.size());
5717 
5718  for (auto&& e : params) {
5719  life_keepers.emplace_back(std::make_shared<std::string>(force_move(e)));
5720  cb_params.emplace_back(buffer(string_view(*life_keepers.back())));
5721  }
5722 
5723  async_send_unsubscribe(
5724  force_move(cb_params),
5725  life_keepers,
5726  packet_id,
5727  force_move(props),
5728  force_move(func)
5729  );
5730  }

5755  buffer(
5756  string_view(
5757  get_pointer(e),
5758  get_size(e)
5759  )
5760  )
5761  );
5762  }

5764  async_send_unsubscribe(
5765  force_move(cb_params),
5766  any(),
5767  packet_id,
5768  force_move(func)
5769  );
5770  }

5925  void async_connect(
5926  buffer client_id,
5927  optional<buffer> user_name,
5928  optional<buffer> password,
5929  optional<will> w,
5930  std::uint16_t keep_alive_sec,
5931  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
5932  ) {

5934  force_move(client_id),
5935  force_move(user_name),
5936  force_move(password),
5937  force_move(w),
5938  keep_alive_sec,
5939  std::vector<v5::property_variant>{},
5940  force_move(func));
5941  }
5942 
5970  void async_connect(
5971  buffer client_id,
5972  optional<buffer> user_name,
5973  optional<buffer> password,
5974  optional<will> w,
5975  std::uint16_t keep_alive_sec,
5976  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
5977  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
5978  ) {
5979  connect_requested_ = true;
5980  async_send_connect(
5981  force_move(client_id),
5982  force_move(user_name),
5983  force_move(password),
5984  force_move(w),
5985  keep_alive_sec,
5986  force_move(props),
5987  force_move(func));
5988  }

6196  template <typename Arg0, typename... Args>
6197  MQTT_DEPRECATED(MQTT_DEPRECATED_MSG_ASYNC_SUBACK)
6198  void async_suback(
6199  packet_id_t packet_id,
6200  std::uint8_t reason,
6201  Arg0&& arg0,
6202  Args&&... args) {
6203  async_suback_imp(packet_id, reason, std::forward<Arg0>(arg0), std::forward<Args>(args)...);
6204  }

6416 
6417 
6422  void clear_stored_publish(packet_id_t packet_id) {
6423  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
6424  auto& idx = store_.template get<tag_packet_id>();
6425  auto r = idx.equal_range(packet_id);
6426  idx.erase(std::get<0>(r), std::get<1>(r));
6427  packet_id_.erase(packet_id);
6428  }
6429 
6434  void for_each_store(std::function<void(char const*, std::size_t)> const& f) {
6435  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
6436  auto const& idx = store_.template get<tag_seq>();
6437  for (auto const & e : idx) {
6438  auto const& m = e.message();
6439  auto cb = continuous_buffer(m);
6440  f(cb.data(), cb.size());
6441  }
6442  }
6443 
6448  void for_each_store(std::function<void(message_variant const&)> const& f) {
6449  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
6450  auto const& idx = store_.template get<tag_seq>();
6451  for (auto const & e : idx) {
6452  f(e.message());
6453  }
6454  }
6455 
6456  // manual packet_id management for advanced users
6457 
6466  packet_id_t acquire_unique_packet_id() {
6467  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
6468  if (packet_id_.size() == std::numeric_limits<packet_id_t>::max()) throw packet_id_exhausted_error();
6469  if (packet_id_master_ == std::numeric_limits<packet_id_t>::max()) {
6470  packet_id_master_ = 1U;
6471  }
6472  else {
6473  ++packet_id_master_;
6474  }
6475  auto ret = packet_id_.insert(packet_id_master_);
6476  if (ret.second) return packet_id_master_;
6477 
6478  auto last = packet_id_.end();
6479  auto e = last;
6480  --last;
6481 
6482  if (*last != std::numeric_limits<packet_id_t>::max()) {
6483  packet_id_master_ = static_cast<packet_id_t>(*last + 1U);
6484  packet_id_.insert(e, packet_id_master_);
6485  return packet_id_master_;
6486  }
6487 
6488  auto b = packet_id_.begin();
6489  auto prev = *b;
6490  if (prev != 1U) {
6491  packet_id_master_ = 1U;
6492  packet_id_.insert(b, packet_id_master_);
6493  return packet_id_master_;
6494  }
6495  ++b;
6496  while (*b - 1U == prev && b != e) {
6497  prev = *b;
6498  ++b;
6499  }
6500  packet_id_master_ = static_cast<packet_id_t>(prev + 1U);
6501  packet_id_.insert(b, packet_id_master_);
6502  return packet_id_master_;
6503  }
6504 
6512  bool register_packet_id(packet_id_t packet_id) {
6513  if (packet_id == 0) return false;
6514  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
6515  return packet_id_.insert(packet_id).second;
6516  }
6517 
6525  bool release_packet_id(packet_id_t packet_id) {
6526  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
6527  return packet_id_.erase(packet_id);
6528  }
6529 
6537  template <typename Iterator>
6538  typename std::enable_if<std::is_convertible<typename Iterator::value_type, char>::value>::type
6539  restore_serialized_message(packet_id_t /*packet_id*/, Iterator b, Iterator e) {
6540  static_assert(
6541  std::is_same<
6542  typename std::iterator_traits<Iterator>::iterator_category,
6543  std::random_access_iterator_tag
6544  >::value,
6545  "Iterators provided to restore_serialized_message() must be random access iterators."
6546  );
6547 
6548  if (b == e) return;
6549 
6550  auto fixed_header = static_cast<std::uint8_t>(*b);
6551  switch (get_control_packet_type(fixed_header)) {
6552  case control_packet_type::publish: {
6553  auto buf = allocate_buffer(b, e);
6554  restore_serialized_message(
6555  basic_publish_message<PacketIdBytes>(
6556  buf
6557  ),
6558  buf
6559  );
6560  } break;
6561  case control_packet_type::pubrel: {
6562  restore_serialized_message(
6563  basic_pubrel_message<PacketIdBytes>(
6564  // basic_pubrel_message have no member variable that type is buffer.
6565  // When creating basic_pubrel_message, the constructor just read buffer
6566  // and convert to some values.
6567  // So the argument buffer(...) doesn't need to hold the lifetime.
6568  buffer(string_view(&*b, static_cast<std::size_t>(std::distance(b, e))))
6569  )
6570  );
6571  } break;
6572  default:
6573  throw protocol_error();
6574  break;
6575  }
6576  }
6577 
6585  void restore_serialized_message(basic_publish_message<PacketIdBytes> msg, any life_keeper) {
6586  auto packet_id = msg.packet_id();
6587  qos qos_value = msg.get_qos();
6588  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
6589  if (packet_id_.insert(packet_id).second) {
6590  auto ret = store_.emplace(
6591  packet_id,
6592  ((qos_value == qos::at_least_once) ? control_packet_type::puback
6593  : control_packet_type::pubrec),
6594  force_move(msg),
6595  force_move(life_keeper)
6596  );
6597  // When client want to restore serialized messages,
6598  // endpoint might keep the message that has the same packet_id.
6599  // In this case, overwrite store_.
6600  if (!ret.second) {
6601  store_.modify(
6602  ret.first,
6603  [&] (auto& e) {
6604  e = store(
6605  packet_id,
6606  ((qos_value == qos::at_least_once) ? control_packet_type::puback
6607  : control_packet_type::pubrec),
6608  force_move(msg),
6609  force_move(life_keeper)
6610  );
6611  }
6612  );
6613  }
6614  }
6615  }
6616 
6622  void restore_serialized_message(basic_pubrel_message<PacketIdBytes> msg) {
6623  auto packet_id = msg.packet_id();
6624  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
6625  if (packet_id_.insert(packet_id).second) {
6626  auto ret = store_.emplace(
6627  packet_id,
6628  control_packet_type::pubcomp,
6629  force_move(msg)
6630  );
6631  // When client want to restore serialized messages,
6632  // endpoint might keep the message that has the same packet_id.
6633  // In this case, overwrite store_.
6634  if (!ret.second) {
6635  store_.modify(
6636  ret.first,
6637  [&] (auto& e) {
6638  e = store(
6639  packet_id,
6640  control_packet_type::pubcomp,
6641  force_move(msg)
6642  );
6643  }
6644  );
6645  }
6646  }
6647  }
6648 
6656  template <typename Iterator>
6657  typename std::enable_if<std::is_convertible<typename Iterator::value_type, char>::value>::type
6658  restore_v5_serialized_message(packet_id_t /*packet_id*/, Iterator b, Iterator e) {
6659  if (b == e) return;
6660 
6661  auto fixed_header = static_cast<std::uint8_t>(*b);
6662  switch (get_control_packet_type(fixed_header)) {
6663  case control_packet_type::publish: {
6664  auto buf = allocate_buffer(b, e);
6665  restore_v5_serialized_message(
6666  v5::basic_publish_message<PacketIdBytes>(buf),
6667  buf
6668  );
6669  } break;
6670  case control_packet_type::pubrel: {
6671  auto buf = allocate_buffer(b, e);
6672  restore_v5_serialized_message(
6673  v5::basic_pubrel_message<PacketIdBytes>(buf),
6674  buf
6675  );
6676  } break;
6677  default:
6678  throw protocol_error();
6679  break;
6680  }
6681  }
6682 
6690  void restore_v5_serialized_message(v5::basic_publish_message<PacketIdBytes> msg, any life_keeper) {
6691  auto packet_id = msg.packet_id();
6692  auto qos = msg.get_qos();
6693  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
6694  if (packet_id_.insert(packet_id).second) {
6695  auto ret = store_.emplace(
6696  packet_id,
6697  qos == qos::at_least_once ? control_packet_type::puback
6698  : control_packet_type::pubrec,
6699  force_move(msg),
6700  force_move(life_keeper)
6701  );
6702  // When client want to restore serialized messages,
6703  // endpoint might keep the message that has the same packet_id.
6704  // In this case, overwrite store_.
6705  if (!ret.second) {
6706  store_.modify(
6707  ret.first,
6708  [&] (auto& e) {
6709  e = store(
6710  packet_id,
6711  qos == qos::at_least_once ? control_packet_type::puback
6712  : control_packet_type::pubrec,
6713  force_move(msg),
6714  force_move(life_keeper)
6715  );
6716  }
6717  );
6718  }
6719  }
6720  }
6721 
6729  void restore_v5_serialized_message(v5::basic_pubrel_message<PacketIdBytes> msg, any life_keeper) {
6730  auto packet_id = msg.packet_id();
6731  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
6732  if (packet_id_.insert(packet_id).second) {
6733  auto ret = store_.emplace(
6734  packet_id,
6735  control_packet_type::pubcomp,
6736  force_move(msg),
6737  force_move(life_keeper)
6738  );
6739  // When client want to restore serialized messages,
6740  // endpoint might keep the message that has the same packet_id.
6741  // In this case, overwrite store_.
6742  if (!ret.second) {
6743  store_.modify(
6744  ret.first,
6745  [&] (auto& e) {
6746  e = store(
6747  packet_id,
6748  control_packet_type::pubcomp,
6749  force_move(msg)
6750  );
6751  }
6752  );
6753  }
6754  }
6755  }
6756 
6761  bool connected() const {
6762  return connected_ && mqtt_connected_;
6763  }
6764 
6770  void async_read_next_message(any session_life_keeper) {
6771  async_read_control_packet_type(force_move(session_life_keeper));
6772  }
6773 
6786  void set_max_queue_send_count(std::size_t count) {
6787  max_queue_send_count_ = count;
6788  }
6789 
6802  void set_max_queue_send_size(std::size_t size) {
6803  max_queue_send_size_ = size;
6804  }
6805 
6806  protocol_version get_protocol_version() const {
6807  return version_;
6808  }
6809 
6810  MQTT_NS::socket const& socket() const {
6811  return socket_.value();
6812  }
6813 
6814  MQTT_NS::socket& socket() {
6815  return socket_.value();
6816  }
6817 
6818 protected:
6819 
6824  optional<MQTT_NS::socket>& socket_optional() {
6825  return socket_;
6826  }
6827 
6828  void async_read_control_packet_type(any session_life_keeper) {
6829  socket_->async_read(
6830  as::buffer(buf_.data(), 1),
6831  [this, self = this->shared_from_this(), session_life_keeper = force_move(session_life_keeper)](
6832  boost::system::error_code const& ec,
6833  std::size_t bytes_transferred) mutable {
6834  if (!check_error_and_transferred_length(ec, bytes_transferred, 1)) return;
6835  handle_control_packet_type(force_move(session_life_keeper), force_move(self));
6836  }
6837  );
6838  }
6839 
6840  bool handle_close_or_error(boost::system::error_code const& ec) {
6841  if (!ec) return false;
6842  if (connected_) {
6843  connected_ = false;
6844  mqtt_connected_ = false;
6845  {
6846  boost::system::error_code ec;
6847  socket_->close(ec);
6848  }
6849  }
6850  if (ec == as::error::eof ||
6851  ec == as::error::connection_reset
6852 #if defined(MQTT_USE_WS)
6853  ||
6854  ec == boost::beast::websocket::error::closed
6855 #endif // defined(MQTT_USE_WS)
6856 #if defined(MQTT_USE_TLS)
6857  ||
6858 #if defined(SSL_R_SHORT_READ)
6859  ERR_GET_REASON(ec.value()) == SSL_R_SHORT_READ
6860 #else // defined(SSL_R_SHORT_READ)
6861  ERR_GET_REASON(ec.value()) == boost::asio::ssl::error::stream_truncated
6862 #endif // defined(SSL_R_SHORT_READ)
6863 #endif // defined(MQTT_USE_TLS)
6864  ) {
6865  if (disconnect_requested_) {
6866  disconnect_requested_ = false;
6867  connect_requested_ = false;
6868  on_close();
6869  return true;
6870  }
6871  }
6872  disconnect_requested_ = false;
6873  connect_requested_ = false;
6874  on_error(ec);
6875  return true;
6876  }
6877 
6878  void set_connect() {
6879  connected_ = true;
6880  }
6881 
6882  void set_protocol_version(std::size_t version) {
6883  version_ = version;
6884  }
6885 
6886 private:
6887 
6888  bool check_transferred_length(
6889  std::size_t bytes_transferred,
6890  std::size_t bytes_expected) {
6891  if (bytes_transferred != bytes_expected) {
6892  call_message_size_error_handlers();
6893  return false;
6894  }
6895  return true;
6896  }
6897 
6898  bool check_error_and_transferred_length(
6899  boost::system::error_code const& ec,
6900  std::size_t bytes_transferred,
6901  std::size_t bytes_expected) {
6902  if (handle_close_or_error(ec)) return false;
6903  if (!check_transferred_length(bytes_transferred, bytes_expected)) return false;
6904  return true;
6905  }
6906 
6907  void call_message_size_error_handlers() {
6908  on_error(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::message_size));
6909  }
6910 
6911  void call_protocol_error_handlers() {
6912  on_error(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::protocol_error));
6913  }
6914 
6915  template <typename T>
6916  void shutdown_from_client(T& socket) {
6917  boost::system::error_code ec;
6918  socket.lowest_layer().close(ec);
6919  }
6920 
6921  template <typename... Args>
6922  typename std::enable_if<
6923  std::is_convertible<
6924  typename std::tuple_element<sizeof...(Args) - 1, std::tuple<Args...>>::type,
6925  any
6926  >::value
6927  >::type
6928  acquired_async_subscribe_imp(
6929  packet_id_t packet_id,
6930  std::string topic_name,
6931  qos qos_value,
6932  Args&&... args) {
6933 
6934  std::vector<std::tuple<buffer, subscribe_options>> params;
6935  params.reserve((sizeof...(args) + 2) / 2);
6936 
6937  async_send_subscribe(
6938  force_move(params),
6939  any(),
6940  packet_id,
6941  force_move(topic_name),
6942  qos_value,
6943  std::forward<Args>(args)...
6944  );
6945  }
6946 
6947  template <typename... Args>
6948  typename std::enable_if<
6949  std::is_convertible<
6950  typename std::tuple_element<sizeof...(Args) - 1, std::tuple<Args...>>::type,
6951  any
6952  >::value
6953  >::type
6954  acquired_async_subscribe_imp(
6955  packet_id_t packet_id,
6956  as::const_buffer topic_name,
6957  qos qos_value,
6958  Args&&... args) {
6959 
6960  std::vector<std::tuple<buffer, subscribe_options>> params;
6961  params.reserve((sizeof...(args) + 2) / 2);
6962 
6963  async_send_subscribe(
6964  force_move(params),
6965  any(),
6966  packet_id,
6967  topic_name,
6968  qos_value,
6969  std::forward<Args>(args)...
6970  );
6971  }
6972 
6973  template <typename... Args>
6974  typename std::enable_if<
6975  !std::is_convertible<
6976  typename std::tuple_element<sizeof...(Args) - 1, std::tuple<Args...>>::type,
6977  any
6978  >::value
6979  >::type
6980  acquired_async_subscribe_imp(
6981  packet_id_t packet_id,
6982  std::string topic_name,
6983  qos qos_value,
6984  Args&&... args) {
6985 
6986  std::vector<std::tuple<buffer, subscribe_options>> params;
6987  params.reserve((sizeof...(args) + 2) / 2);
6988 
6989  async_send_subscribe(
6990  force_move(params),
6991  any(),
6992  packet_id,
6993  force_move(topic_name),
6994  qos_value,
6995  std::forward<Args>(args)...,
6996  any()
6997  );
6998  }
6999 
7000  template <typename... Args>
7001  typename std::enable_if<
7002  !std::is_convertible<
7003  typename std::tuple_element<sizeof...(Args) - 1, std::tuple<Args...>>::type,
7004  any
7005  >::value
7006  >::type
7007  acquired_async_subscribe_imp(
7008  packet_id_t packet_id,
7009  as::const_buffer topic_name,
7010  qos qos_value,
7011  Args&&... args) {
7012 
7013  std::vector<std::tuple<buffer, subscribe_options>> params;
7014  params.reserve((sizeof...(args) + 2) / 2);
7015 
7016  async_send_subscribe(
7017  force_move(params),
7018  any(),
7019  packet_id,
7020  topic_name,
7021  qos_value,
7022  std::forward<Args>(args)...,
7023  any()
7024  );
7025  }

7027  template <typename... Args>
7028  typename std::enable_if<
7029  std::is_convertible<
7030  typename std::tuple_element<sizeof...(Args) - 1, std::tuple<Args...>>::type,
7031  any
7032  >::value
7033  >::type
7034  acquired_async_unsubscribe_imp(
7035  packet_id_t packet_id,
7036  std::string topic_name,
7037  Args&&... args) {

7040  params.reserve(sizeof...(args));
7041

7043  force_move(params),
7044  any(),
7045  packet_id,
7046  force_move(topic_name),
7047  std::forward<Args>(args)...
7048  );
7049  }

7052  typename std::enable_if<
7053  std::is_convertible<
7054  typename std::tuple_element<sizeof...(Args) - 1, std::tuple<Args...>>::type,
7055  any
7056  >::value
7057  >::type

7065

7067  force_move(params),
7068  any(),
7069  packet_id,
7070  topic_name,
7071  std::forward<Args>(args)...
7072  );
7073  }

7075  template <typename... Args>
7076  typename std::enable_if<
7077  !std::is_convertible<
7078  typename std::tuple_element<sizeof...(Args) - 1, std::tuple<Args...>>::type,
7079  any
7080  >::value
7081  >::type
7082  acquired_async_unsubscribe_imp(
7083  packet_id_t packet_id,
7084  std::string topic_name,
7085  Args&&... args) {
7086 
7087  std::vector<buffer> params;
7088  params.reserve(sizeof...(args) + 1);
7089 
7090  async_send_unsubscribe(
7091  force_move(params),
7092  any(),
7093  packet_id,
7094  force_move(topic_name),
7095  std::forward<Args>(args)...,
7096  any()
7097  );
7098  }
7099 
7100  template <typename... Args>
7101  typename std::enable_if<
7102  !std::is_convertible<
7103  typename std::tuple_element<sizeof...(Args) - 1, std::tuple<Args...>>::type,
7104  any
7105  >::value
7106  >::type
7107  acquired_async_unsubscribe_imp(
7108  packet_id_t packet_id,
7109  as::const_buffer topic_name,
7110  Args&&... args) {
7111 
7112  std::vector<buffer> params;
7113  params.reserve(sizeof...(args) + 1);
7114 
7115  async_send_unsubscribe(
7116  force_move(params),
7117  any(),
7118  packet_id,
7119  topic_name,
7120  std::forward<Args>(args)...,
7121  any()
7122  );
7123  }
7124 
7125  template <typename... Args>
7126  typename std::enable_if<
7127  std::is_convertible<
7128  typename std::tuple_element<sizeof...(Args) - 1, std::tuple<Args...>>::type,
7129  any
7130  >::value
7131  >::type
7132  async_suback_imp(
7133  packet_id_t packet_id,
7134  std::uint8_t qos_value,
7135  Args&&... args) {
7136  async_send_suback(std::vector<std::uint8_t>{}, packet_id, qos_value, std::forward<Args>(args)...);
7137  }
7138 
7139  template <typename... Args>
7140  typename std::enable_if<
7141  !std::is_convertible<
7142  typename std::tuple_element<sizeof...(Args) - 1, std::tuple<Args...>>::type,
7143  any
7144  >::value
7145  >::type
7146  async_suback_imp(
7147  packet_id_t packet_id,
7148  Args&&... qos_values) {
7149  async_send_suback(std::vector<std::uint8_t>({qos_values...}), packet_id, any());
7150  }
7151 
7152  template <typename... Args>
7153  typename std::enable_if<
7154  std::is_convertible<
7155  typename std::tuple_element<sizeof...(Args) - 1, std::tuple<Args...>>::type,
7156  any
7157  >::value
7158  >::type
7159  async_unsuback_imp(
7160  packet_id_t packet_id,
7161  v5::unsuback_reason_code payload,
7162  Args&&... args) {
7163  async_send_unsuback(std::vector<v5::unsuback_reason_code>{}, packet_id, payload, std::forward<Args>(args)...);
7164  }
7165 
7166  template <typename... Args>
7167  typename std::enable_if<
7168  !std::is_convertible<
7169  typename std::tuple_element<sizeof...(Args) - 1, std::tuple<Args...>>::type,
7170  any
7171  >::value
7172  >::type
7173  async_unsuback_imp(
7174  packet_id_t packet_id,
7175  Args&&... payload) {
7176  async_send_unsuback(std::vector<v5::unsuback_reason_code>({payload...}), packet_id, any());
7177  }
7178 
7179  class send_buffer {
7180  public:
7181  send_buffer():buf_(std::make_shared<std::string>(static_cast<int>(payload_position_), 0)) {}
7182 
7183  std::shared_ptr<std::string> const& buf() const {
7184  return buf_;
7185  }
7186 
7187  std::shared_ptr<std::string>& buf() {
7188  return buf_;
7189  }
7190 
7191  std::pair<char*, std::size_t> finalize(std::uint8_t fixed_header) {
7192  auto rb = remaining_bytes(buf_->size() - payload_position_);
7193  std::size_t start_position = payload_position_ - rb.size() - 1;
7194  (*buf_)[start_position] = fixed_header;
7195  buf_->replace(start_position + 1, rb.size(), rb);
7196  return std::make_pair(
7197  &(*buf_)[start_position],
7198  buf_->size() - start_position);
7199  }
7200  private:
7201  static constexpr std::size_t payload_position_ = 5;
7202  std::shared_ptr<std::string> buf_;
7203  };
7204 
7205  struct store {
7206  store(
7207  packet_id_t id,
7208  control_packet_type type,
7209  basic_store_message_variant<PacketIdBytes> smv,
7210  any life_keeper = any())
7211  : packet_id_(id)
7212  , expected_control_packet_type_(type)
7213  , smv_(force_move(smv))
7214  , life_keeper_(force_move(life_keeper)) {}
7215  packet_id_t packet_id() const { return packet_id_; }
7216  control_packet_type expected_control_packet_type() const { return expected_control_packet_type_; }
7217  basic_message_variant<PacketIdBytes> message() const {
7218  return get_basic_message_variant<PacketIdBytes>(smv_);
7219  }
7220  private:
7221  packet_id_t packet_id_;
7222  control_packet_type expected_control_packet_type_;
7223  basic_store_message_variant<PacketIdBytes> smv_;
7224  any life_keeper_;
7225  };
7226 
7227  struct tag_packet_id {};
7228  struct tag_packet_id_type {};
7229  struct tag_seq {};
7230  using mi_store = mi::multi_index_container<
7231  store,
7232  mi::indexed_by<
7233  mi::ordered_unique<
7234  mi::tag<tag_packet_id_type>,
7235  mi::composite_key<
7236  store,
7237  mi::const_mem_fun<
7238  store, packet_id_t,
7239  &store::packet_id
7240  >,
7241  mi::const_mem_fun<
7242  store, control_packet_type,
7243  &store::expected_control_packet_type
7244  >
7245  >
7246  >,
7247  mi::ordered_non_unique<
7248  mi::tag<tag_packet_id>,
7249  mi::const_mem_fun<
7250  store, packet_id_t,
7251  &store::packet_id
7252  >
7253  >,
7254  mi::sequenced<
7255  mi::tag<tag_seq>
7256  >
7257  >
7258  >;
7259 
7260  void handle_control_packet_type(any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp self) {
7261  fixed_header_ = static_cast<std::uint8_t>(buf_.front());
7262  remaining_length_ = 0;
7263  remaining_length_multiplier_ = 1;
7264  socket_->async_read(
7265  as::buffer(buf_.data(), 1),
7266  [this, self = force_move(self), session_life_keeper = force_move(session_life_keeper)] (
7267  boost::system::error_code const& ec,
7268  std::size_t bytes_transferred) mutable {
7269  if (!check_error_and_transferred_length(ec, bytes_transferred, 1)) return;
7270  handle_remaining_length(force_move(session_life_keeper), force_move(self));
7271  }
7272  );
7273  }
7274 
7275  bool calc_variable_length(std::size_t& v, std::size_t& multiplier, char buf) {
7276  v += (buf & 0b01111111) * multiplier;
7277  multiplier *= 128;
7278  return multiplier <= 128 * 128 * 128 * 128;
7279  }
7280 
7281  void handle_remaining_length(any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp self) {
7282  if (!calc_variable_length(remaining_length_, remaining_length_multiplier_, buf_.front())) {
7283  on_error(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::message_size));
7284  return;
7285  }
7286  if (buf_.front() & variable_length_continue_flag) {
7287  socket_->async_read(
7288  as::buffer(buf_.data(), 1),
7289  [this, self = force_move(self), session_life_keeper = force_move(session_life_keeper)](
7290  boost::system::error_code const& ec,
7291  std::size_t bytes_transferred) mutable {
7292  if (handle_close_or_error(ec)) {
7293  return;
7294  }
7295  if (bytes_transferred != 1) {
7296  on_error(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::message_size));
7297  return;
7298  }
7299  handle_remaining_length(force_move(session_life_keeper), force_move(self));
7300  }
7301  );
7302  }
7303  else {
7304  auto check =
7305  [&]() -> bool {
7306  auto cpt = get_control_packet_type(fixed_header_);
7307  switch (version_) {
7308  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
7309  switch (cpt) {
7310  case control_packet_type::connect:
7311  case control_packet_type::publish:
7312  case control_packet_type::subscribe:
7313  case control_packet_type::suback:
7314  case control_packet_type::unsubscribe:
7315  return check_is_valid_length(cpt, remaining_length_);
7316  case control_packet_type::connack:
7317  return remaining_length_ == 2;
7318  case control_packet_type::puback:
7319  case control_packet_type::pubrec:
7320  case control_packet_type::pubrel:
7321  case control_packet_type::pubcomp:
7322  case control_packet_type::unsuback:
7323  return remaining_length_ == sizeof(packet_id_t);
7324  case control_packet_type::pingreq:
7325  case control_packet_type::pingresp:
7326  case control_packet_type::disconnect:
7327  return remaining_length_ == 0;
7328  default:
7329  return false;
7330  }
7331  break;
7332  case protocol_version::v5:
7333  default:
7334  switch (cpt) {
7335  case control_packet_type::connect:
7336  case control_packet_type::publish:
7337  case control_packet_type::subscribe:
7338  case control_packet_type::suback:
7339  case control_packet_type::unsubscribe:
7340  case control_packet_type::connack:
7341  case control_packet_type::puback:
7342  case control_packet_type::pubrec:
7343  case control_packet_type::pubrel:
7344  case control_packet_type::pubcomp:
7345  case control_packet_type::unsuback:
7346  case control_packet_type::disconnect:
7347  return check_is_valid_length(cpt, remaining_length_);
7348  case control_packet_type::pingreq:
7349  case control_packet_type::pingresp:
7350  return remaining_length_ == 0;
7351  default:
7352  return false;
7353  }
7354  break;
7355  }
7356  };
7357  if (!check()) {
7358  on_error(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::message_size));
7359  return;
7360  }
7361 
7362  process_payload(force_move(session_life_keeper), force_move(self));
7363  }
7364  }
7365 
7366  void process_payload(any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp self) {
7367  auto control_packet_type = get_control_packet_type(fixed_header_);
7368  switch (control_packet_type) {
7369  case control_packet_type::connect:
7370  process_connect(force_move(session_life_keeper), remaining_length_ < packet_bulk_read_limit_, force_move(self));
7371  break;
7372  case control_packet_type::connack:
7373  process_connack(force_move(session_life_keeper), remaining_length_ < packet_bulk_read_limit_, force_move(self));
7374  break;
7375  case control_packet_type::publish:
7376  if (mqtt_connected_) {
7377  process_publish(force_move(session_life_keeper), remaining_length_ < packet_bulk_read_limit_, force_move(self));
7378  }
7379  break;
7380  case control_packet_type::puback:
7381  if (mqtt_connected_) {
7382  process_puback(force_move(session_life_keeper), remaining_length_ < packet_bulk_read_limit_, force_move(self));
7383  }
7384  break;
7385  case control_packet_type::pubrec:
7386  if (mqtt_connected_) {
7387  process_pubrec(force_move(session_life_keeper), remaining_length_ < packet_bulk_read_limit_, force_move(self));
7388  }
7389  break;
7390  case control_packet_type::pubrel:
7391  if (mqtt_connected_) {
7392  process_pubrel(force_move(session_life_keeper), remaining_length_ < packet_bulk_read_limit_, force_move(self));
7393  }
7394  break;
7395  case control_packet_type::pubcomp:
7396  if (mqtt_connected_) {
7397  process_pubcomp(force_move(session_life_keeper), remaining_length_ < packet_bulk_read_limit_, force_move(self));
7398  }
7399  break;
7400  case control_packet_type::subscribe:
7401  if (mqtt_connected_) {
7402  process_subscribe(force_move(session_life_keeper), remaining_length_ < packet_bulk_read_limit_, force_move(self));
7403  }
7404  break;
7405  case control_packet_type::suback:
7406  if (mqtt_connected_) {
7407  process_suback(force_move(session_life_keeper), remaining_length_ < packet_bulk_read_limit_, force_move(self));
7408  }
7409  break;
7410  case control_packet_type::unsubscribe:
7411  if (mqtt_connected_) {
7412  process_unsubscribe(force_move(session_life_keeper), remaining_length_ < packet_bulk_read_limit_, force_move(self));
7413  }
7414  break;
7415  case control_packet_type::unsuback:
7416  if (mqtt_connected_) {
7417  process_unsuback(force_move(session_life_keeper), remaining_length_ < packet_bulk_read_limit_, force_move(self));
7418  }
7419  break;
7420  case control_packet_type::pingreq:
7421  if (mqtt_connected_) {
7422  process_pingreq(force_move(session_life_keeper));
7423  }
7424  break;
7425  case control_packet_type::pingresp:
7426  if (mqtt_connected_) {
7427  process_pingresp(force_move(session_life_keeper));
7428  }
7429  break;
7430  case control_packet_type::disconnect:
7431  process_disconnect(force_move(session_life_keeper), remaining_length_ < packet_bulk_read_limit_, force_move(self));
7432  break;
7433  case control_packet_type::auth:
7434  process_auth(force_move(session_life_keeper), remaining_length_ < packet_bulk_read_limit_, force_move(self));
7435  break;
7436  default:
7437  break;
7438  }
7439  }
7440 
7441  // primitive read functions
7442  void process_nbytes(
7443  any session_life_keeper,
7444  buffer buf,
7445  std::size_t size,
7446  std::function<void(buffer, buffer, any, this_type_sp)> handler,
7447  this_type_sp self
7448  ) {
7449  if (remaining_length_ < size) {
7450  call_message_size_error_handlers();
7451  return;
7452  }
7453  remaining_length_ -= size;
7454 
7455  if (buf.empty()) {
7456  auto spa = make_shared_ptr_array(size);
7457  auto ptr = spa.get();
7458  socket_->async_read(
7459  as::buffer(ptr, size),
7460  [
7461  this,
7462  self = force_move(self),
7463  session_life_keeper = force_move(session_life_keeper),
7464  handler = force_move(handler),
7465  buf = buffer(string_view(ptr, size), force_move(spa))
7466  ]
7467  (boost::system::error_code const& ec,
7468  std::size_t bytes_transferred) mutable {
7469  if (!check_error_and_transferred_length(ec, bytes_transferred, buf.size())) return;
7470  handler(
7471  force_move(buf),
7472  buffer(),
7473  force_move(session_life_keeper),
7474  force_move(self)
7475  );
7476  }
7477  );
7478  }
7479  else {
7480  if (buf.size() < size) {
7481  call_message_size_error_handlers();
7482  return;
7483  }
7484  socket_->post(
7485  [
7486  self = force_move(self),
7487  session_life_keeper = force_move(session_life_keeper),
7488  buf = force_move(buf),
7489  size,
7490  handler = force_move(handler)
7491  ]
7492  () mutable {
7493  handler(
7494  buf.substr(0, size),
7495  buf.substr(size),
7496  force_move(session_life_keeper),
7497  force_move(self)
7498  );
7499  }
7500  );
7501  }
7502  }
7503 
7504  template <std::size_t Bytes>
7505  void process_fixed_length(
7506  any session_life_keeper,
7507  buffer buf,
7508  std::function<void(std::size_t, buffer, any, this_type_sp)> handler,
7509  this_type_sp self
7510  ) {
7511  if (remaining_length_ < Bytes) {
7512  call_message_size_error_handlers();
7513  return;
7514  }
7515 
7516  remaining_length_ -= Bytes;
7517 
7518  if (buf.empty()) {
7519  socket_->async_read(
7520  as::buffer(buf_.data(), Bytes),
7521  [
7522  this,
7523  self = force_move(self),
7524  session_life_keeper = force_move(session_life_keeper),
7525  handler = force_move(handler)
7526  ]
7527  (boost::system::error_code const& ec,
7528  std::size_t bytes_transferred) mutable {
7529  if (!check_error_and_transferred_length(ec, bytes_transferred, Bytes)) return;
7530  handler(
7531  make_packet_id<Bytes>::apply(
7532  buf_.data(),
7533  std::next(buf_.data(), boost::numeric_cast<buffer::difference_type>(Bytes))
7534  ),
7535  buffer(),
7536  force_move(session_life_keeper),
7537  force_move(self)
7538  );
7539  }
7540  );
7541  }
7542  else {
7543  socket_->post(
7544  [
7545  self = force_move(self),
7546  session_life_keeper = force_move(session_life_keeper),
7547  buf = force_move(buf),
7548  handler = force_move(handler)
7549  ]
7550  () mutable {
7551  auto packet_id =
7552  make_packet_id<Bytes>::apply(
7553  buf.data(),
7554  std::next(buf.data(), boost::numeric_cast<buffer::difference_type>(Bytes))
7555  );
7556  buf.remove_prefix(Bytes);
7557  handler(
7558  packet_id,
7559  force_move(buf),
7560  force_move(session_life_keeper),
7561  force_move(self)
7562  );
7563  }
7564  );
7565  }
7566  }
7567 
7568  // This function isn't used for remaining lengh.
7569  void process_variable_length(
7570  any session_life_keeper,
7571  buffer buf,
7572  std::function<void(std::size_t, buffer, any, this_type_sp)> handler,
7573  this_type_sp self
7574  ) {
7575  process_variable_length_impl(
7576  force_move(session_life_keeper),
7577  force_move(buf),
7578  force_move(handler),
7579  0,
7580  1,
7581  force_move(self)
7582  );
7583  }
7584 
7585  void process_variable_length_impl(
7586  any session_life_keeper,
7587  buffer buf,
7588  std::function<void(std::size_t, buffer, any, this_type_sp)> handler,
7589  std::size_t size,
7590  std::size_t multiplier,
7591  this_type_sp self
7592  ) {
7593  if (remaining_length_ == 0) {
7594  call_message_size_error_handlers();
7595  return;
7596  }
7597  --remaining_length_;
7598 
7599  // I use rvalue reference parameter to reduce move constructor calling.
7600  // This is a local lambda expression invoked from this function, so
7601  // I can control all callers.
7602  auto proc =
7603  [this]
7604  (
7605  any&& session_life_keeper,
7606  buffer&& buf,
7607  std::function<void(std::size_t, buffer, any, this_type_sp)>&& handler,
7608  std::size_t size,
7609  std::size_t multiplier,
7610  this_type_sp&& self
7611  ) mutable {
7612  if (!calc_variable_length(size, multiplier, buf.front())) {
7613  call_message_size_error_handlers();
7614  return;
7615  }
7616  if (buf.front() & variable_length_continue_flag) {
7617  BOOST_ASSERT(!buf.empty());
7618  buf.remove_prefix(1);
7619  process_variable_length_impl(
7620  force_move(session_life_keeper),
7621  force_move(buf),
7622  force_move(handler),
7623  size,
7624  multiplier,
7625  force_move(self)
7626  );
7627  }
7628  else {
7629  buf.remove_prefix(1);
7630  handler(
7631  size,
7632  force_move(buf),
7633  force_move(session_life_keeper),
7634  force_move(self)
7635  );
7636  }
7637  };
7638 
7639  if (buf.empty()) {
7640  socket_->async_read(
7641  as::buffer(buf_.data(), 1),
7642  [
7643  this,
7644  self = force_move(self),
7645  session_life_keeper = force_move(session_life_keeper),
7646  handler = force_move(handler),
7647  size,
7648  multiplier,
7649  proc = force_move(proc)
7650  ]
7651  (boost::system::error_code const& ec,
7652  std::size_t bytes_transferred) mutable {
7653  if (!check_error_and_transferred_length(ec, bytes_transferred, 1)) return;
7654  proc(
7655  force_move(session_life_keeper),
7656  buffer(string_view(buf_.data(), 1)), // buf_'s lifetime is handled by `self`
7657  force_move(handler),
7658  size,
7659  multiplier,
7660  force_move(self)
7661  );
7662  }
7663  );
7664  }
7665  else {
7666  socket_->post(
7667  [
7668  session_life_keeper = force_move(session_life_keeper),
7669  handler = force_move(handler),
7670  buf = force_move(buf),
7671  size,
7672  multiplier,
7673  proc = force_move(proc),
7674  self = force_move(self)
7675  ]
7676  () mutable {
7677  proc(
7678  force_move(session_life_keeper),
7679  force_move(buf),
7680  force_move(handler),
7681  size,
7682  multiplier,
7683  force_move(self)
7684  );
7685  }
7686  );
7687  }
7688  }
7689 
7690  void process_packet_id(
7691  any session_life_keeper,
7692  buffer buf,
7693  std::function<void(packet_id_t, buffer, any, this_type_sp)> handler,
7694  this_type_sp self
7695  ) {
7696  process_fixed_length<sizeof(packet_id_t)>(
7697  force_move(session_life_keeper),
7698  force_move(buf),
7699  [
7700  handler = force_move(handler)
7701  ]
7702  (std::size_t packet_id, buffer buf, any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp self) mutable {
7703  handler(static_cast<packet_id_t>(packet_id), force_move(buf), force_move(session_life_keeper), force_move(self));
7704  },
7705  force_move(self)
7706  );
7707  }
7708 
7709  void process_binary(
7710  any session_life_keeper,
7711  buffer buf,
7712  std::function<void(buffer, buffer, any, this_type_sp)> handler,
7713  this_type_sp self
7714  ) {
7715  if (remaining_length_ < 2) {
7716  call_message_size_error_handlers();
7717  return;
7718  }
7719  process_fixed_length<2>(
7720  force_move(session_life_keeper),
7721  force_move(buf),
7722  [
7723  this,
7724  handler = force_move(handler)
7725  ]
7726  (std::size_t size,
7727  buffer buf,
7728  any session_life_keeper,
7729  this_type_sp self) mutable {
7730  if (remaining_length_ < size) {
7731  call_message_size_error_handlers();
7732  return;
7733  }
7734  process_nbytes(
7735  force_move(session_life_keeper),
7736  force_move(buf),
7737  size,
7738  force_move(handler),
7739  force_move(self)
7740  );
7741  },
7742  force_move(self)
7743  );
7744  }
7745 
7746  void process_string(
7747  any session_life_keeper,
7748  buffer buf,
7749  std::function<void(buffer, buffer, any, this_type_sp)> handler,
7750  this_type_sp self
7751  ) {
7752  process_binary(
7753  force_move(session_life_keeper),
7754  force_move(buf),
7755  [this, handler = force_move(handler)]
7756  (buffer str, buffer buf, any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp self) mutable {
7757  auto r = utf8string::validate_contents(str);
