7758  if (r != utf8string::validation::well_formed) {
7759  call_protocol_error_handlers();
7760  return;
7761  }
7762  handler(force_move(str), force_move(buf), force_move(session_life_keeper), force_move(self));
7763  },
7764  force_move(self)
7765  );
7766  }
7767 
7768 
7769  void process_properties(
7770  any session_life_keeper,
7771  buffer buf,
7772  std::function<void(std::vector<v5::property_variant>, buffer, any, this_type_sp)> handler,
7773  this_type_sp self
7774  ) {
7775  process_variable_length(
7776  force_move(session_life_keeper),
7777  force_move(buf),
7778  [
7779  this,
7780  handler = force_move(handler)
7781  ]
7782  (std::size_t property_length, buffer buf, any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp self) mutable {
7783  if (property_length > remaining_length_) {
7784  call_message_size_error_handlers();
7785  return;
7786  }
7787  if (property_length == 0) {
7788  handler(std::vector<v5::property_variant>(), force_move(buf), force_move(session_life_keeper), force_move(self));
7789  return;
7790  }
7791 
7792  if (buf.empty()) {
7793  struct spa_address_len {
7794  shared_ptr_array spa;
7795  char* address;
7796  std::size_t len;
7797  };
7798  auto result =
7799  [&] () -> spa_address_len {
7800  if (property_length < props_bulk_read_limit_) {
7801  auto spa = make_shared_ptr_array(property_length);
7802  auto ptr = spa.get();
7803  return
7804  {
7805  force_move(spa),
7806  ptr,
7807  property_length
7808  };
7809  }
7810  return
7811  {
7812  nullptr,
7813  buf_.data(),
7814  1
7815  };
7816  } ();
7817  socket_->async_read(
7818  as::buffer(result.address, result.len),
7819  [
7820  this,
7821  self = force_move(self),
7822  session_life_keeper = force_move(session_life_keeper),
7823  handler = force_move(handler),
7824  property_length,
7825  result
7826  ]
7827  (boost::system::error_code const& ec, std::size_t bytes_transferred) mutable {
7828  if (!check_error_and_transferred_length(ec, bytes_transferred, result.len)) return;
7829  process_property_id(
7830  force_move(session_life_keeper),
7831  buffer(string_view(result.address, result.len), result.spa),
7832  property_length,
7833  std::vector<v5::property_variant>(),
7834  force_move(handler),
7835  force_move(self)
7836  );
7837  }
7838  );
7839  }
7840  else {
7841  socket_->post(
7842  [
7843  this,
7844  self = force_move(self),
7845  session_life_keeper = force_move(session_life_keeper),
7846  buf = force_move(buf),
7847  handler = force_move(handler),
7848  property_length
7849  ]
7850  () mutable {
7851  process_property_id(
7852  force_move(session_life_keeper),
7853  force_move(buf),
7854  property_length,
7855  std::vector<v5::property_variant>(),
7856  force_move(handler),
7857  force_move(self)
7858  );
7859  }
7860  );
7861  }
7862  },
7863  force_move(self)
7864  );
7865  }
7866 
7867  void process_property_id(
7868  any session_life_keeper,
7869  buffer buf,
7870  std::size_t property_length_rest,
7871  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
7872  std::function<void(std::vector<v5::property_variant>, buffer, any, this_type_sp)> handler,
7873  this_type_sp self
7874  ) {
7875 
7876  if (property_length_rest == 0) {
7877  handler(force_move(props), force_move(buf), force_move(session_life_keeper), force_move(self));
7878  return;
7879  }
7880 
7881  --remaining_length_;
7882  if (buf.empty()) {
7883  socket_->async_read(
7884  as::buffer(buf_.data(), 1),
7885  [
7886  this,
7887  self = force_move(self),
7888  session_life_keeper = force_move(session_life_keeper),
7889  props = force_move(props),
7890  handler = force_move(handler),
7891  property_length_rest
7892  ]
7893  (boost::system::error_code const& ec,
7894  std::size_t bytes_transferred) mutable {
7895  if (!check_error_and_transferred_length(ec, bytes_transferred, 1)) return;
7896  process_property_body(
7897  force_move(session_life_keeper),
7898  buffer(),
7899  static_cast<v5::property::id>(buf_.front()),
7900  property_length_rest - 1,
7901  force_move(props),
7902  force_move(handler),
7903  force_move(self)
7904  );
7905  }
7906  );
7907  }
7908  else {
7909  socket_->post(
7910  [
7911  this,
7912  self = force_move(self),
7913  session_life_keeper = force_move(session_life_keeper),
7914  buf = force_move(buf),
7915  props = force_move(props),
7916  handler = force_move(handler),
7917  property_length_rest
7918  ]
7919  () mutable {
7920  auto id = static_cast<v5::property::id>(buf.front());
7921  buf.remove_prefix(1);
7922  process_property_body(
7923  force_move(session_life_keeper),
7924  force_move(buf),
7925  id,
7926  property_length_rest - 1,
7927  force_move(props),
7928  force_move(handler),
7929  force_move(self)
7930  );
7931  }
7932  );
7933  }
7934  }
7935 
7936  void process_property_body(
7937  any session_life_keeper,
7938  buffer buf,
7939  v5::property::id id,
7940  std::size_t property_length_rest,
7941  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
7942  std::function<void(std::vector<v5::property_variant>, buffer, any, this_type_sp)> handler,
7943  this_type_sp self
7944  ) {
7945 
7946  static constexpr std::size_t length_bytes = 2;
7947 
7948  if (property_length_rest == 0) {
7949  call_message_size_error_handlers();
7950  return;
7951  }
7952 
7953  switch (id) {
7954  case v5::property::id::payload_format_indicator: {
7955  static constexpr std::size_t len = 1;
7956  if (property_length_rest < len) {
7957  call_message_size_error_handlers();
7958  return;
7959  }
7960  process_nbytes(
7961  force_move(session_life_keeper),
7962  force_move(buf),
7963  len,
7964  [
7965  this,
7966  props = force_move(props),
7967  handler = force_move(handler),
7968  rest = property_length_rest - len
7969  ]
7970  (buffer body, buffer buf, any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp self) mutable {
7971  props.emplace_back(
7972  v5::property::payload_format_indicator(body.begin(), body.end())
7973  );
7974  process_property_id(
7975  force_move(session_life_keeper),
7976  force_move(buf),
7977  rest,
7978  force_move(props),
7979  force_move(handler),
7980  force_move(self)
7981  );
7982  },
7983  force_move(self)
7984  );
7985  } break;
7986  case v5::property::id::message_expiry_interval: {
7987  static constexpr std::size_t len = 4;
7988  if (property_length_rest < len) {
7989  call_message_size_error_handlers();
7990  return;
7991  }
7992  process_nbytes(
7993  force_move(session_life_keeper),
7994  force_move(buf),
7995  len,
7996  [
7997  this,
7998  props = force_move(props),
7999  handler = force_move(handler),
8000  rest = property_length_rest - len
8001  ]
8002  (buffer body, buffer buf, any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp self) mutable {
8003  props.emplace_back(
8004  v5::property::message_expiry_interval(body.begin(), body.end())
8005  );
8006  process_property_id(
8007  force_move(session_life_keeper),
8008  force_move(buf),
8009  rest,
8010  force_move(props),
8011  force_move(handler),
8012  force_move(self)
8013  );
8014  },
8015  force_move(self)
8016  );
8017  } break;
8018  case v5::property::id::content_type: {
8019  process_string(
8020  force_move(session_life_keeper),
8021  force_move(buf),
8022  [
8023  this,
8024  props = force_move(props),
8025  handler = force_move(handler),
8026  property_length_rest
8027  ]
8028  (buffer body, buffer buf, any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp self) mutable {
8029  auto rest = property_length_rest - length_bytes - body.size();
8030  props.emplace_back(
8031  v5::property::content_type(force_move(body), true)
8032  );
8033  process_property_id(
8034  force_move(session_life_keeper),
8035  force_move(buf),
8036  rest,
8037  force_move(props),
8038  force_move(handler),
8039  force_move(self)
8040  );
8041  },
8042  force_move(self)
8043  );
8044  } break;
8045  case v5::property::id::response_topic: {
8046  process_string(
8047  force_move(session_life_keeper),
8048  force_move(buf),
8049  [
8050  this,
8051  props = force_move(props),
8052  handler = force_move(handler),
8053  property_length_rest
8054  ]
8055  (buffer body, buffer buf, any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp self) mutable {
8056  auto rest = property_length_rest - length_bytes - body.size();
8057  props.emplace_back(
8058  v5::property::response_topic(force_move(body), true)
8059  );
8060  process_property_id(
8061  force_move(session_life_keeper),
8062  force_move(buf),
8063  rest,
8064  force_move(props),
8065  force_move(handler),
8066  force_move(self)
8067  );
8068  },
8069  force_move(self)
8070  );
8071  } break;
8072  case v5::property::id::correlation_data: {
8073  process_string(
8074  force_move(session_life_keeper),
8075  force_move(buf),
8076  [
8077  this,
8078  props = force_move(props),
8079  handler = force_move(handler),
8080  property_length_rest
8081  ]
8082  (buffer body, buffer buf, any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp self) mutable {
8083  auto rest = property_length_rest - length_bytes - body.size();
8084  props.emplace_back(
8085  v5::property::correlation_data(force_move(body), true)
8086  );
8087  process_property_id(
8088  force_move(session_life_keeper),
8089  force_move(buf),
8090  rest,
8091  force_move(props),
8092  force_move(handler),
8093  force_move(self)
8094  );
8095  },
8096  force_move(self)
8097  );
8098  } break;
8099  case v5::property::id::subscription_identifier: {
8100  process_variable_length(
8101  force_move(session_life_keeper),
8102  force_move(buf),
8103  [
8104  this,
8105  props = force_move(props),
8106  handler = force_move(handler),
8107  property_length_rest,
8108  remaining_length_before = remaining_length_
8109  ]
8110  (std::size_t size, buffer buf, any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp self) mutable {
8111  auto consumed = remaining_length_before - remaining_length_;
8112  auto rest = property_length_rest - consumed;
8113  props.emplace_back(
8114  v5::property::subscription_identifier(size)
8115  );
8116  process_property_id(
8117  force_move(session_life_keeper),
8118  force_move(buf),
8119  rest,
8120  force_move(props),
8121  force_move(handler),
8122  force_move(self)
8123  );
8124  },
8125  force_move(self)
8126  );
8127  } break;
8128  case v5::property::id::session_expiry_interval: {
8129  static constexpr std::size_t len = 4;
8130  if (property_length_rest < len) {
8131  call_message_size_error_handlers();
8132  return;
8133  }
8134  process_nbytes(
8135  force_move(session_life_keeper),
8136  force_move(buf),
8137  len,
8138  [
8139  this,
8140  props = force_move(props),
8141  handler = force_move(handler),
8142  rest = property_length_rest - len
8143  ]
8144  (buffer body, buffer buf, any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp self) mutable {
8145  props.emplace_back(
8146  v5::property::session_expiry_interval(body.begin(), body.end())
8147  );
8148  process_property_id(
8149  force_move(session_life_keeper),
8150  force_move(buf),
8151  rest,
8152  force_move(props),
8153  force_move(handler),
8154  force_move(self)
8155  );
8156  },
8157  force_move(self)
8158  );
8159  } break;
8160  case v5::property::id::assigned_client_identifier: {
8161  process_string(
8162  force_move(session_life_keeper),
8163  force_move(buf),
8164  [
8165  this,
8166  props = force_move(props),
8167  handler = force_move(handler),
8168  property_length_rest
8169  ]
8170  (buffer body, buffer buf, any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp self) mutable {
8171  auto rest = property_length_rest - length_bytes - body.size();
8172  props.emplace_back(
8173  v5::property::assigned_client_identifier(force_move(body), true)
8174  );
8175  process_property_id(
8176  force_move(session_life_keeper),
8177  force_move(buf),
8178  rest,
8179  force_move(props),
8180  force_move(handler),
8181  force_move(self)
8182  );
8183  },
8184  force_move(self)
8185  );
8186 
8187  } break;
8188  case v5::property::id::server_keep_alive: {
8189  static constexpr std::size_t len = 2;
8190  if (property_length_rest < len) {
8191  call_message_size_error_handlers();
8192  return;
8193  }
8194  process_nbytes(
8195  force_move(session_life_keeper),
8196  force_move(buf),
8197  len,
8198  [
8199  this,
8200  props = force_move(props),
8201  handler = force_move(handler),
8202  rest = property_length_rest - len
8203  ]
8204  (buffer body, buffer buf, any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp self) mutable {
8205  props.emplace_back(
8206  v5::property::server_keep_alive(body.begin(), body.end())
8207  );
8208  process_property_id(
8209  force_move(session_life_keeper),
8210  force_move(buf),
8211  rest,
8212  force_move(props),
8213  force_move(handler),
8214  force_move(self)
8215  );
8216  },
8217  force_move(self)
8218  );
8219  } break;
8220  case v5::property::id::authentication_method: {
8221  process_string(
8222  force_move(session_life_keeper),
8223  force_move(buf),
8224  [
8225  this,
8226  props = force_move(props),
8227  handler = force_move(handler),
8228  property_length_rest
8229  ]
8230  (buffer body, buffer buf, any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp self) mutable {
8231  auto rest = property_length_rest - length_bytes - body.size();
8232  props.emplace_back(
8233  v5::property::authentication_method(force_move(body), true)
8234  );
8235  process_property_id(
8236  force_move(session_life_keeper),
8237  force_move(buf),
8238  rest,
8239  force_move(props),
8240  force_move(handler),
8241  force_move(self)
8242  );
8243  },
8244  force_move(self)
8245  );
8246  } break;
8247  case v5::property::id::authentication_data: {
8248  process_binary(
8249  force_move(session_life_keeper),
8250  force_move(buf),
8251  [
8252  this,
8253  props = force_move(props),
8254  handler = force_move(handler),
8255  property_length_rest
8256  ]
8257  (buffer body, buffer buf, any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp self) mutable {
8258  auto rest = property_length_rest - length_bytes - body.size();
8259  props.emplace_back(
8260  v5::property::authentication_data(force_move(body))
8261  );
8262  process_property_id(
8263  force_move(session_life_keeper),
8264  force_move(buf),
8265  rest,
8266  force_move(props),
8267  force_move(handler),
8268  force_move(self)
8269  );
8270  },
8271  force_move(self)
8272  );
8273  } break;
8274  case v5::property::id::request_problem_information: {
8275  static constexpr std::size_t len = 1;
8276  if (property_length_rest < len) {
8277  call_message_size_error_handlers();
8278  return;
8279  }
8280  process_nbytes(
8281  force_move(session_life_keeper),
8282  force_move(buf),
8283  len,
8284  [
8285  this,
8286  props = force_move(props),
8287  handler = force_move(handler),
8288  rest = property_length_rest - len
8289  ]
8290  (buffer body, buffer buf, any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp self) mutable {
8291  props.emplace_back(
8292  v5::property::request_problem_information(body.begin(), body.end())
8293  );
8294  process_property_id(
8295  force_move(session_life_keeper),
8296  force_move(buf),
8297  rest,
8298  force_move(props),
8299  force_move(handler),
8300  force_move(self)
8301  );
8302  },
8303  force_move(self)
8304  );
8305  } break;
8306  case v5::property::id::will_delay_interval: {
8307  static constexpr std::size_t len = 4;
8308  if (property_length_rest < len) {
8309  call_message_size_error_handlers();
8310  return;
8311  }
8312  process_nbytes(
8313  force_move(session_life_keeper),
8314  force_move(buf),
8315  len,
8316  [
8317  this,
8318  props = force_move(props),
8319  handler = force_move(handler),
8320  rest = property_length_rest - len
8321  ]
8322  (buffer body, buffer buf, any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp self) mutable {
8323  props.emplace_back(
8324  v5::property::will_delay_interval(body.begin(), body.end())
8325  );
8326  process_property_id(
8327  force_move(session_life_keeper),
8328  force_move(buf),
8329  rest,
8330  force_move(props),
8331  force_move(handler),
8332  force_move(self)
8333  );
8334  },
8335  force_move(self)
8336  );
8337  } break;
8338  case v5::property::id::request_response_information: {
8339  static constexpr std::size_t len = 1;
8340  if (property_length_rest < len) {
8341  call_message_size_error_handlers();
8342  return;
8343  }
8344  process_nbytes(
8345  force_move(session_life_keeper),
8346  force_move(buf),
8347  len,
8348  [
8349  this,
8350  props = force_move(props),
8351  handler = force_move(handler),
8352  rest = property_length_rest - len
8353  ]
8354  (buffer body, buffer buf, any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp self) mutable {
8355  props.emplace_back(
8356  v5::property::request_response_information(body.begin(), body.end())
8357  );
8358  process_property_id(
8359  force_move(session_life_keeper),
8360  force_move(buf),
8361  rest,
8362  force_move(props),
8363  force_move(handler),
8364  force_move(self)
8365  );
8366  },
8367  force_move(self)
8368  );
8369  } break;
8370  case v5::property::id::response_information: {
8371  process_string(
8372  force_move(session_life_keeper),
8373  force_move(buf),
8374  [
8375  this,
8376  props = force_move(props),
8377  handler = force_move(handler),
8378  property_length_rest
8379  ]
8380  (buffer body, buffer buf, any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp self) mutable {
8381  auto rest = property_length_rest - length_bytes - body.size();
8382  props.emplace_back(
8383  v5::property::response_information(force_move(body), true)
8384  );
8385  process_property_id(
8386  force_move(session_life_keeper),
8387  force_move(buf),
8388  rest,
8389  force_move(props),
8390  force_move(handler),
8391  force_move(self)
8392  );
8393  },
8394  force_move(self)
8395  );
8396  } break;
8397  case v5::property::id::server_reference: {
8398  process_string(
8399  force_move(session_life_keeper),
8400  force_move(buf),
8401  [
8402  this,
8403  props = force_move(props),
8404  handler = force_move(handler),
8405  property_length_rest
8406  ]
8407  (buffer body, buffer buf, any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp self) mutable {
8408  auto rest = property_length_rest - length_bytes - body.size();
8409  props.emplace_back(
8410  v5::property::server_reference(force_move(body), true)
8411  );
8412  process_property_id(
8413  force_move(session_life_keeper),
8414  force_move(buf),
8415  rest,
8416  force_move(props),
8417  force_move(handler),
8418  force_move(self)
8419  );
8420  },
8421  force_move(self)
8422  );
8423  } break;
8424  case v5::property::id::reason_string: {
8425  process_string(
8426  force_move(session_life_keeper),
8427  force_move(buf),
8428  [
8429  this,
8430  props = force_move(props),
8431  handler = force_move(handler),
8432  property_length_rest
8433  ]
8434  (buffer body, buffer buf, any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp self) mutable {
8435  auto rest = property_length_rest - length_bytes - body.size();
8436  props.emplace_back(
8437  v5::property::reason_string(force_move(body), true)
8438  );
8439  process_property_id(
8440  force_move(session_life_keeper),
8441  force_move(buf),
8442  rest,
8443  force_move(props),
8444  force_move(handler),
8445  force_move(self)
8446  );
8447  },
8448  force_move(self)
8449  );
8450  } break;
8451  case v5::property::id::receive_maximum: {
8452  static constexpr std::size_t len = 2;
8453  if (property_length_rest < len) {
8454  call_message_size_error_handlers();
8455  return;
8456  }
8457  process_nbytes(
8458  force_move(session_life_keeper),
8459  force_move(buf),
8460  len,
8461  [
8462  this,
8463  props = force_move(props),
8464  handler = force_move(handler),
8465  rest = property_length_rest - len
8466  ]
8467  (buffer body, buffer buf, any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp self) mutable {
8468  props.emplace_back(
8469  v5::property::receive_maximum(body.begin(), body.end())
8470  );
8471  process_property_id(
8472  force_move(session_life_keeper),
8473  force_move(buf),
8474  rest,
8475  force_move(props),
8476  force_move(handler),
8477  force_move(self)
8478  );
8479  },
8480  force_move(self)
8481  );
8482  } break;
8483  case v5::property::id::topic_alias_maximum: {
8484  static constexpr std::size_t len = 2;
8485  if (property_length_rest < len) {
8486  call_message_size_error_handlers();
8487  return;
8488  }
8489  process_nbytes(
8490  force_move(session_life_keeper),
8491  force_move(buf),
8492  len,
8493  [
8494  this,
8495  props = force_move(props),
8496  handler = force_move(handler),
8497  rest = property_length_rest - len
8498  ]
8499  (buffer body, buffer buf, any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp self) mutable {
8500  props.emplace_back(
8501  v5::property::topic_alias_maximum(body.begin(), body.end())
8502  );
8503  process_property_id(
8504  force_move(session_life_keeper),
8505  force_move(buf),
8506  rest,
8507  force_move(props),
8508  force_move(handler),
8509  force_move(self)
8510  );
8511  },
8512  force_move(self)
8513  );
8514  } break;
8515  case v5::property::id::topic_alias: {
8516  static constexpr std::size_t len = 2;
8517  if (property_length_rest < len) {
8518  call_message_size_error_handlers();
8519  return;
8520  }
8521  process_nbytes(
8522  force_move(session_life_keeper),
8523  force_move(buf),
8524  len,
8525  [
8526  this,
8527  props = force_move(props),
8528  handler = force_move(handler),
8529  rest = property_length_rest - len
8530  ]
8531  (buffer body, buffer buf, any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp self) mutable {
8532  props.emplace_back(
8533  v5::property::topic_alias(body.begin(), body.end())
8534  );
8535  process_property_id(
8536  force_move(session_life_keeper),
8537  force_move(buf),
8538  rest,
8539  force_move(props),
8540  force_move(handler),
8541  force_move(self)
8542  );
8543  },
8544  force_move(self)
8545  );
8546  } break;
8547  case v5::property::id::maximum_qos: {
8548  static constexpr std::size_t len = 1;
8549  if (property_length_rest < len) {
8550  call_message_size_error_handlers();
8551  return;
8552  }
8553  process_nbytes(
8554  force_move(session_life_keeper),
8555  force_move(buf),
8556  len,
8557  [
8558  this,
8559  props = force_move(props),
8560  handler = force_move(handler),
8561  rest = property_length_rest - len
8562  ]
8563  (buffer body, buffer buf, any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp self) mutable {
8564  props.emplace_back(
8565  v5::property::maximum_qos(body.begin(), body.end())
8566  );
8567  process_property_id(
8568  force_move(session_life_keeper),
8569  force_move(buf),
8570  rest,
8571  force_move(props),
8572  force_move(handler),
8573  force_move(self)
8574  );
8575  },
8576  force_move(self)
8577  );
8578  } break;
8579  case v5::property::id::retain_available: {
8580  static constexpr std::size_t len = 1;
8581  if (property_length_rest < len) {
8582  call_message_size_error_handlers();
8583  return;
8584  }
8585  process_nbytes(
8586  force_move(session_life_keeper),
8587  force_move(buf),
8588  len,
8589  [
8590  this,
8591  props = force_move(props),
8592  handler = force_move(handler),
8593  rest = property_length_rest - len
8594  ]
8595  (buffer body, buffer buf, any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp self) mutable {
8596  props.emplace_back(
8597  v5::property::retain_available(body.begin(), body.end())
8598  );
8599  process_property_id(
8600  force_move(session_life_keeper),
8601  force_move(buf),
8602  rest,
8603  force_move(props),
8604  force_move(handler),
8605  force_move(self)
8606  );
8607  },
8608  force_move(self)
8609  );
8610  } break;
8611  case v5::property::id::user_property: {
8612  process_string(
8613  force_move(session_life_keeper),
8614  force_move(buf),
8615  [
8616  this,
8617  props = force_move(props),
8618  handler = force_move(handler),
8619  property_length_rest
8620  ]
8621  (buffer key, buffer buf, any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp self) mutable {
8622  auto rest = property_length_rest - length_bytes - key.size();
8623  process_string(
8624  force_move(session_life_keeper),
8625  force_move(buf),
8626  [
8627  this,
8628  props = force_move(props),
8629  handler = force_move(handler),
8630  key = force_move(key),
8631  property_length_rest = rest
8632  ]
8633  (buffer val, buffer buf, any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp self) mutable {
8634  auto rest = property_length_rest - length_bytes - val.size();
8635  props.emplace_back(
8636  v5::property::user_property(
8637  force_move(key),
8638  force_move(val),
8639  true,
8640  true
8641  )
8642  );
8643  process_property_id(
8644  force_move(session_life_keeper),
8645  force_move(buf),
8646  rest,
8647  force_move(props),
8648  force_move(handler),
8649  force_move(self)
8650  );
8651  },
8652  force_move(self)
8653  );
8654  },
8655  force_move(self)
8656  );
8657  } break;
8658  case v5::property::id::maximum_packet_size: {
8659  static constexpr std::size_t len = 4;
8660  if (property_length_rest < len) {
8661  call_message_size_error_handlers();
8662  return;
8663  }
8664  process_nbytes(
8665  force_move(session_life_keeper),
8666  force_move(buf),
8667  len,
8668  [
8669  this,
8670  props = force_move(props),
8671  handler = force_move(handler),
8672  rest = property_length_rest - len
8673  ]
8674  (buffer body, buffer buf, any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp self) mutable {
8675  props.emplace_back(
8676  v5::property::maximum_packet_size(body.begin(), body.end())
8677  );
8678  process_property_id(
8679  force_move(session_life_keeper),
8680  force_move(buf),
8681  rest,
8682  force_move(props),
8683  force_move(handler),
8684  force_move(self)
8685  );
8686  },
8687  force_move(self)
8688  );
8689  } break;
8690  case v5::property::id::wildcard_subscription_available: {
8691  static constexpr std::size_t len = 1;
8692  if (property_length_rest < len) {
8693  call_message_size_error_handlers();
8694  return;
8695  }
8696  process_nbytes(
8697  force_move(session_life_keeper),
8698  force_move(buf),
8699  len,
8700  [
8701  this,
8702  props = force_move(props),
8703  handler = force_move(handler),
8704  rest = property_length_rest - len
8705  ]
8706  (buffer body, buffer buf, any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp self) mutable {
8707  props.emplace_back(
8708  v5::property::wildcard_subscription_available(body.begin(), body.end())
8709  );
8710  process_property_id(
8711  force_move(session_life_keeper),
8712  force_move(buf),
8713  rest,
8714  force_move(props),
8715  force_move(handler),
8716  force_move(self)
8717  );
8718  },
8719  force_move(self)
8720  );
8721  } break;
8722  case v5::property::id::subscription_identifier_available: {
8723  static constexpr std::size_t len = 1;
8724  if (property_length_rest < len) {
8725  call_message_size_error_handlers();
8726  return;
8727  }
8728  process_nbytes(
8729  force_move(session_life_keeper),
8730  force_move(buf),
8731  len,
8732  [
8733  this,
8734  props = force_move(props),
8735  handler = force_move(handler),
8736  rest = property_length_rest - len
8737  ]
8738  (buffer body, buffer buf, any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp self) mutable {
8739  props.emplace_back(
8740  v5::property::subscription_identifier_available(body.begin(), body.end())
8741  );
8742  process_property_id(
8743  force_move(session_life_keeper),
8744  force_move(buf),
8745  rest,
8746  force_move(props),
8747  force_move(handler),
8748  force_move(self)
8749  );
8750  },
8751  force_move(self)
8752  );
8753  } break;
8754  case v5::property::id::shared_subscription_available: {
8755  static constexpr std::size_t len = 1;
8756  if (property_length_rest < len) {
8757  call_message_size_error_handlers();
8758  return;
8759  }
8760  process_nbytes(
8761  force_move(session_life_keeper),
8762  force_move(buf),
8763  len,
8764  [
8765  this,
8766  props = force_move(props),
8767  handler = force_move(handler),
8768  rest = property_length_rest - len
8769  ]
8770  (buffer body, buffer buf, any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp self) mutable {
8771  props.emplace_back(
8772  v5::property::shared_subscription_available(body.begin(), body.end())
8773  );
8774  process_property_id(
8775  force_move(session_life_keeper),
8776  force_move(buf),
8777  rest,
8778  force_move(props),
8779  force_move(handler),
8780  force_move(self)
8781  );
8782  },
8783  force_move(self)
8784  );
8785  } break;
8786  }
8787  }
8788 
8789  // process common
8790 
8791  template <typename InfoType,
8792  void (this_type::*NextFunc)(any, buffer, InfoType&&, this_type_sp)>
8793  void process_header(
8794  any session_life_keeper,
8795  bool all_read,
8796  std::size_t header_len,
8797  InfoType&& info,
8798  this_type_sp self
8799  ) {
8800 
8801  if (all_read) {
8802  auto spa = make_shared_ptr_array(remaining_length_);
8803  auto ptr = spa.get();
8804  socket_->async_read(
8805  as::buffer(ptr, remaining_length_),
8806  [
8807  this,
8808  session_life_keeper = force_move(session_life_keeper),
8809  buf = buffer(string_view(ptr, remaining_length_), force_move(spa)),
8810  info = std::forward<InfoType>(info),
8811  self = force_move(self)
8812  ]
8813  (boost::system::error_code const& ec, std::size_t bytes_transferred) mutable {
8814  if (!check_error_and_transferred_length(ec, bytes_transferred, remaining_length_)) return;
8815  (this->*NextFunc)(
8816  force_move(session_life_keeper),
8817  force_move(buf),
8818  force_move(info),
8819  force_move(self)
8820  );
8821  }
8822  );
8823  return;
8824  }
8825 
8826  if (header_len == 0) {
8827  (this->*NextFunc)(
8828  force_move(session_life_keeper),
8829  buffer(),
8830  force_move(info),
8831  force_move(self)
8832  );
8833  return;
8834  }
8835 
8836  socket_->async_read(
8837  as::buffer(buf_.data(), header_len),
8838  [
8839  this,
8840  session_life_keeper = force_move(session_life_keeper),
8841  header_len,
8842  info = std::forward<InfoType>(info),
8843  self = force_move(self)
8844  ]
8845  (boost::system::error_code const& ec,
8846  std::size_t bytes_transferred) mutable {
8847  if (!check_error_and_transferred_length(ec, bytes_transferred, header_len)) return;
8848  (this->*NextFunc)(
8849  force_move(session_life_keeper),
8850  buffer(string_view(buf_.data(), header_len)),
8851  force_move(info),
8852  force_move(self)
8853  );
8854  }
8855  );
8856  }
8857 
8858  // process connect
8859 
8860  enum class connect_phase {
8861  header,
8862  properties,
8863  client_id,
8864  will,
8865  user_name,
8866  password,
8867  finish,
8868  };
8869 
8870  struct connect_info {
8871  std::size_t header_len;
8872  char connect_flag;
8873  std::uint16_t keep_alive;
8874  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props;
8875  buffer client_id;
8876  std::vector<v5::property_variant> will_props;
8877  buffer will_topic;
8878  buffer will_payload;
8879  optional<buffer> user_name;
8880  optional<buffer> password;
8881  };
8882 
8883  void process_connect(
8884  any session_life_keeper,
8885  bool all_read,
8886  this_type_sp self
8887  ) {
8888  static constexpr std::size_t header_len =
8889  2 + // string length
8890  4 + // "MQTT" string
8891  1 + // ProtocolVersion
8892  1 + // ConnectFlag
8893  2; // KeepAlive
8894 
8895  if (remaining_length_ < header_len) {
8896  call_protocol_error_handlers();
8897  return;
8898  }
8899 
8900  connect_info info;
8901  info.header_len = header_len;
8902 
8903  process_header<connect_info,
8904  &this_type::process_connect_impl<connect_phase::header>>(
8905  force_move(session_life_keeper),
8906  all_read,
8907  header_len,
8908  force_move(info),
8909  force_move(self)
8910  );
8911  }
8912 
8913  template<connect_phase Phase>
8914  void process_connect_impl(
8915  any session_life_keeper,
8916  buffer buf,
8917  connect_info&& info,
8918  this_type_sp self
8919  ) {
8920  switch (Phase) {
8921  case connect_phase::header: {
8922  static constexpr char protocol_name[] = { 0x00, 0x04, 'M', 'Q', 'T', 'T' };
8923  if (std::memcmp(buf.data(), protocol_name, sizeof(protocol_name)) != 0) {
8924  call_protocol_error_handlers();
8925  return;
8926  }
8927  std::size_t i = sizeof(protocol_name);
8928  auto version = static_cast<protocol_version>(buf[i++]);
8929  if (version != protocol_version::v3_1_1 && version != protocol_version::v5) {
8930  call_protocol_error_handlers();
8931  return;
8932  }
8933 
8934  if (version_ == protocol_version::undetermined) {
8935  version_ = version;
8936  }
8937  else if (version_ != version) {
8938  call_protocol_error_handlers();
8939  return;
8940  }
8941 
8942  info.connect_flag = buf[i++];
8943 
8944  info.keep_alive = make_uint16_t(buf[i], buf[i + 1]);
8945  clean_session_ = connect_flags::has_clean_session(info.connect_flag);
8946 
8947  buf.remove_prefix(info.header_len); // consume buffer
8948  if(version_ == protocol_version::v5) {
8949  process_connect_impl<connect_phase::properties>(
8950  force_move(session_life_keeper),
8951  force_move(buf),
8952  force_move(info),
8953  force_move(self)
8954  );
8955  }
8956  else {
8957  process_connect_impl<connect_phase::client_id>(
8958  force_move(session_life_keeper),
8959  force_move(buf),
8960  force_move(info),
8961  force_move(self)
8962  );
8963  }
8964  } break;
8965  case connect_phase::properties:
8966  process_properties(
8967  force_move(session_life_keeper),
8968  force_move(buf),
8969  [
8970  this,
8971  info = force_move(info)
8972  ]
8973  (
8974  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
8975  buffer buf,
8976  any session_life_keeper,
8977  this_type_sp self
8978  ) mutable {
8979  info.props = force_move(props);
8980  process_connect_impl<connect_phase::client_id>(
8981  force_move(session_life_keeper),
8982  force_move(buf),
8983  force_move(info),
8984  force_move(self)
8985  );
8986  },
8987  force_move(self)
8988  );
8989  break;
8990  case connect_phase::client_id:
8991  process_string(
8992  force_move(session_life_keeper),
8993  force_move(buf),
8994  [
8995  this,
8996  info = force_move(info)
8997  ]
8998  (buffer client_id, buffer buf, any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp self) mutable {
8999  info.client_id = force_move(client_id);
9000  auto connect_flag = info.connect_flag;
9001  if (connect_flags::has_will_flag(connect_flag)) {
9002  process_connect_impl<connect_phase::will>(
9003  force_move(session_life_keeper),
9004  force_move(buf),
9005  force_move(info),
9006  force_move(self)
9007  );
9008  }
9009  else if (connect_flags::has_user_name_flag(connect_flag)) {
9010  process_connect_impl<connect_phase::user_name>(
9011  force_move(session_life_keeper),
9012  force_move(buf),
9013  force_move(info),
9014  force_move(self)
9015  );
9016  }
9017  else if (connect_flags::has_password_flag(connect_flag)) {
9018  process_connect_impl<connect_phase::password>(
9019  force_move(session_life_keeper),
9020  force_move(buf),
9021  force_move(info),
9022  force_move(self)
9023  );
9024  }
9025  else {
9026  process_connect_impl<connect_phase::finish>(
9027  force_move(session_life_keeper),
9028  force_move(buf),
9029  force_move(info),
9030  force_move(self)
9031  );
9032  }
9033  },
9034  force_move(self)
9035  );
9036  break;
9037  case connect_phase::will: {
9038  // I use rvalue reference parameter to reduce move constructor calling.
9039  // This is a local lambda expression invoked from this function, so
9040  // I can control all callers.
9041  auto topic_message_proc =
9042  [this]
9043  (
9044  any&& session_life_keeper,
9045  buffer&& buf,
9046  connect_info&& info,
9047  this_type_sp&& self
9048  ) mutable {
9049  process_string(
9050  force_move(session_life_keeper),
9051  force_move(buf),
9052  [
9053  this,
9054  info = force_move(info)
9055  ]
9056  (buffer will_topic, buffer buf, any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp self) mutable {
9057  info.will_topic = force_move(will_topic);
9058  process_binary(
9059  force_move(session_life_keeper),
9060  force_move(buf),
9061  [
9062  this,
9063  info = force_move(info)
9064  ]
9065  (buffer will_payload, buffer buf, any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp self) mutable {
9066  info.will_payload = force_move(will_payload);
9067  if (connect_flags::has_user_name_flag(info.connect_flag)) {
9068  process_connect_impl<connect_phase::user_name>(
9069  force_move(session_life_keeper),
9070  force_move(buf),
9071  force_move(info),
9072  force_move(self)
9073  );
9074  }
9075  else if (connect_flags::has_password_flag(info.connect_flag)) {
9076  process_connect_impl<connect_phase::password>(
9077  force_move(session_life_keeper),
9078  force_move(buf),
9079  force_move(info),
9080  force_move(self)
9081  );
9082  }
9083  else {
9084  process_connect_impl<connect_phase::finish>(
9085  force_move(session_life_keeper),
9086  force_move(buf),
9087  force_move(info),
9088  force_move(self)
9089  );
9090  }
9091  },
9092  force_move(self)
9093  );
9094  },
9095  force_move(self)
9096  );
9097  };
9098 
9099  if (version_ == protocol_version::v5) {
9100  process_properties(
9101  force_move(session_life_keeper),
9102  force_move(buf),
9103  [
9104  info = force_move(info),
9105  topic_message_proc
9106  ]
9107  (
9108  std::vector<v5::property_variant> will_props,
9109  buffer buf,
9110  any session_life_keeper,
9111  this_type_sp self
9112  ) mutable {
9113  info.will_props = force_move(will_props);
9114  topic_message_proc(
9115  force_move(session_life_keeper),
9116  force_move(buf),
9117  force_move(info),
9118  force_move(self)
9119  );
9120  },
9121  force_move(self)
9122  );
9123  return;
9124  }
9125  topic_message_proc(
9126  force_move(session_life_keeper),
9127  force_move(buf),
9128  force_move(info),
9129  force_move(self)
9130  );
9131  } break;
9132  case connect_phase::user_name:
9133  process_string(
9134  force_move(session_life_keeper),
9135  force_move(buf),
9136  [
9137  this,
9138  info = force_move(info)
9139  ]
9140  (buffer user_name, buffer buf, any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp self) mutable {
9141  info.user_name = force_move(user_name);
9142  if (connect_flags::has_password_flag(info.connect_flag)) {
9143  process_connect_impl<connect_phase::password>(
9144  force_move(session_life_keeper),
9145  force_move(buf),
9146  force_move(info),
9147  force_move(self)
9148  );
9149  }
9150  else {
9151  process_connect_impl<connect_phase::finish>(
9152  force_move(session_life_keeper),
9153  force_move(buf),
9154  force_move(info),
9155  force_move(self)
9156  );
9157  }
9158  },
9159  force_move(self)
9160  );
9161  break;
9162  case connect_phase::password:
9163  process_binary(
9164  force_move(session_life_keeper),
9165  force_move(buf),
9166  [
9167  this,
9168  info = force_move(info)
9169  ]
9170  (buffer password, buffer buf, any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp self) mutable {
9171  info.password = force_move(password);
9172  process_connect_impl<connect_phase::finish>(
9173  force_move(session_life_keeper),
9174  force_move(buf),
9175  force_move(info),
9176  force_move(self)
9177  );
9178  },
9179  force_move(self)
9180  );
9181  break;
9182  case connect_phase::finish:
9183  mqtt_connected_ = true;
9184  switch (version_) {
9185  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
9186  if (on_connect(
9187  force_move(info.client_id),
9188  force_move(info.user_name),
9189  force_move(info.password),
9190  connect_flags::has_will_flag(info.connect_flag)
9191  ? optional<will>(
9192  will(
9193  force_move(info.will_topic),
9194  force_move(info.will_payload),
9195  connect_flags::has_will_retain(info.connect_flag),
9196  connect_flags::will_qos(info.connect_flag)
9197  )
9198  )
9199  : optional<will>(nullopt),
9200  clean_session_,
9201  info.keep_alive
9202  )
9203  ) {
9204  on_mqtt_message_processed(force_move(session_life_keeper));
9205  }
9206  break;
9207  case protocol_version::v5:
9208  if (on_v5_connect(
9209  force_move(info.client_id),
9210  force_move(info.user_name),
9211  force_move(info.password),
9212  connect_flags::has_will_flag(info.connect_flag)
9213  ? optional<will>(
9214  will(
9215  force_move(info.will_topic),
9216  force_move(info.will_payload),
9217  connect_flags::has_will_retain(info.connect_flag),
9218  connect_flags::will_qos(info.connect_flag),
9219  force_move(info.will_props)
9220  )
9221  )
9222  : optional<will>(nullopt),
9223  clean_session_,
9224  info.keep_alive,
9225  force_move(info.props)
9226  )
9227  ) {
9228  on_mqtt_message_processed(force_move(session_life_keeper));
9229  }
9230  break;
9231  default:
9232  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
9233  }
9234  break;
9235  }
9236  }
9237 
9238  // process connack
9239 
9240  enum class connack_phase {
9241  header,
9242  properties,
9243  finish,
9244  };
9245 
9246  struct connack_info {
9247  std::size_t header_len;
9248  bool session_present;
9249  variant<connect_return_code, v5::connect_reason_code> reason_code;
9250  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props;
9251  };
9252 
9253  void process_connack(
9254  any session_life_keeper,
9255  bool all_read,
9256  this_type_sp self
9257  ) {
9258  static constexpr std::size_t header_len =
9259  1 + // Connect Acknowledge Flags
9260  1; // Reason Code
9261 
9262  if (remaining_length_ < header_len) {
9263  call_protocol_error_handlers();
9264  return;
9265  }
9266 
9267  connack_info info;
9268  info.header_len = header_len;
9269 
9270  process_header<connack_info,
9271  &this_type::process_connack_impl<connack_phase::header>>(
9272  force_move(session_life_keeper),
9273  all_read,
9274  header_len,
9275  force_move(info),
9276  force_move(self)
9277  );
9278  }
9279 
9280  template<connack_phase Phase>
9281  void process_connack_impl(
9282  any session_life_keeper,
9283  buffer buf,
9284  connack_info&& info,
9285  this_type_sp self
9286  ) {
9287  switch (Phase) {
9288  case connack_phase::header:
9289  info.session_present = is_session_present(buf[0]);
9290  switch (version_) {
9291  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
9292  info.reason_code = static_cast<connect_return_code>(buf[1]);
9293  break;
9294  case protocol_version::v5:
9295  info.reason_code = static_cast<v5::connect_reason_code>(buf[1]);
9296  break;
9297  default:
9298  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
9299  }
9300 
9301  buf.remove_prefix(info.header_len); // consume buffer
9302  if (version_ == protocol_version::v5) {
9303  process_connack_impl<connack_phase::properties>(
9304  force_move(session_life_keeper),
9305  force_move(buf),
9306  force_move(info),
9307  force_move(self)
9308  );
9309  }
9310  else {
9311  process_connack_impl<connack_phase::finish>(
9312  force_move(session_life_keeper),
9313  force_move(buf),
9314  force_move(info),
9315  force_move(self)
9316  );
9317  }
9318  break;
9319  case connack_phase::properties:
9320  process_properties(
9321  force_move(session_life_keeper),
9322  force_move(buf),
9323  [
9324  this,
9325  info = force_move(info)
9326  ]
9327  (
9328  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
9329  buffer buf,
9330  any session_life_keeper,
9331  this_type_sp self
9332  ) mutable {
9333  info.props = force_move(props);
9334  process_connack_impl<connack_phase::finish>(
9335  force_move(session_life_keeper),
9336  force_move(buf),
9337  force_move(info),
9338  force_move(self)
9339  );
9340  },
9341  force_move(self)
9342  );
9343  break;
9344  case connack_phase::finish: {
9345  mqtt_connected_ = true;
9346  // I use rvalue reference parameter to reduce move constructor calling.
9347  // This is a local lambda expression invoked from this function, so
9348  // I can control all callers.
9349  auto connack_proc =
9350  [this]
9351  (
9352  any&& session_life_keeper,
9353  connack_info&& info
9354  ) mutable {
9355  switch (version_) {
9356  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
9357  if(on_connack(info.session_present,
9358  variant_get<connect_return_code>(info.reason_code))) {
9359  on_mqtt_message_processed(force_move(session_life_keeper));
9360  }
9361  break;
9362  case protocol_version::v5:
9363  if (on_v5_connack(info.session_present,
9364  variant_get<v5::connect_reason_code>(info.reason_code),
9365  force_move(info.props))) {
9366  on_mqtt_message_processed(force_move(session_life_keeper));
9367  }
9368  break;
9369  default:
9370  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
9371  }
9372  };
9373 
9374  // Note: boost:variant has no featue to query if the variant currently holds a specific type.
9375  // MQTT_CPP could create a type traits function to match the provided type to the index in
9376  // the boost::variant type list, but for now it does not appear to be needed.
9377  if ( ( (0 == variant_idx(info.reason_code))
9378  && (connect_return_code::accepted == variant_get<connect_return_code>(info.reason_code)))
9379  || ( (1 == variant_idx(info.reason_code))
9380  && (v5::connect_reason_code::success == variant_get<v5::connect_reason_code>(info.reason_code)))) {
9381  if (clean_session_) {
9382  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
9383  store_.clear();
9384  packet_id_.clear();
9385  }
9386  else {
9387  if (async_send_store_) {
9388  // Until all stored messages are written to internal send buffer,
9389  // disable further async reading of incoming packets..
9390  async_read_on_message_processed_ = false;
9391  auto async_connack_proc =
9392  [
9393  this,
9394  self = force_move(self),
9395  session_life_keeper = force_move(session_life_keeper),
9396  connack_proc = force_move(connack_proc),
9397  info = force_move(info)
9398  ]
9399  () mutable {
9400  // All stored messages are sent, so re-enable reading of incoming packets.
9401  // and notify the end user code that the connack packet was received.
9402  async_read_on_message_processed_ = true;
9403  connack_proc(force_move(session_life_keeper), force_move(info));
9404  };
9405  async_send_store(force_move(async_connack_proc));
9406  return;
9407  }
9408  send_store();
9409  }
9410  }
9411  connack_proc(force_move(session_life_keeper), force_move(info));
9412  } break;
9413  }
9414  }
9415 
9416  // process publish
9417 
9418  enum class publish_phase {
9419  topic_name,
9420  packet_id,
9421  properties,
9422  payload,
9423  };
9424 
9425  struct publish_info {
9426  buffer topic_name;
9427  optional<packet_id_t> packet_id;
9428  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props;
9429  };
9430 
9431  void process_publish(
9432  any session_life_keeper,
9433  bool all_read,
9434  this_type_sp self
9435  ) {
9436  static constexpr std::size_t min_len =
9437  2; // topic name length
9438 
9439  if (remaining_length_ < min_len) {
9440  call_protocol_error_handlers();
9441  return;
9442  }
9443 
9444  process_header<publish_info,
9445  &this_type::process_publish_impl<publish_phase::topic_name>>(
9446  force_move(session_life_keeper),
9447  all_read,
9448  0,
9449  publish_info(),
9450  force_move(self)
9451  );
9452  }
9453 
9454  template<publish_phase Phase>
9455  void process_publish_impl(
9456  any session_life_keeper,
9457  buffer buf,
9458  publish_info&& info,
9459  this_type_sp self
9460  ) {
9461  switch (Phase) {
9462  case publish_phase::topic_name:
9463  process_string(
9464  force_move(session_life_keeper),
9465  force_move(buf),
9466  [
9467  this,
9468  info = force_move(info)
9469  ]
9470  (buffer topic_name, buffer buf, any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp self) mutable {
9471  info.topic_name = force_move(topic_name);
9472  qos qos_value = publish::get_qos(fixed_header_);
9473  if (qos_value != qos::at_most_once &&
9474  qos_value != qos::at_least_once &&
9475  qos_value != qos::exactly_once) {
9476  call_protocol_error_handlers();
9477  return;
9478  }
9479  if(qos_value == qos::at_most_once) {
9480  if(version_ == protocol_version::v5) {
9481  process_publish_impl<publish_phase::properties>(
9482  force_move(session_life_keeper),
9483  force_move(buf),
9484  force_move(info),
9485  force_move(self)
9486  );
9487  }
9488  else {
9489  process_publish_impl<publish_phase::payload>(
9490  force_move(session_life_keeper),
9491  force_move(buf),
9492  force_move(info),
9493  force_move(self)
9494  );
9495  }
9496  }
9497  else {
9498  process_publish_impl<publish_phase::packet_id>(
9499  force_move(session_life_keeper),
9500  force_move(buf),
9501  force_move(info),
9502  force_move(self)
9503  );
9504  }
9505  },
9506  force_move(self)
9507  );
9508  break;
9509  case publish_phase::packet_id:
9510  process_packet_id(
9511  force_move(session_life_keeper),
9512  force_move(buf),
9513  [
9514  this,
9515  info = force_move(info)
9516  ]
9517  (packet_id_t packet_id, buffer buf, any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp self) mutable {
9518  info.packet_id = packet_id;
9519  if (version_ == protocol_version::v5) {
9520  process_publish_impl<publish_phase::properties>(
9521  force_move(session_life_keeper),
9522  force_move(buf),
9523  force_move(info),
9524  force_move(self)
9525  );
9526  }
9527  else {
9528  process_publish_impl<publish_phase::payload>(
9529  force_move(session_life_keeper),
9530  force_move(buf),
9531  force_move(info),
9532  force_move(self)
9533  );
9534  }
9535  },
9536  force_move(self)
9537  );
9538  break;
9539  case publish_phase::properties:
9540  process_properties(
9541  force_move(session_life_keeper),
9542  force_move(buf),
9543  [
9544  this,
9545  info = force_move(info)
9546  ]
9547  (std::vector<v5::property_variant> props, buffer buf, any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp self) mutable {
9548  info.props = force_move(props);
9549  process_publish_impl<publish_phase::payload>(
9550  force_move(session_life_keeper),
9551  force_move(buf),
9552  force_move(info),
9553  force_move(self)
9554  );
9555  },
9556  force_move(self)
9557  );
9558  break;
9559  case publish_phase::payload:
9560  process_nbytes(
9561  force_move(session_life_keeper),
9562  force_move(buf),
9563  remaining_length_,
9564  [
9565  this,
9566  info = force_move(info)
9567  ]
9568  (buffer payload, buffer /*buf*/, any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp /*self*/) mutable {
9569  auto handler_call =
9570  [&] {
9571  switch (version_) {
9572  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
9573  if (on_publish(
9574  publish::is_dup(fixed_header_),
9575  publish::get_qos(fixed_header_),
9576  publish::is_retain(fixed_header_),
9577  info.packet_id,
9578  force_move(info.topic_name),
9579  force_move(payload))) {
9580  on_mqtt_message_processed(force_move(session_life_keeper));
9581  return true;
9582  }
9583  break;
9584  case protocol_version::v5:
9585  if (on_v5_publish(
9586  publish::is_dup(fixed_header_),
9587  publish::get_qos(fixed_header_),
9588  publish::is_retain(fixed_header_),
9589  info.packet_id,
9590  force_move(info.topic_name),
9591  force_move(payload),
9592  force_move(info.props)
9593  )
9594  ) {
9595  on_mqtt_message_processed(force_move(session_life_keeper));
9596  return true;
9597  }
9598  break;
9599  default:
9600  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
9601  }
9602  return false;
9603  };
9604  switch (publish::get_qos(fixed_header_)) {
9605  case qos::at_most_once:
9606  handler_call();
9607  break;
9608  case qos::at_least_once:
9609  if (handler_call()) {
9610  auto_pub_response(
9611  [this, &info] {
9612  if (connected_) {
9613  send_puback(*info.packet_id);
9614  }
9615  },
9616  [this, &info, &session_life_keeper] {
9617  if (connected_) {
9618  async_send_puback(
9619  *info.packet_id,
9620  v5::puback_reason_code::success,
9621  std::vector<v5::property_variant>{},
9622  [session_life_keeper](auto){}
9623  );
9624  }
9625  }
9626  );
9627  }
9628  break;
9629  case qos::exactly_once:
9630  if (handler_call()) {
9631  qos2_publish_handled_.emplace(*info.packet_id);
9632  auto_pub_response(
9633  [this, &info] {
9634  if (connected_) {
9635  send_pubrec(*info.packet_id);
9636  }
9637  },
9638  [this, &info, &session_life_keeper] {
9639  if (connected_) {
9640  async_send_pubrec(
9641  *info.packet_id,
9642  v5::pubrec_reason_code::success,
9643  std::vector<v5::property_variant>{},
9644  [session_life_keeper](auto){}
9645  );
9646  }
9647  }
9648  );
9649  }
9650  break;
9651  }
9652  },
9653  force_move(self)
9654  );
9655  break;
9656  }
9657  }
9658 
9659  // process puback
9660 
9661  enum class puback_phase {
9662  packet_id,
9663  reason_code,
9664  properties,
9665  finish,
9666  };
9667 
9668  struct puback_info {
9669  packet_id_t packet_id;
9670  v5::puback_reason_code reason_code;
9671  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props;
9672  };
9673 
9674  void process_puback(
9675  any session_life_keeper,
9676  bool all_read,
9677  this_type_sp self
9678  ) {
9679  static constexpr std::size_t header_len =
9680  sizeof(packet_id_t); // Packet Id
9681 
9682  if (remaining_length_ < header_len) {
9683  call_protocol_error_handlers();
9684  return;
9685  }
9686 
9687  process_header<puback_info,
9688  &this_type::process_puback_impl<puback_phase::packet_id>>(
9689  force_move(session_life_keeper),
9690  all_read,
9691  header_len,
9692  puback_info(),
9693  force_move(self)
9694  );
9695  }
9696 
9697  template<puback_phase Phase>
9698  void process_puback_impl(
9699  any session_life_keeper,
9700  buffer buf,
9701  puback_info&& info,
9702  this_type_sp self
9703  ) {
9704  switch (Phase) {
9705  case puback_phase::packet_id:
9706  process_packet_id(
9707  force_move(session_life_keeper),
9708  force_move(buf),
9709  [
9710  this,
9711  info = force_move(info)
9712  ]
9713  (packet_id_t packet_id, buffer buf, any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp self) mutable {
9714  info.packet_id = packet_id;
9715  if (remaining_length_ == 0) {
9716  info.reason_code = v5::puback_reason_code::success;
9717  process_puback_impl<puback_phase::finish>(
9718  force_move(session_life_keeper),
9719  force_move(buf),
9720  force_move(info),
9721  force_move(self)
9722  );
9723  }
9724  else {
9725  process_puback_impl<puback_phase::reason_code>(
9726  force_move(session_life_keeper),
9727  force_move(buf),
9728  force_move(info),
9729  force_move(self)
9730  );
9731  }
9732  },
9733  force_move(self)
9734  );
9735  break;
9736  case puback_phase::reason_code:
9737  process_nbytes(
9738  force_move(session_life_keeper),
9739  force_move(buf),
9740  1, // reason_code
9741  [
9742  this,
9743  info = force_move(info)
9744  ]
9745  (buffer body, buffer buf, any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp self) mutable {
9746  info.reason_code = static_cast<v5::puback_reason_code>(body[0]);
9747  process_puback_impl<puback_phase::properties>(
9748  force_move(session_life_keeper),
9749  force_move(buf),
9750  force_move(info),
9751  force_move(self)
9752  );
9753  },
9754  force_move(self)
9755  );
9756  break;
9757  case puback_phase::properties:
9758  process_properties(
9759  force_move(session_life_keeper),
9760  force_move(buf),
9761  [
9762  this,
9763  info = force_move(info)
9764  ]
9765  (std::vector<v5::property_variant> props, buffer buf, any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp self) mutable {
9766  info.props = force_move(props);
9767  process_puback_impl<puback_phase::finish>(
9768  force_move(session_life_keeper),
9769  force_move(buf),
9770  force_move(info),
9771  force_move(self)
9772  );
9773  },
9774  force_move(self)
9775  );
9776  break;
9777  case puback_phase::finish:
9778  {
9779  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
9780  auto& idx = store_.template get<tag_packet_id_type>();
9781  auto r = idx.equal_range(std::make_tuple(info.packet_id, control_packet_type::puback));
9782  idx.erase(std::get<0>(r), std::get<1>(r));
9783  packet_id_.erase(info.packet_id);
9784  }
9785  on_serialize_remove(info.packet_id);
9786  switch (version_) {
9787  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
9788  if (on_puback(info.packet_id)) {
9789  on_mqtt_message_processed(force_move(session_life_keeper));
9790  }
9791  break;
9792  case protocol_version::v5:
9793  if (on_v5_puback(info.packet_id, info.reason_code, force_move(info.props))) {
9794  on_mqtt_message_processed(force_move(session_life_keeper));
9795  }
9796  break;
9797  default:
9798  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
9799  }
9800  break;
9801  }
9802  }
9803 
9804  // process pubrec
9805 
9806  enum class pubrec_phase {
9807  packet_id,
9808  reason_code,
9809  properties,
9810  finish,
9811  };
9812 
9813  struct pubrec_info {
9814  packet_id_t packet_id;
9815  v5::pubrec_reason_code reason_code;
9816  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props;
9817  };
9818 
9819  void process_pubrec(
9820  any session_life_keeper,
9821  bool all_read,
9822  this_type_sp self
9823  ) {
9824  static constexpr std::size_t header_len =
9825  sizeof(packet_id_t); // Packet Id
9826 
9827  if (remaining_length_ < header_len) {
9828  call_protocol_error_handlers();
9829  return;
9830  }
9831 
9832  process_header<pubrec_info,
9833  &this_type::process_pubrec_impl<pubrec_phase::packet_id>>(
9834  force_move(session_life_keeper),
9835  all_read,
9836  header_len,
9837  pubrec_info(),
9838  force_move(self)
9839  );
9840  }
9841 
9842  template<pubrec_phase Phase>
9843  void process_pubrec_impl(
9844  any session_life_keeper,
9845  buffer buf,
9846  pubrec_info&& info,
9847  this_type_sp self
9848  ) {
9849  switch (Phase) {
9850  case pubrec_phase::packet_id:
9851  process_packet_id(
9852  force_move(session_life_keeper),
9853  force_move(buf),
9854  [
9855  this,
9856  info = force_move(info)
9857  ]
9858  (packet_id_t packet_id, buffer buf, any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp self) mutable {
9859  info.packet_id = packet_id;
9860  if(remaining_length_ == 0) {
9861  info.reason_code = v5::pubrec_reason_code::success;
9862  process_pubrec_impl<pubrec_phase::finish>(
9863  force_move(session_life_keeper),
9864  force_move(buf),
9865  force_move(info),
9866  force_move(self)
9867  );
9868  }
9869  else {
9870  process_pubrec_impl<pubrec_phase::reason_code>(
9871  force_move(session_life_keeper),
9872  force_move(buf),
9873  force_move(info),
9874  force_move(self)
9875  );
9876  }
9877  },
9878  force_move(self)
9879  );
9880  break;
9881  case pubrec_phase::reason_code:
9882  process_nbytes(
9883  force_move(session_life_keeper),
9884  force_move(buf),
9885  1, // reason_code
9886  [
9887  this,
9888  info = force_move(info)
9889  ]
9890  (buffer body, buffer buf, any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp self) mutable {
9891  info.reason_code = static_cast<v5::pubrec_reason_code>(body[0]);
9892  process_pubrec_impl<pubrec_phase::properties>(
9893  force_move(session_life_keeper),
9894  force_move(buf),
9895  force_move(info),
9896  force_move(self)
9897  );
9898  },
9899  force_move(self)
9900  );
9901  break;
9902  case pubrec_phase::properties:
9903  process_properties(
9904  force_move(session_life_keeper),
9905  force_move(buf),
9906  [
9907  this,
9908  info = force_move(info)
9909  ]
9910  (std::vector<v5::property_variant> props, buffer buf, any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp self) mutable {
9911  info.props = force_move(props);
9912  process_pubrec_impl<pubrec_phase::finish>(
9913  force_move(session_life_keeper),
9914  force_move(buf),
9915  force_move(info),
9916  force_move(self)
9917  );
9918  },
9919  force_move(self)
9920  );
9921  break;
9922  case pubrec_phase::finish: {
9923  {
9924  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
9925  auto& idx = store_.template get<tag_packet_id_type>();
9926  auto r = idx.equal_range(std::make_tuple(info.packet_id, control_packet_type::pubrec));
9927  idx.erase(std::get<0>(r), std::get<1>(r));
9928  // packet_id shouldn't be erased here.
9929  // It is reused for pubrel/pubcomp.
9930  }
9931  auto res =
9932  [&] {
9933  auto_pub_response(
9934  [&] {
9935  if (connected_) {
9936  send_pubrel(info.packet_id);
9937  }
9938  else {
9939  store_pubrel(info.packet_id);
9940  }
9941  },
9942  [&] {
9943  if (connected_) {
9944  async_send_pubrel(
9945  info.packet_id,
9946  v5::pubrel_reason_code::success,
9947  std::vector<v5::property_variant>{},
9948  [session_life_keeper](auto){}
9949  );
9950  }
9951  else {
9952  store_pubrel(info.packet_id);
9953  }
9954  }
9955  );
9956  };
9957  switch (version_) {
9958  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
9959  if (on_pubrec(info.packet_id)) {
9960  res();
9961  on_mqtt_message_processed(force_move(session_life_keeper));
9962  }
9963  break;
9964  case protocol_version::v5:
9965  if (on_v5_pubrec(info.packet_id, info.reason_code, force_move(info.props))) {
9966  res();
9967  on_mqtt_message_processed(force_move(session_life_keeper));
9968  }
9969  break;
9970  default:
9971  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
9972  }
9973  } break;
9974  }
9975  }
9976 
9977  // process pubrel
9978 
9979  enum class pubrel_phase {
9980  packet_id,
9981  reason_code,
9982  properties,
9983  finish,
9984  };
9985 
9986  struct pubrel_info {
9987  packet_id_t packet_id;
9988  v5::pubrel_reason_code reason_code;
9989  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props;
9990  };
9991 
9992  void process_pubrel(
9993  any session_life_keeper,
9994  bool all_read,
9995  this_type_sp self
9996  ) {
9997  static constexpr std::size_t header_len =
9998  sizeof(packet_id_t); // Packet Id
9999 
10000  if (remaining_length_ < header_len) {
10001  call_protocol_error_handlers();
10002  return;
10003  }
10004 
10005  process_header<pubrel_info,
10006  &this_type::process_pubrel_impl<pubrel_phase::packet_id>>(
10007  force_move(session_life_keeper),
10008  all_read,
10009  header_len,
10010  pubrel_info(),
10011  force_move(self)
10012  );
10013  }
10014 
10015  template<pubrel_phase Phase>
10016  void process_pubrel_impl(
10017  any session_life_keeper,
10018  buffer buf,
10019  pubrel_info&& info,
10020  this_type_sp self
10021  ) {
10022  switch (Phase) {
10023  case pubrel_phase::packet_id:
10024  process_packet_id(
10025  force_move(session_life_keeper),
10026  force_move(buf),
10027  [
10028  this,
10029  info = force_move(info)
10030  ]
10031  (packet_id_t packet_id, buffer buf, any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp self) mutable {
10032  info.packet_id = packet_id;
10033  if (remaining_length_ == 0) {
10034  info.reason_code = v5::pubrel_reason_code::success;
10035  process_pubrel_impl<pubrel_phase::finish>(
10036  force_move(session_life_keeper),
10037  force_move(buf),
10038  force_move(info),
10039  force_move(self)
10040  );
10041  }
10042  else {
10043  process_pubrel_impl<pubrel_phase::reason_code>(
10044  force_move(session_life_keeper),
10045  force_move(buf),
10046  force_move(info),
10047  force_move(self)
10048  );
10049  }
10050  },
10051  force_move(self)
10052  );
10053  break;
10054  case pubrel_phase::reason_code:
10055  process_nbytes(
10056  force_move(session_life_keeper),
10057  force_move(buf),
10058  1, // reason_code
10059  [
10060  this,
10061  info = force_move(info)
10062  ]
10063  (buffer body, buffer buf, any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp self) mutable {
10064  info.reason_code = static_cast<v5::pubrel_reason_code>(body[0]);
10065  process_pubrel_impl<pubrel_phase::properties>(
10066  force_move(session_life_keeper),
10067  force_move(buf),
10068  force_move(info),
10069  force_move(self)
10070  );
10071  },
10072  force_move(self)
10073  );
10074  break;
10075  case pubrel_phase::properties:
10076  process_properties(
10077  force_move(session_life_keeper),
10078  force_move(buf),
10079  [
10080  this,
10081  info = force_move(info)
10082  ]
10083  (std::vector<v5::property_variant> props, buffer buf, any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp self) mutable {
10084  info.props = force_move(props);
10085  process_pubrel_impl<pubrel_phase::finish>(
10086  force_move(session_life_keeper),
10087  force_move(buf),
10088  force_move(info),
10089  force_move(self)
10090  );
10091  },
10092  force_move(self)
10093  );
10094  break;
10095  case pubrel_phase::finish: {
10096  auto res =
10097  [&] {
10098  auto_pub_response(
10099  [&] {
10100  if (connected_) {
10101  send_pubcomp(info.packet_id);
10102  }
10103  },
10104  [&] {
10105  if (connected_) {
10106  async_send_pubcomp(
10107  info.packet_id,
10108  v5::pubcomp_reason_code::success,
10109  std::vector<v5::property_variant>{},
10110  [session_life_keeper](auto){}
10111  );
10112  }
10113  }
10114  );
10115  };
10116  qos2_publish_handled_.erase(info.packet_id);
10117  switch (version_) {
10118  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
10119  if (on_pubrel(info.packet_id)) {
10120  res();
10121  on_mqtt_message_processed(force_move(session_life_keeper));
10122  }
10123  break;
10124  case protocol_version::v5:
10125  if (on_v5_pubrel(info.packet_id, info.reason_code, force_move(info.props))) {
10126  res();
10127  on_mqtt_message_processed(force_move(session_life_keeper));
10128  }
10129  break;
10130  default:
10131  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
10132  }
10133  } break;
10134  }
10135  }
10136 
10137  // process pubcomp
10138 
10139  enum class pubcomp_phase {
10140  packet_id,
10141  reason_code,
10142  properties,
10143  finish,
10144  };
10145 
10146  struct pubcomp_info {
10147  packet_id_t packet_id;
10148  v5::pubcomp_reason_code reason_code;
10149  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props;
10150  };
10151 
10152  void process_pubcomp(
10153  any session_life_keeper,
10154  bool all_read,
10155  this_type_sp self
10156  ) {
10157  static constexpr std::size_t header_len =
10158  sizeof(packet_id_t); // Packet Id
10159 
10160  if (remaining_length_ < header_len) {
10161  call_protocol_error_handlers();
10162  return;
10163  }
10164 
10165  process_header<pubcomp_info,
10166  &this_type::process_pubcomp_impl<pubcomp_phase::packet_id>>(
10167  force_move(session_life_keeper),
10168  all_read,
10169  header_len,
10170  pubcomp_info(),
10171  force_move(self)
10172  );
10173  }
10174 
10175  template<pubcomp_phase Phase>
10176  void process_pubcomp_impl(
10177  any session_life_keeper,
10178  buffer buf,
10179  pubcomp_info&& info,
10180  this_type_sp self
10181  ) {
10182  switch (Phase) {
10183  case pubcomp_phase::packet_id:
10184  process_packet_id(
10185  force_move(session_life_keeper),
10186  force_move(buf),
10187  [
10188  this,
10189  info = force_move(info)
10190  ]
10191  (packet_id_t packet_id, buffer buf, any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp self) mutable {
10192  info.packet_id = packet_id;
10193  if (remaining_length_ == 0) {
10194  info.reason_code = v5::pubcomp_reason_code::success;
10195  process_pubcomp_impl<pubcomp_phase::finish>(
10196  force_move(session_life_keeper),
10197  force_move(buf),
10198  force_move(info),
10199  force_move(self)
10200  );
10201  }
10202  else {
10203  process_pubcomp_impl<pubcomp_phase::reason_code>(
10204  force_move(session_life_keeper),
10205  force_move(buf),
10206  force_move(info),
10207  force_move(self)
10208  );
10209  }
10210  },
10211  force_move(self)
10212  );
10213  break;
10214  case pubcomp_phase::reason_code:
10215  process_nbytes(
10216  force_move(session_life_keeper),
10217  force_move(buf),
10218  1, // reason_code
10219  [
10220  this,
10221  info = force_move(info)
10222  ]
10223  (buffer body, buffer buf, any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp self) mutable {
10224  info.reason_code = static_cast<v5::pubcomp_reason_code>(body[0]);
10225  process_pubcomp_impl<pubcomp_phase::properties>(
10226  force_move(session_life_keeper),
10227  force_move(buf),
10228  force_move(info),
10229  force_move(self)
10230  );
10231  },
10232  force_move(self)
10233  );
10234  break;
10235  case pubcomp_phase::properties:
10236  process_properties(
10237  force_move(session_life_keeper),
10238  force_move(buf),
10239  [
10240  this,
10241  info = force_move(info)
10242  ]
10243  (std::vector<v5::property_variant> props, buffer buf, any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp self) mutable {
10244  info.props = force_move(props);
10245  process_pubcomp_impl<pubcomp_phase::finish>(
10246  force_move(session_life_keeper),
10247  force_move(buf),
10248  force_move(info),
10249  force_move(self)
10250  );
10251  },
10252  force_move(self)
10253  );
10254  break;
10255  case pubcomp_phase::finish:
10256  {
10257  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
10258  auto& idx = store_.template get<tag_packet_id_type>();
10259  auto r = idx.equal_range(std::make_tuple(info.packet_id, control_packet_type::pubcomp));
10260  idx.erase(std::get<0>(r), std::get<1>(r));
10261  // packet_id shouldn't be erased here.
10262  // It is reused for pubrel/pubcomp.
10263  }
10264  on_serialize_remove(info.packet_id);
10265  switch (version_) {
10266  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
10267  if (on_pubcomp(info.packet_id)) {
10268  on_mqtt_message_processed(force_move(session_life_keeper));
10269  }
10270  break;
10271  case protocol_version::v5:
10272  if (on_v5_pubcomp(info.packet_id, info.reason_code, force_move(info.props))) {
10273  on_mqtt_message_processed(force_move(session_life_keeper));
10274  }
10275  break;
10276  default:
10277  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
10278  }
10279  break;
10280  }
10281  }
10282 
10283  // process subscribe
10284 
10285  enum class subscribe_phase {
10286  packet_id,
10287  properties,
10288  topic,
10289  finish,
10290  };
10291 
10292  struct subscribe_info {
10293  packet_id_t packet_id;
10294  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props;
10295  std::vector<std::tuple<buffer, subscribe_options>> entries;
10296  };
10297 
10298  void process_subscribe(
10299  any session_life_keeper,
10300  bool all_read,
10301  this_type_sp self
10302  ) {
10303  static constexpr std::size_t header_len =
10304  sizeof(packet_id_t); // Packet Id
10305 
10306  if (remaining_length_ < header_len) {
10307  call_protocol_error_handlers();
10308  return;
10309  }
10310 
10311  process_header<subscribe_info,
10312  &this_type::process_subscribe_impl<subscribe_phase::packet_id>>(
10313  force_move(session_life_keeper),
10314  all_read,
10315  header_len,
10316  subscribe_info(),
10317  force_move(self)
10318  );
10319  }
10320 
10321  template<subscribe_phase Phase>
10322  void process_subscribe_impl(
10323  any session_life_keeper,
10324  buffer buf,
10325  subscribe_info&& info,
10326  this_type_sp self
10327  ) {
10328  switch (Phase) {
10329  case subscribe_phase::packet_id:
10330  process_packet_id(
10331  force_move(session_life_keeper),
10332  force_move(buf),
10333  [
10334  this,
10335  info = force_move(info)
10336  ]
10337  (packet_id_t packet_id, buffer buf, any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp self) mutable {
10338  info.packet_id = packet_id;
10339  if (version_ == protocol_version::v5) {
10340  process_subscribe_impl<subscribe_phase::properties>(
10341  force_move(session_life_keeper),
10342  force_move(buf),
10343  force_move(info),
10344  force_move(self)
10345  );
10346  }
10347  else {
10348  process_subscribe_impl<subscribe_phase::topic>(
10349  force_move(session_life_keeper),
10350  force_move(buf),
10351  force_move(info),
10352  force_move(self)
10353  );
10354  }
10355  },
10356  force_move(self)
10357  );
10358  break;
10359  case subscribe_phase::properties:
10360  process_properties(
10361  force_move(session_life_keeper),
10362  force_move(buf),
10363  [
10364  this,
10365  info = force_move(info)
10366  ]
10367  (std::vector<v5::property_variant> props, buffer buf, any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp self) mutable {
10368  info.props = force_move(props);
10369  process_subscribe_impl<subscribe_phase::topic>(
10370  force_move(session_life_keeper),
10371  force_move(buf),
10372  force_move(info),
10373  force_move(self)
10374  );
10375  },
10376  force_move(self)
10377  );
10378  break;
10379  case subscribe_phase::topic:
10380  process_string(
10381  force_move(session_life_keeper),
10382  force_move(buf),
10383  [
10384  this,
10385  info = force_move(info)
10386  ]
10387  (buffer topic_filter, buffer buf, any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp self) mutable {
10388  process_nbytes(
10389  force_move(session_life_keeper),
10390  force_move(buf),
10391  1, // requested_qos
10392  [
10393  this,
10394  info = force_move(info),
10395  topic_filter = force_move(topic_filter)
10396  ]
10397  (buffer body, buffer buf, any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp self) mutable {
10398  subscribe_options option(static_cast<std::uint8_t>(body[0]));
10399  qos requested_qos = option.get_qos();
10400  if (requested_qos != qos::at_most_once &&
10401  requested_qos != qos::at_least_once &&
10402  requested_qos != qos::exactly_once) {
10403  call_protocol_error_handlers();
10404  return;
10405  }
10406  info.entries.emplace_back(force_move(topic_filter), option);
10407  if (remaining_length_ == 0) {
10408  process_subscribe_impl<subscribe_phase::finish>(
10409  force_move(session_life_keeper),
10410  force_move(buf),
10411  force_move(info),
10412  force_move(self)
10413  );
10414  }
10415  else {
10416  process_subscribe_impl<subscribe_phase::topic>(
10417  force_move(session_life_keeper),
10418  force_move(buf),
10419  force_move(info),
10420  force_move(self)
10421  );
10422  }
10423  },
10424  force_move(self)
10425  );
10426  },
10427  force_move(self)
10428  );
10429  break;
10430  case subscribe_phase::finish:
10431  switch (version_) {
10432  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
10433  if (on_subscribe(info.packet_id, force_move(info.entries))) {
10434  on_mqtt_message_processed(force_move(session_life_keeper));
10435  }
10436  break;
10437  case protocol_version::v5:
10438  if (on_v5_subscribe(info.packet_id, force_move(info.entries), force_move(info.props))) {
10439  on_mqtt_message_processed(force_move(session_life_keeper));
10440  }
10441  break;
10442  default:
10443  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
10444  }
10445  break;
10446  }
10447  }
10448 
10449  // process suback
10450 
10451  enum class suback_phase {
10452  packet_id,
10453  properties,
10454  reasons,
10455  };
10456 
10457  struct suback_info {
10458  packet_id_t packet_id;
10459  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props;
10460  };
10461 
10462  void process_suback(
10463  any session_life_keeper,
10464  bool all_read,
10465  this_type_sp self
10466  ) {
10467  static constexpr std::size_t header_len =
10468  sizeof(packet_id_t); // Packet Id
10469 
10470  if (remaining_length_ < header_len) {
10471  call_protocol_error_handlers();
10472  return;
10473  }
10474 
10475  process_header<suback_info,
10476  &this_type::process_suback_impl<suback_phase::packet_id>>(
10477  force_move(session_life_keeper),
10478  all_read,
10479  header_len,
10480  suback_info(),
10481  force_move(self)
10482  );
10483  }
10484 
10485  template<suback_phase Phase>
10486  void process_suback_impl(
10487  any session_life_keeper,
10488  buffer buf,
10489  suback_info&& info,
10490  this_type_sp self
10491  ) {
10492  switch (Phase) {
10493  case suback_phase::packet_id:
10494  process_packet_id(
10495  force_move(session_life_keeper),
10496  force_move(buf),
10497  [
10498  this,
10499  info = force_move(info)
10500  ]
10501  (packet_id_t packet_id, buffer buf, any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp self) mutable {
10502  info.packet_id = packet_id;
10503  if (version_ == protocol_version::v5) {
10504  process_suback_impl<suback_phase::properties>(
10505  force_move(session_life_keeper),
10506  force_move(buf),
10507  force_move(info),
10508  force_move(self)
10509  );
10510  }
10511  else {
10512  process_suback_impl<suback_phase::reasons>(
10513  force_move(session_life_keeper),
10514  force_move(buf),
10515  force_move(info),
10516  force_move(self)
10517  );
10518  }
10519  },
10520  force_move(self)
10521  );
10522  break;
10523  case suback_phase::properties:
10524  process_properties(
10525  force_move(session_life_keeper),
10526  force_move(buf),
10527  [
10528  this,
10529  info = force_move(info)
10530  ]
10531  (std::vector<v5::property_variant> props, buffer buf, any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp self) mutable {
10532  info.props = force_move(props);
10533  process_suback_impl<suback_phase::reasons>(
10534  force_move(session_life_keeper),
10535  force_move(buf),
10536  force_move(info),
10537  force_move(self)
10538  );
10539  },
10540  force_move(self)
10541  );
10542  break;
10543  case suback_phase::reasons:
10544  process_nbytes(
10545  force_move(session_life_keeper),
10546  force_move(buf),
10547  remaining_length_, // Reason Codes
10548  [
10549  this,
10550  info = force_move(info)
10551  ]
10552  (buffer body, buffer /*buf*/, any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp /*self*/) mutable {
10553  {
10554  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
10555  packet_id_.erase(info.packet_id);
10556  }
10557  switch (version_) {
10558  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
10559  {
10560  // TODO: We can avoid an allocation by casting the raw bytes of the
10561  // mqtt::buffer that is being parsed, and instead call the suback
10562  // handler with an std::span and the mqtt::buffer (as lifekeeper)
10563  std::vector<suback_return_code> results;
10564  results.resize(body.size());
10565  std::transform(
10566  body.begin(),
10567  body.end(),
10568  results.begin(),
10569  // http://docs.oasis-open.org/mqtt/mqtt/v3.1.1/errata01/os/mqtt-v3.1.1-errata01-os-complete.html#_Toc442180880
10570  // The SUBACK Packet sent by the Server to the Client MUST
10571  // contain a return code for each Topic Filter/QoS pair.
10572  // This return code MUST either show the maximum QoS that
10573  // was granted for that Subscription or indicate that the
10574  // subscription failed [MQTT-3.8.4-5].
10575  [&](auto const& e) -> suback_return_code {
10576  return static_cast<suback_return_code>(e);
10577  }
10578  );
10579  if (on_suback(info.packet_id, force_move(results))) {
10580  on_mqtt_message_processed(force_move(session_life_keeper));
10581  }
10582  break;
10583  }
10584  case protocol_version::v5:
10585  {
10586  // TODO: We can avoid an allocation by casting the raw bytes of the
10587  // mqtt::buffer that is being parsed, and instead call the suback
10588  // handler with an std::span and the mqtt::buffer (as lifekeeper)
10589  std::vector<v5::suback_reason_code> reasons;
10590  reasons.resize(body.size());
10591  std::transform(
10592  body.begin(),
10593  body.end(),
10594  reasons.begin(),
10595  // https://docs.oasis-open.org/mqtt/mqtt/v5.0/os/mqtt-v5.0-os.html#_Toc3901170
10596  // The SUBACK packet sent by the Server to the Client MUST
10597  // contain a Reason Code for each Topic Filter/Subscription
10598  // Option pair [MQTT-3.8.4-6].
10599  // This Reason Code MUST either show the maximum QoS that
10600  // was granted for that Subscription or indicate that the
10601  // subscription failed [MQTT-3.8.4-7].
10602  [&](auto const& e) {
10603  return static_cast<v5::suback_reason_code>(e);
10604  }
10605  );
10606  if (on_v5_suback(info.packet_id, force_move(reasons), force_move(info.props))) {
10607  on_mqtt_message_processed(force_move(session_life_keeper));
10608  }
10609  break;
10610  }
10611  default:
10612  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
10613  }
10614  },
10615  force_move(self)
10616  );
10617  break;
10618  }
10619  }
10620 
10621  // process unsubscribe
10622 
10623  enum class unsubscribe_phase {
10624  packet_id,
10625  properties,
10626  topic,
10627  finish,
10628  };
10629 
10630  struct unsubscribe_info {
10631  packet_id_t packet_id;
10632  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props;
10633  std::vector<buffer> entries;
10634  };
10635 
10636  void process_unsubscribe(
10637  any session_life_keeper,
10638  bool all_read,
10639  this_type_sp self
10640  ) {
10641  static constexpr std::size_t header_len =
10642  sizeof(packet_id_t); // Packet Id
10643 
10644  if (remaining_length_ < header_len) {
10645  call_protocol_error_handlers();
10646  return;
10647  }
10648 
10649  process_header<unsubscribe_info,
10650  &this_type::process_unsubscribe_impl<unsubscribe_phase::packet_id>>(
10651  force_move(session_life_keeper),
10652  all_read,
10653  header_len,
10654  unsubscribe_info(),
10655  force_move(self)
10656  );
10657  }
10658 
10659  template<unsubscribe_phase Phase>
10660  void process_unsubscribe_impl(
10661  any session_life_keeper,
10662  buffer buf,
10663  unsubscribe_info&& info,
10664  this_type_sp self
10665  ) {
10666  switch (Phase) {
10667  case unsubscribe_phase::packet_id:
10668  process_packet_id(
10669  force_move(session_life_keeper),
10670  force_move(buf),
10671  [
10672  this,
10673  info = force_move(info)
10674  ]
10675  (packet_id_t packet_id, buffer buf, any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp self) mutable {
10676  info.packet_id = packet_id;
10677  if (version_ == protocol_version::v5) {
10678  process_unsubscribe_impl<unsubscribe_phase::properties>(
10679  force_move(session_life_keeper),
10680  force_move(buf),
10681  force_move(info),
10682  force_move(self)
10683  );
10684  }
10685  else {
10686  process_unsubscribe_impl<unsubscribe_phase::topic>(
10687  force_move(session_life_keeper),
10688  force_move(buf),
10689  force_move(info),
10690  force_move(self)
10691  );
10692  }
10693  },
10694  force_move(self)
10695  );
10696  break;
10697  case unsubscribe_phase::properties:
