10698  process_properties(
10699  force_move(session_life_keeper),
10700  force_move(buf),
10701  [
10702  this,
10703  info = force_move(info)
10704  ]
10705  (std::vector<v5::property_variant> props, buffer buf, any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp self) mutable {
10706  info.props = force_move(props);
10707  process_unsubscribe_impl<unsubscribe_phase::topic>(
10708  force_move(session_life_keeper),
10709  force_move(buf),
10710  force_move(info),
10711  force_move(self)
10712  );
10713  },
10714  force_move(self)
10715  );
10716  break;
10717  case unsubscribe_phase::topic:
10718  process_string(
10719  force_move(session_life_keeper),
10720  force_move(buf),
10721  [
10722  this,
10723  info = force_move(info)
10724  ]
10725  (buffer topic_filter, buffer buf, any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp self) mutable {
10726  info.entries.emplace_back(force_move(topic_filter));
10727  if (remaining_length_ == 0) {
10728  process_unsubscribe_impl<unsubscribe_phase::finish>(
10729  force_move(session_life_keeper),
10730  force_move(buf),
10731  force_move(info),
10732  force_move(self)
10733  );
10734  }
10735  else {
10736  process_unsubscribe_impl<unsubscribe_phase::topic>(
10737  force_move(session_life_keeper),
10738  force_move(buf),
10739  force_move(info),
10740  force_move(self)
10741  );
10742  }
10743  },
10744  force_move(self)
10745  );
10746  break;
10747  case unsubscribe_phase::finish:
10748  switch (version_) {
10749  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
10750  if (on_unsubscribe(info.packet_id, force_move(info.entries))) {
10751  on_mqtt_message_processed(force_move(session_life_keeper));
10752  }
10753  break;
10754  case protocol_version::v5:
10755  if (on_v5_unsubscribe(info.packet_id, force_move(info.entries), force_move(info.props))) {
10756  on_mqtt_message_processed(force_move(session_life_keeper));
10757  }
10758  break;
10759  default:
10760  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
10761  }
10762  break;
10763  }
10764  }
10765 
10766  // process unsuback
10767 
10768  enum class unsuback_phase {
10769  packet_id,
10770  properties,
10771  reasons,
10772  };
10773 
10774  struct unsuback_info {
10775  packet_id_t packet_id;
10776  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props;
10777  };
10778 
10779  void process_unsuback(
10780  any session_life_keeper,
10781  bool all_read,
10782  this_type_sp self
10783  ) {
10784  static constexpr std::size_t header_len =
10785  sizeof(packet_id_t); // Packet Id
10786 
10787  if (remaining_length_ < header_len) {
10788  call_protocol_error_handlers();
10789  return;
10790  }
10791 
10792  process_header<unsuback_info,
10793  &this_type::process_unsuback_impl<unsuback_phase::packet_id>>(
10794  force_move(session_life_keeper),
10795  all_read,
10796  header_len,
10797  unsuback_info(),
10798  force_move(self)
10799  );
10800  }
10801 
10802  template<unsuback_phase Phase>
10803  void process_unsuback_impl(
10804  any session_life_keeper,
10805  buffer buf,
10806  unsuback_info&& info,
10807  this_type_sp self
10808  ) {
10809  switch (Phase) {
10810  case unsuback_phase::packet_id:
10811  process_packet_id(
10812  force_move(session_life_keeper),
10813  force_move(buf),
10814  [
10815  this,
10816  info = force_move(info)
10817  ]
10818  (packet_id_t packet_id, buffer buf, any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp self) mutable {
10819  info.packet_id = packet_id;
10820  {
10821  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
10822  packet_id_.erase(info.packet_id);
10823  }
10824  switch (version_) {
10825  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
10826  if (on_unsuback(info.packet_id)) {
10827  on_mqtt_message_processed(force_move(session_life_keeper));
10828  }
10829  break;
10830  case protocol_version::v5:
10831  process_unsuback_impl<unsuback_phase::properties>(
10832  force_move(session_life_keeper),
10833  force_move(buf),
10834  force_move(info),
10835  force_move(self)
10836  );
10837  break;
10838  default:
10839  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
10840  }
10841  },
10842  force_move(self)
10843  );
10844  break;
10845  case unsuback_phase::properties:
10846  process_properties(
10847  force_move(session_life_keeper),
10848  force_move(buf),
10849  [
10850  this,
10851  info = force_move(info)
10852  ]
10853  (std::vector<v5::property_variant> props, buffer buf, any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp self) mutable {
10854  info.props = force_move(props);
10855  process_unsuback_impl<unsuback_phase::reasons>(
10856  force_move(session_life_keeper),
10857  force_move(buf),
10858  force_move(info),
10859  force_move(self)
10860  );
10861  },
10862  force_move(self)
10863  );
10864  break;
10865  case unsuback_phase::reasons:
10866  process_nbytes(
10867  force_move(session_life_keeper),
10868  force_move(buf),
10869  remaining_length_, // Reason Codes
10870  [
10871  this,
10872  info = force_move(info)
10873  ]
10874  (buffer body, buffer /*buf*/, any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp /*self*/) mutable {
10875  BOOST_ASSERT(version_ == protocol_version::v5);
10876  {
10877  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
10878  packet_id_.erase(info.packet_id);
10879  }
10880 
10881  std::vector<v5::unsuback_reason_code> reasons;
10882  reasons.resize(body.size());
10883  std::transform(
10884  body.begin(),
10885  body.end(),
10886  reasons.begin(),
10887  [&](auto const& e) {
10888  return static_cast<v5::unsuback_reason_code>(e);
10889  }
10890  );
10891  if (on_v5_unsuback(info.packet_id, force_move(reasons), force_move(info.props))) {
10892  on_mqtt_message_processed(force_move(session_life_keeper));
10893  }
10894  },
10895  force_move(self)
10896  );
10897  break;
10898  }
10899  }
10900 
10901  // process pingreq
10902 
10903  void process_pingreq(
10904  any session_life_keeper
10905  ) {
10906  static constexpr std::size_t header_len = 0;
10907 
10908  if (remaining_length_ != header_len) {
10909  call_protocol_error_handlers();
10910  return;
10911  }
10912  if (on_pingreq()) {
10913  on_mqtt_message_processed(force_move(session_life_keeper));
10914  }
10915  }
10916 
10917  // process pingresp
10918 
10919  void process_pingresp(
10920  any session_life_keeper
10921  ) {
10922  static constexpr std::size_t header_len = 0;
10923 
10924  if (remaining_length_ != header_len) {
10925  call_protocol_error_handlers();
10926  return;
10927  }
10928  if (on_pingresp()) {
10929  on_mqtt_message_processed(force_move(session_life_keeper));
10930  }
10931  }
10932 
10933  // process disconnect
10934 
10935  enum class disconnect_phase {
10936  reason_code,
10937  properties,
10938  finish,
10939  };
10940 
10941  struct disconnect_info {
10942  v5::disconnect_reason_code reason_code;
10943  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props;
10944  };
10945 
10946  void process_disconnect(
10947  any session_life_keeper,
10948  bool all_read,
10949  this_type_sp self
10950  ) {
10951  if (remaining_length_ == 0) {
10952  disconnect_info info { v5::disconnect_reason_code::normal_disconnection, std::vector<v5::property_variant>() };
10953  process_disconnect_impl<disconnect_phase::finish>(
10954  force_move(session_life_keeper),
10955  buffer(),
10956  force_move(info),
10957  force_move(self)
10958  );
10959  return;
10960  }
10961 
10962  if (version_ != protocol_version::v5) {
10963  call_protocol_error_handlers();
10964  return;
10965  }
10966 
10967  static constexpr std::size_t header_len =
10968  1; // Reason Code
10969 
10970  if (remaining_length_ < header_len) {
10971  call_protocol_error_handlers();
10972  return;
10973  }
10974 
10975  process_header<disconnect_info,
10976  &this_type::process_disconnect_impl<disconnect_phase::reason_code>>(
10977  force_move(session_life_keeper),
10978  all_read,
10979  header_len,
10980  disconnect_info(),
10981  force_move(self)
10982  );
10983  }
10984 
10985  template<disconnect_phase Phase>
10986  void process_disconnect_impl(
10987  any session_life_keeper,
10988  buffer buf,
10989  disconnect_info&& info,
10990  this_type_sp self
10991  ) {
10992  switch (Phase) {
10993  case disconnect_phase::reason_code:
10994  process_nbytes(
10995  force_move(session_life_keeper),
10996  force_move(buf),
10997  1, // reason_code
10998  [
10999  this,
11000  info = force_move(info)
11001  ]
11002  (buffer body, buffer buf, any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp self) mutable {
11003  info.reason_code = static_cast<v5::disconnect_reason_code>(body[0]);
11004  process_disconnect_impl<disconnect_phase::properties>(
11005  force_move(session_life_keeper),
11006  force_move(buf),
11007  force_move(info),
11008  force_move(self)
11009  );
11010  },
11011  force_move(self)
11012  );
11013  break;
11014  case disconnect_phase::properties:
11015  process_properties(
11016  force_move(session_life_keeper),
11017  force_move(buf),
11018  [
11019  this,
11020  info = force_move(info)
11021  ]
11022  (std::vector<v5::property_variant> props, buffer buf, any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp self) mutable {
11023  info.props = force_move(props);
11024  process_disconnect_impl<disconnect_phase::finish>(
11025  force_move(session_life_keeper),
11026  force_move(buf),
11027  force_move(info),
11028  force_move(self)
11029  );
11030  },
11031  force_move(self)
11032  );
11033  break;
11034  case disconnect_phase::finish:
11035  switch (version_) {
11036  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
11037  on_disconnect();
11038  break;
11039  case protocol_version::v5:
11040  on_v5_disconnect(info.reason_code, force_move(info.props));
11041  break;
11042  default:
11043  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
11044  }
11045  break;
11046  }
11047  }
11048 
11049  // process auth
11050 
11051  enum class auth_phase {
11052  reason_code,
11053  properties,
11054  finish,
11055  };
11056 
11057  struct auth_info {
11058  v5::auth_reason_code reason_code;
11059  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props;
11060  };
11061 
11062  void process_auth(
11063  any session_life_keeper,
11064  bool all_read,
11065  this_type_sp self
11066  ) {
11067  if (version_ != protocol_version::v5) {
11068  call_protocol_error_handlers();
11069  return;
11070  }
11071 
11072  if (remaining_length_ == 0) {
11073  process_auth_impl<auth_phase::finish>(
11074  force_move(session_life_keeper),
11075  buffer(),
11076  auth_info{ v5::auth_reason_code::success, std::vector<v5::property_variant>() },
11077  force_move(self)
11078  );
11079  return;
11080  }
11081 
11082  static constexpr std::size_t header_len =
11083  1; // Reason Code
11084 
11085  if (remaining_length_ < header_len) {
11086  call_protocol_error_handlers();
11087  return;
11088  }
11089 
11090  process_header<auth_info,
11091  &this_type::process_auth_impl<auth_phase::reason_code>>(
11092  force_move(session_life_keeper),
11093  all_read,
11094  header_len,
11095  auth_info(),
11096  force_move(self)
11097  );
11098  }
11099 
11100  template<auth_phase Phase>
11101  void process_auth_impl(
11102  any session_life_keeper,
11103  buffer buf,
11104  auth_info&& info,
11105  this_type_sp self
11106  ) {
11107  switch (Phase) {
11108  case auth_phase::reason_code:
11109  process_nbytes(
11110  force_move(session_life_keeper),
11111  force_move(buf),
11112  1, // reason_code
11113  [
11114  this,
11115  info = force_move(info)
11116  ]
11117  (buffer body, buffer buf, any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp self) mutable {
11118  info.reason_code = static_cast<v5::auth_reason_code>(body[0]);
11119  process_auth_impl<auth_phase::properties>(
11120  force_move(session_life_keeper),
11121  force_move(buf),
11122  force_move(info),
11123  force_move(self)
11124  );
11125  },
11126  force_move(self)
11127  );
11128  break;
11129  case auth_phase::properties:
11130  process_properties(
11131  force_move(session_life_keeper),
11132  force_move(buf),
11133  [
11134  this,
11135  info = force_move(info)
11136  ]
11137  (std::vector<v5::property_variant> props, buffer buf, any session_life_keeper, this_type_sp self) mutable {
11138  info.props = force_move(props);
11139  process_auth_impl<auth_phase::finish>(
11140  force_move(session_life_keeper),
11141  force_move(buf),
11142  force_move(info),
11143  force_move(self)
11144  );
11145  },
11146  force_move(self)
11147  );
11148  break;
11149  case auth_phase::finish:
11150  BOOST_ASSERT(version_ == protocol_version::v5);
11151  if (on_v5_auth(info.reason_code, force_move(info.props))) {
11152  on_mqtt_message_processed(force_move(session_life_keeper));
11153  }
11154  break;
11155  }
11156  }
11157 
11158  template <typename F, typename AF>
11159  void auto_pub_response(F const& f, AF const& af) {
11160  if (auto_pub_response_) {
11161  if (auto_pub_response_async_) af();
11162  else f();
11163  }
11164  }
11165 
11166  // Blocking senders.
11167  void send_connect(
11168  buffer client_id,
11169  optional<buffer> user_name,
11170  optional<buffer> password,
11171  optional<will> w,
11172  std::uint16_t keep_alive_sec,
11173  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props
11174  ) {
11175  switch (version_) {
11176  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
11177  do_sync_write(
11178  v3_1_1::connect_message(
11179  keep_alive_sec,
11180  force_move(client_id),
11181  clean_session_,
11182  force_move(w),
11183  force_move(user_name),
11184  force_move(password)
11185  )
11186  );
11187  break;
11188  case protocol_version::v5:
11189  do_sync_write(
11190  v5::connect_message(
11191  keep_alive_sec,
11192  force_move(client_id),
11193  clean_session_,
11194  force_move(w),
11195  force_move(user_name),
11196  force_move(password),
11197  force_move(props)
11198  )
11199  );
11200  break;
11201  default:
11202  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
11203  break;
11204  }
11205  }
11206 
11207  void send_connack(
11208  bool session_present,
11209  variant<connect_return_code, v5::connect_reason_code> reason_code,
11210  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props
11211  ) {
11212  switch (version_) {
11213  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
11214  do_sync_write(
11215  v3_1_1::connack_message(
11216  session_present,
11217  variant_get<connect_return_code>(reason_code)
11218  )
11219  );
11220  break;
11221  case protocol_version::v5:
11222  do_sync_write(
11223  v5::connack_message(
11224  session_present,
11225  variant_get<v5::connect_reason_code>(reason_code),
11226  force_move(props)
11227  )
11228  );
11229  break;
11230  default:
11231  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
11232  break;
11233  }
11234  }
11235 
11236  void send_publish(
11237  buffer topic_name,
11238  qos qos_value,
11239  bool retain,
11240  bool dup,
11241  packet_id_t packet_id,
11242  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
11243  buffer payload,
11244  any life_keeper) {
11245 
11246  auto do_send_publish =
11247  [&](auto msg, auto const& serialize_publish) {
11248 
11249  if (qos_value == qos::at_least_once || qos_value == qos::exactly_once) {
11250  auto store_msg = msg;
11251  store_msg.set_dup(true);
11252  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
11253  store_.emplace(
11254  packet_id,
11255  qos_value == qos::at_least_once
11256  ? control_packet_type::puback
11257  : control_packet_type::pubrec,
11258  store_msg,
11259  force_move(life_keeper)
11260  );
11261  (this->*serialize_publish)(store_msg);
11262  }
11263  do_sync_write(force_move(msg));
11264  };
11265 
11266  switch (version_) {
11267  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
11268  do_send_publish(
11269  v3_1_1::basic_publish_message<PacketIdBytes>(
11270  force_move(topic_name),
11271  qos_value,
11272  retain,
11273  dup,
11274  packet_id,
11275  force_move(payload)
11276  ),
11277  &endpoint::on_serialize_publish_message
11278  );
11279  break;
11280  case protocol_version::v5:
11281  do_send_publish(
11282  v5::basic_publish_message<PacketIdBytes>(
11283  force_move(topic_name),
11284  qos_value,
11285  retain,
11286  dup,
11287  packet_id,
11288  force_move(props),
11289  force_move(payload)
11290  ),
11291  &endpoint::on_serialize_v5_publish_message
11292  );
11293  break;
11294  default:
11295  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
11296  break;
11297  }
11298  }
11299 
11300  void send_puback(
11301  packet_id_t packet_id,
11302  v5::puback_reason_code reason = v5::puback_reason_code::success,
11303  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
11304  ) {
11305  switch (version_) {
11306  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
11307  do_sync_write(v3_1_1::basic_puback_message<PacketIdBytes>(packet_id));
11308  break;
11309  case protocol_version::v5:
11310  do_sync_write(v5::basic_puback_message<PacketIdBytes>(packet_id, reason, force_move(props)));
11311  break;
11312  default:
11313  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
11314  break;
11315  }
11316 
11317  on_pub_res_sent(packet_id);
11318  }
11319 
11320  void send_pubrec(
11321  packet_id_t packet_id,
11322  v5::pubrec_reason_code reason = v5::pubrec_reason_code::success,
11323  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
11324  ) {
11325  switch (version_) {
11326  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
11327  do_sync_write(v3_1_1::basic_pubrec_message<PacketIdBytes>(packet_id));
11328  break;
11329  case protocol_version::v5:
11330  do_sync_write(v5::basic_pubrec_message<PacketIdBytes>(packet_id, reason, force_move(props)));
11331  break;
11332  default:
11333  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
11334  break;
11335  }
11336  }
11337 
11338  void send_pubrel(
11339  packet_id_t packet_id,
11340  v5::pubrel_reason_code reason = v5::pubrel_reason_code::success,
11341  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {},
11342  any life_keeper = any()
11343  ) {
11344 
11345  auto impl =
11346  [&](auto msg, auto const& serialize) {
11347  {
11348  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
11349 
11350  // insert if not registerd (start from pubrel sending case)
11351  packet_id_.insert(packet_id);
11352 
11353  auto ret = store_.emplace(
11354  packet_id,
11355  control_packet_type::pubcomp,
11356  msg,
11357  force_move(life_keeper)
11358  );
11359  (void)ret;
11360  BOOST_ASSERT(ret.second);
11361  }
11362 
11363  (this->*serialize)(msg);
11364  do_sync_write(force_move(msg));
11365  };
11366 
11367  switch (version_) {
11368  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
11369  impl(
11370  v3_1_1::basic_pubrel_message<PacketIdBytes>(packet_id),
11371  &endpoint::on_serialize_pubrel_message
11372  );
11373  break;
11374  case protocol_version::v5:
11375  impl(
11376  v5::basic_pubrel_message<PacketIdBytes>(packet_id, reason, force_move(props)),
11377  &endpoint::on_serialize_v5_pubrel_message
11378  );
11379  break;
11380  default:
11381  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
11382  break;
11383  }
11384  }
11385 
11386  void store_pubrel(
11387  packet_id_t packet_id,
11388  v5::pubrel_reason_code reason = v5::pubrel_reason_code::success,
11389  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
11390  ) {
11391 
11392  auto impl =
11393  [&](auto msg, auto const& serialize) {
11394  {
11395  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
11396 
11397  // insert if not registerd (start from pubrel sending case)
11398  packet_id_.insert(packet_id);
11399 
11400  auto ret = store_.emplace(
11401  packet_id,
11402  control_packet_type::pubcomp,
11403  msg
11404  );
11405  (void)ret;
11406  BOOST_ASSERT(ret.second);
11407  }
11408 
11409  (this->*serialize)(msg);
11410  };
11411 
11412  switch (version_) {
11413  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
11414  impl(
11415  v3_1_1::basic_pubrel_message<PacketIdBytes>(packet_id),
11416  &endpoint::on_serialize_pubrel_message
11417  );
11418  break;
11419  case protocol_version::v5:
11420  impl(
11421  v5::basic_pubrel_message<PacketIdBytes>(packet_id, reason, force_move(props)),
11422  &endpoint::on_serialize_v5_pubrel_message
11423  );
11424  break;
11425  default:
11426  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
11427  break;
11428  }
11429  }
11430 
11431  void send_pubcomp(
11432  packet_id_t packet_id,
11433  v5::pubcomp_reason_code reason = v5::pubcomp_reason_code::success,
11434  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
11435  ) {
11436  switch (version_) {
11437  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
11438  do_sync_write(v3_1_1::basic_pubcomp_message<PacketIdBytes>(packet_id));
11439  break;
11440  case protocol_version::v5:
11441  do_sync_write(v5::basic_pubcomp_message<PacketIdBytes>(packet_id, reason, force_move(props)));
11442  break;
11443  default:
11444  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
11445  break;
11446  }
11447 
11448  on_pub_res_sent(packet_id);
11449  }
11450 
11451  template <typename... Args>
11452  void send_subscribe(
11453  std::vector<std::tuple<buffer, subscribe_options>> params,
11454  packet_id_t packet_id,
11455  as::const_buffer topic_name,
11456  subscribe_options option,
11457  Args&&... args) {
11458  params.emplace_back(buffer(string_view(get_pointer(topic_name), get_size(topic_name))), option);
11459  send_subscribe(force_move(params), packet_id, std::forward<Args>(args)...);
11460  }
11461 
11462  template <typename... Args>
11463  void send_subscribe(
11464  std::vector<std::tuple<buffer, subscribe_options>> params,
11465  packet_id_t packet_id,
11466  string_view topic_name,
11467  subscribe_options option,
11468  Args&&... args) {
11469  params.emplace_back(buffer(force_move(topic_name)), option);
11470  send_subscribe(force_move(params), packet_id, std::forward<Args>(args)...);
11471  }
11472 
11473  template <typename... Args>
11474  void send_subscribe(
11475  std::vector<std::tuple<buffer, subscribe_options>> params,
11476  packet_id_t packet_id,
11477  buffer topic_name,
11478  qos qos_value,
11479  Args&&... args) {
11480  params.emplace_back(force_move(topic_name), qos_value);
11481  send_subscribe(force_move(params), packet_id, std::forward<Args>(args)...);
11482  }
11483 
11484  void send_subscribe(
11485  std::vector<std::tuple<buffer, subscribe_options>> params,
11486  packet_id_t packet_id,
11487  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
11488  ) {
11489  for(auto const& p : params)
11490  {
11491  (void)p;
11492  BOOST_ASSERT(
11493  std::get<1>(p).get_qos() == qos::at_most_once ||
11494  std::get<1>(p).get_qos() == qos::at_least_once ||
11495  std::get<1>(p).get_qos() == qos::exactly_once
11496  );
11497  }
11498  switch (version_) {
11499  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
11500  do_sync_write(v3_1_1::basic_subscribe_message<PacketIdBytes>(force_move(params), packet_id));
11501  break;
11502  case protocol_version::v5:
11503  do_sync_write(v5::basic_subscribe_message<PacketIdBytes>(force_move(params), packet_id, force_move(props)));
11504  break;
11505  default:
11506  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
11507  break;
11508  }
11509  }
11510 
11511  template <typename... Args>
11512  void send_suback(
11513  variant<std::vector<suback_return_code>, std::vector<v5::suback_reason_code>> params,
11514  packet_id_t packet_id,
11515  variant<suback_return_code, v5::suback_reason_code> reason,
11516  Args&&... args) {
11517  visit([reason](auto & vect){ vect.push_back(reason); }, params);
11518  send_suback(force_move(params), packet_id, std::forward<Args>(args)...);
11519  }
11520 
11521  void send_suback(
11522  variant<std::vector<suback_return_code>, std::vector<v5::suback_reason_code>> params,
11523  packet_id_t packet_id,
11524  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
11525  ) {
11526  switch (version_) {
11527  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
11528  do_sync_write(v3_1_1::basic_suback_message<PacketIdBytes>(force_move(variant_get<std::vector<suback_return_code>>(params)), packet_id));
11529  break;
11530  case protocol_version::v5:
11531  do_sync_write(v5::basic_suback_message<PacketIdBytes>(force_move(variant_get<std::vector<v5::suback_reason_code>>(params)), packet_id, force_move(props)));
11532  break;
11533  default:
11534  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
11535  break;
11536  }
11537  }
11538 
11539  template <typename... Args>
11540  void send_unsubscribe(
11541  std::vector<buffer> params,
11542  packet_id_t packet_id,
11543  as::const_buffer topic_name,
11544  Args&&... args) {
11545  params.emplace_back(buffer(string_view(get_pointer(topic_name), get_size(topic_name))));
11546  send_unsubscribe(force_move(params), packet_id, std::forward<Args>(args)...);
11547  }
11548 
11549  template <typename... Args>
11550  void send_unsubscribe(
11551  std::vector<buffer> params,
11552  packet_id_t packet_id,
11553  string_view topic_name,
11554  Args&&... args) {
11555  params.emplace_back(buffer(topic_name));
11556  send_unsubscribe(force_move(params), packet_id, std::forward<Args>(args)...);
11557  }
11558 
11559  template <typename... Args>
11560  void send_unsubscribe(
11561  std::vector<buffer> params,
11562  packet_id_t packet_id,
11563  buffer topic_name,
11564  Args&&... args) {
11565  params.emplace_back(force_move(topic_name));
11566  send_unsubscribe(force_move(params), packet_id, std::forward<Args>(args)...);
11567  }
11568 
11569  void send_unsubscribe(
11570  std::vector<buffer> params,
11571  packet_id_t packet_id,
11572  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
11573  ) {
11574  switch (version_) {
11575  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
11576  do_sync_write(v3_1_1::basic_unsubscribe_message<PacketIdBytes>(force_move(params), packet_id));
11577  break;
11578  case protocol_version::v5:
11579  do_sync_write(v5::basic_unsubscribe_message<PacketIdBytes>(force_move(params), packet_id, force_move(props)));
11580  break;
11581  default:
11582  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
11583  break;
11584  }
11585  }
11586 
11587  void send_unsuback(
11588  packet_id_t packet_id
11589  ) {
11590  switch (version_) {
11591  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
11592  do_sync_write(v3_1_1::basic_unsuback_message<PacketIdBytes>(packet_id));
11593  break;
11594  case protocol_version::v5:
11595  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
11596  break;
11597  default:
11598  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
11599  break;
11600  }
11601  }
11602 
11603  template <typename... Args>
11604  void send_unsuback(
11605  std::vector<v5::unsuback_reason_code> params,
11606  packet_id_t packet_id,
11607  v5::unsuback_reason_code reason,
11608  Args&&... args) {
11609  params.push_back(reason);
11610  send_suback(force_move(params), packet_id, std::forward<Args>(args)...);
11611  }
11612 
11613  void send_unsuback(
11614  std::vector<v5::unsuback_reason_code> params,
11615  packet_id_t packet_id,
11616  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
11617  ) {
11618  switch (version_) {
11619  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
11620  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
11621  break;
11622  case protocol_version::v5:
11623  do_sync_write(v5::basic_unsuback_message<PacketIdBytes>(force_move(params), packet_id, force_move(props)));
11624  break;
11625  default:
11626  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
11627  break;
11628  }
11629  }
11630 
11631  void send_pingreq() {
11632  switch (version_) {
11633  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
11634  do_sync_write(v3_1_1::pingreq_message());
11635  break;
11636  case protocol_version::v5:
11637  do_sync_write(v5::pingreq_message());
11638  break;
11639  default:
11640  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
11641  break;
11642  }
11643  }
11644 
11645  void send_pingresp() {
11646  switch (version_) {
11647  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
11648  do_sync_write(v3_1_1::pingresp_message());
11649  break;
11650  case protocol_version::v5:
11651  do_sync_write(v5::pingresp_message());
11652  break;
11653  default:
11654  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
11655  break;
11656  }
11657  }
11658 
11659  void send_auth(
11660  v5::auth_reason_code reason = v5::auth_reason_code::success,
11661  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
11662  ) {
11663  switch (version_) {
11664  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
11665  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
11666  break;
11667  case protocol_version::v5:
11668  do_sync_write(v5::auth_message(reason, force_move(props)));
11669  break;
11670  default:
11671  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
11672  break;
11673  }
11674  }
11675 
11676  void send_disconnect(
11677  v5::disconnect_reason_code reason = v5::disconnect_reason_code::normal_disconnection,
11678  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
11679  ) {
11680  switch (version_) {
11681  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
11682  do_sync_write(v3_1_1::disconnect_message());
11683  break;
11684  case protocol_version::v5:
11685  do_sync_write(v5::disconnect_message(reason, force_move(props)));
11686  break;
11687  default:
11688  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
11689  break;
11690  }
11691  }
11692 
11693  void send_store() {
11694  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
11695  auto const& idx = store_.template get<tag_seq>();
11696  for (auto const& e : idx) {
11697  do_sync_write(e.message());
11698  }
11699  }
11700 
11701  // Blocking write
11702  template <typename MessageVariant>
11703  void do_sync_write(MessageVariant&& mv) {
11704  boost::system::error_code ec;
11705  if (!connected_) return;
11706  on_pre_send();
11707  socket_->write(const_buffer_sequence<PacketIdBytes>(std::forward<MessageVariant>(mv)), ec);
11708  // If ec is set as error, the error will be handled by async_read.
11709  // If `handle_error(ec);` is called here, error_handler would be called twice.
11710  }
11711 
11712  // Non blocking (async) senders
11713  void async_send_connect(
11714  buffer client_id,
11715  optional<buffer> user_name,
11716  optional<buffer> password,
11717  optional<will> const& w,
11718  bool clean_session,
11719  std::uint16_t keep_alive_sec,
11720  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
11721  async_handler_t func) {
11722 
11723  clean_session_ = clean_session;
11724 
11725  switch (version_) {
11726  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
11727  do_async_write(
11728  v3_1_1::connect_message(
11729  keep_alive_sec,
11730  force_move(client_id),
11731  clean_session_,
11732  w,
11733  force_move(user_name),
11734  force_move(password)
11735  ),
11736  force_move(func)
11737  );
11738  break;
11739  case protocol_version::v5:
11740  do_async_write(
11741  v5::connect_message(
11742  keep_alive_sec,
11743  force_move(client_id),
11744  clean_session_,
11745  w,
11746  force_move(user_name),
11747  force_move(password),
11748  force_move(props)
11749  ),
11750  force_move(func)
11751  );
11752  break;
11753  default:
11754  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
11755  break;
11756  }
11757  }
11758 
11759  void async_send_connack(
11760  bool session_present,
11761  variant<connect_return_code, v5::connect_reason_code> reason_code,
11762  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
11763  async_handler_t func
11764  ) {
11765  switch (version_) {
11766  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
11767  do_async_write(
11768  v3_1_1::connack_message(
11769  session_present,
11770  variant_get<connect_return_code>(reason_code)
11771  ),
11772  force_move(func)
11773  );
11774  break;
11775  case protocol_version::v5:
11776  do_async_write(
11777  v5::connack_message(
11778  session_present,
11779  variant_get<v5::connect_reason_code>(reason_code),
11780  force_move(props)
11781  ),
11782  force_move(func)
11783  );
11784  break;
11785  default:
11786  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
11787  break;
11788  }
11789  }
11790 
11791  void async_send_publish(
11792  buffer topic_name,
11793  qos qos_value,
11794  bool retain,
11795  bool dup,
11796  packet_id_t packet_id,
11797  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
11798  buffer payload,
11799  async_handler_t func,
11800  any life_keeper) {
11801 
11802  auto do_async_send_publish =
11803  [&](auto msg, auto const& serialize_publish) {
11804  if (qos_value == qos::at_least_once || qos_value == qos::exactly_once) {
11805  auto store_msg = msg;
11806  store_msg.set_dup(true);
11807  {
11808  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
11809  auto ret = store_.emplace(
11810  packet_id,
11811  qos_value == qos::at_least_once ? control_packet_type::puback
11812  : control_packet_type::pubrec,
11813  store_msg,
11814  life_keeper
11815  );
11816  (void)ret;
11817  BOOST_ASSERT(ret.second);
11818  }
11819 
11820  (this->*serialize_publish)(store_msg);
11821  }
11822  do_async_write(
11823  force_move(msg),
11824  [life_keeper = force_move(life_keeper), func = force_move(func)](boost::system::error_code const& ec) {
11825  if (func) func(ec);
11826  }
11827  );
11828  };
11829 
11830  switch (version_) {
11831  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
11832  do_async_send_publish(
11833  v3_1_1::basic_publish_message<PacketIdBytes>(
11834  force_move(topic_name),
11835  qos_value,
11836  retain,
11837  dup,
11838  packet_id,
11839  force_move(payload)
11840  ),
11841  &endpoint::on_serialize_publish_message
11842  );
11843  break;
11844  case protocol_version::v5:
11845  do_async_send_publish(
11846  v5::basic_publish_message<PacketIdBytes>(
11847  force_move(topic_name),
11848  qos_value,
11849  retain,
11850  dup,
11851  packet_id,
11852  force_move(props),
11853  force_move(payload)
11854  ),
11855  &endpoint::on_serialize_v5_publish_message
11856  );
11857  break;
11858  default:
11859  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
11860  break;
11861  }
11862  }
11863 
11864  void async_send_puback(
11865  packet_id_t packet_id,
11866  v5::puback_reason_code reason,
11867  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
11868  async_handler_t func
11869  ) {
11870  switch (version_) {
11871  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
11872  do_async_write(
11873  v3_1_1::basic_puback_message<PacketIdBytes>(packet_id),
11874  [this, self = this->shared_from_this(), packet_id, func = force_move(func)]
11875  (boost::system::error_code const& ec){
11876  if (func) func(ec);
11877  on_pub_res_sent(packet_id);
11878  }
11879  );
11880  break;
11881  case protocol_version::v5:
11882  do_async_write(
11883  v5::basic_puback_message<PacketIdBytes>(packet_id, reason, force_move(props)),
11884  [this, self = this->shared_from_this(), packet_id, func = force_move(func)]
11885  (boost::system::error_code const& ec){
11886  if (func) func(ec);
11887  on_pub_res_sent(packet_id);
11888  }
11889  );
11890  break;
11891  default:
11892  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
11893  break;
11894  }
11895  }
11896 
11897  void async_send_pubrec(
11898  packet_id_t packet_id,
11899  v5::pubrec_reason_code reason,
11900  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
11901  async_handler_t func
11902  ) {
11903  switch (version_) {
11904  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
11905  do_async_write(
11906  v3_1_1::basic_pubrec_message<PacketIdBytes>(packet_id),
11907  force_move(func)
11908  );
11909  break;
11910  case protocol_version::v5:
11911  do_async_write(
11912  v5::basic_pubrec_message<PacketIdBytes>(packet_id, reason, force_move(props)),
11913  force_move(func)
11914  );
11915  break;
11916  default:
11917  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
11918  break;
11919  }
11920  }
11921 
11922  void async_send_pubrel(
11923  packet_id_t packet_id,
11924  v5::pubrel_reason_code reason,
11925  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
11926  async_handler_t func,
11927  any life_keeper = any()
11928  ) {
11929 
11930  auto msg = basic_pubrel_message<PacketIdBytes>(packet_id);
11931 
11932  auto impl =
11933  [&](auto msg, auto const& serialize) {
11934  {
11935  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
11936 
11937  // insert if not registerd (start from pubrel sending case)
11938  packet_id_.insert(packet_id);
11939 
11940  auto ret = store_.emplace(
11941  packet_id,
11942  control_packet_type::pubcomp,
11943  msg
11944  );
11945  // publish store is erased when pubrec is received.
11946  // pubrel store is erased when pubcomp is received.
11947  // If invalid client send pubrec twice with the same packet id,
11948  // then send corresponding pubrel twice is a possible client/server
11949  // implementation.
11950  // In this case, overwrite store_.
11951  if (!ret.second) {
11952  store_.modify(
11953  ret.first,
11954  [&] (auto& e) {
11955  e = store(
11956  packet_id,
11957  control_packet_type::pubcomp,
11958  force_move(msg),
11959  life_keeper
11960  );
11961  }
11962  );
11963  }
11964  }
11965 
11966  (this->*serialize)(msg);
11967 
11968  do_async_write(
11969  force_move(msg),
11970  [life_keeper = force_move(life_keeper), func = force_move(func)](boost::system::error_code const& ec) {
11971  if (func) func(ec);
11972  }
11973  );
11974  };
11975 
11976  switch (version_) {
11977  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
11978  impl(
11979  v3_1_1::basic_pubrel_message<PacketIdBytes>(packet_id),
11980  &endpoint::on_serialize_pubrel_message
11981  );
11982  break;
11983  case protocol_version::v5:
11984  impl(
11985  v5::basic_pubrel_message<PacketIdBytes>(packet_id, reason, force_move(props)),
11986  &endpoint::on_serialize_v5_pubrel_message
11987  );
11988  break;
11989  default:
11990  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
11991  break;
11992  }
11993  }
11994 
11995  void async_send_pubcomp(
11996  packet_id_t packet_id,
11997  v5::pubcomp_reason_code reason,
11998  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
11999  async_handler_t func
12000  ) {
12001  switch (version_) {
12002  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
12003  do_async_write(
12004  v3_1_1::basic_pubcomp_message<PacketIdBytes>(packet_id),
12005  [this, self = this->shared_from_this(), packet_id, func = force_move(func)]
12006  (boost::system::error_code const& ec){
12007  if (func) func(ec);
12008  on_pub_res_sent(packet_id);
12009  }
12010  );
12011  break;
12012  case protocol_version::v5:
12013  do_async_write(
12014  v5::basic_pubcomp_message<PacketIdBytes>(packet_id, reason, force_move(props)),
12015  [this, self = this->shared_from_this(), packet_id, func = force_move(func)]
12016  (boost::system::error_code const& ec){
12017  if (func) func(ec);
12018  on_pub_res_sent(packet_id);
12019  }
12020  );
12021  break;
12022  default:
12023  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
12024  break;
12025  }
12026  }
12027 
12028  template <typename... Args>
12029  void async_send_subscribe(
12030  std::vector<std::tuple<buffer, subscribe_options>> params,
12031  any life_keepers,
12032  packet_id_t packet_id,
12033  as::const_buffer topic_name,
12034  qos qos_value,
12035  Args&&... args) {
12036  params.emplace_back(buffer(string_view(get_pointer(topic_name), get_size(topic_name))), qos_value);
12037  async_send_subscribe(force_move(params), force_move(life_keepers), packet_id, std::forward<Args>(args)...);
12038  }
12039 
12040  template <typename... Args>
12041  void async_send_subscribe(
12042  std::vector<std::tuple<buffer, subscribe_options>> params,
12043  any life_keepers,
12044  packet_id_t packet_id,
12045  std::string topic_name,
12046  qos qos_value,
12047  Args&&... args) {
12048 
12049  auto sp_topic = std::make_shared<std::string>(force_move(topic_name));
12050  params.emplace_back(buffer(string_view(*sp_topic)), qos_value);
12051  async_send_subscribe(force_move(params), std::make_pair(force_move(life_keepers), force_move(sp_topic)), packet_id, std::forward<Args>(args)...);
12052  }
12053 
12054  void async_send_subscribe(
12055  std::vector<std::tuple<buffer, subscribe_options>> params,
12056  any life_keepers,
12057  packet_id_t packet_id,
12058  async_handler_t func) {
12059 
12060  switch (version_) {
12061  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
12062  do_async_write(
12063  v3_1_1::basic_subscribe_message<PacketIdBytes>(force_move(params), packet_id),
12064  [life_keepers = force_move(life_keepers), func = force_move(func)]
12065  (boost::system::error_code const& ec) {
12066  if (func) func(ec);
12067  }
12068  );
12069  break;
12070  case protocol_version::v5:
12071  do_async_write(
12072  v5::basic_subscribe_message<PacketIdBytes>(force_move(params), packet_id, {}),
12073  [life_keepers = force_move(life_keepers), func = force_move(func)]
12074  (boost::system::error_code const& ec) {
12075  if (func) func(ec);
12076  }
12077  );
12078  break;
12079  default:
12080  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
12081  break;
12082  }
12083  }
12084 
12085  void async_send_subscribe(
12086  std::vector<std::tuple<buffer, subscribe_options>> params,
12087  any life_keepers,
12088  packet_id_t packet_id,
12089  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
12090  async_handler_t func) {
12091 
12092  switch (version_) {
12093  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
12094  do_async_write(
12095  v3_1_1::basic_subscribe_message<PacketIdBytes>(force_move(params), packet_id),
12096  [life_keepers = force_move(life_keepers), func = force_move(func)]
12097  (boost::system::error_code const& ec) {
12098  if (func) func(ec);
12099  }
12100  );
12101  break;
12102  case protocol_version::v5:
12103  do_async_write(
12104  v5::basic_subscribe_message<PacketIdBytes>(force_move(params), packet_id, force_move(props)),
12105  [life_keepers = force_move(life_keepers), func = force_move(func)]
12106  (boost::system::error_code const& ec) {
12107  if (func) func(ec);
12108  }
12109  );
12110  break;
12111  default:
12112  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
12113  break;
12114  }
12115  }
12116 
12117  template <typename... Args>
12118  void async_send_suback(
12119  variant<std::vector<suback_return_code>, std::vector<v5::suback_reason_code>> params,
12120  packet_id_t packet_id,
12121  variant<suback_return_code, v5::suback_reason_code> reason_code,
12122  Args&&... args) {
12123  if((0 == variant_idx(params)) && (0 == variant_idx(reason_code)))
12124  {
12125  variant_get<std::vector<suback_return_code>>(params).push_back(variant_get<suback_return_code>(reason_code));
12126  }
12127  else if((1 == variant_idx(params)) && (1 == variant_idx(reason_code)))
12128  {
12129  variant_get<std::vector<v5::suback_reason_code>>(params).push_back(variant_get<v5::suback_reason_code>(reason_code));
12130  }
12131  else
12132  {
12133  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
12134  }
12135 
12136  async_send_suback(force_move(params), packet_id, std::forward<Args>(args)...);
12137  }
12138 
12139  void async_send_suback(
12140  variant<std::vector<suback_return_code>, std::vector<v5::suback_reason_code>> params,
12141  packet_id_t packet_id,
12142  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
12143  async_handler_t func
12144  ) {
12145  switch (version_) {
12146  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
12147  do_async_write(
12148  v3_1_1::basic_suback_message<PacketIdBytes>(force_move(variant_get<std::vector<suback_return_code>>(params)), packet_id), force_move(func)
12149  );
12150  break;
12151  case protocol_version::v5:
12152  do_async_write(
12153  v5::basic_suback_message<PacketIdBytes>(force_move(variant_get<std::vector<v5::suback_reason_code>>(params)), packet_id, force_move(props)), force_move(func)
12154  );
12155  break;
12156  default:
12157  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
12158  break;
12159  }
12160  }
12161 
12162  template <typename... Args>
12163  void async_send_unsubscribe(
12164  std::vector<buffer> params,
12165  any life_keepers,
12166  packet_id_t packet_id,
12167  as::const_buffer topic_name,
12168  Args&&... args) {
12169  params.emplace_back(buffer(string_view(get_pointer(topic_name), get_size(topic_name))));
12170  async_send_unsubscribe(force_move(params), force_move(life_keepers), packet_id, std::forward<Args>(args)...);
12171  }
12172 
12173  template <typename... Args>
12174  void async_send_unsubscribe(
12175  std::vector<buffer> params,
12176  any life_keepers,
12177  packet_id_t packet_id,
12178  std::string topic_name,
12179  Args&&... args) {
12180 
12181  auto sp_topic = std::make_shared<std::string>(force_move(topic_name));
12182  params.emplace_back(buffer(string_view(*sp_topic)));
12183  async_send_unsubscribe(force_move(params), std::make_pair(force_move(life_keepers), force_move(sp_topic)), packet_id, std::forward<Args>(args)...);
12184  }
12185 
12186  void async_send_unsubscribe(
12187  std::vector<buffer> params,
12188  any life_keepers,
12189  packet_id_t packet_id,
12190  async_handler_t func) {
12191 
12192  switch (version_) {
12193  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
12194  do_async_write(
12195  v3_1_1::basic_unsubscribe_message<PacketIdBytes>(
12196  force_move(params),
12197  packet_id
12198  ),
12199  [life_keepers = force_move(life_keepers), func = force_move(func)]
12200  (boost::system::error_code const& ec) {
12201  if (func) func(ec);
12202  }
12203  );
12204  break;
12205  case protocol_version::v5:
12206  do_async_write(
12207  v5::basic_unsubscribe_message<PacketIdBytes>(
12208  force_move(params),
12209  packet_id,
12210  {}
12211  ),
12212  [life_keepers = force_move(life_keepers), func = force_move(func)]
12213  (boost::system::error_code const& ec) {
12214  if (func) func(ec);
12215  }
12216  );
12217  break;
12218  default:
12219  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
12220  break;
12221  }
12222  }
12223 
12224  void async_send_unsubscribe(
12225  std::vector<buffer> params,
12226  any life_keepers,
12227  packet_id_t packet_id,
12228  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
12229  async_handler_t func) {
12230 
12231  switch (version_) {
12232  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
12233  do_async_write(
12234  v3_1_1::basic_unsubscribe_message<PacketIdBytes>(
12235  force_move(params),
12236  packet_id
12237  ),
12238  [life_keepers = force_move(life_keepers), func = force_move(func)]
12239  (boost::system::error_code const& ec) {
12240  if (func) func(ec);
12241  }
12242  );
12243  break;
12244  case protocol_version::v5:
12245  do_async_write(
12246  v5::basic_unsubscribe_message<PacketIdBytes>(
12247  force_move(params),
12248  packet_id,
12249  force_move(props)
12250  ),
12251  [life_keepers = force_move(life_keepers), func = force_move(func)]
12252  (boost::system::error_code const& ec) {
12253  if (func) func(ec);
12254  }
12255  );
12256  break;
12257  default:
12258  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
12259  break;
12260  }
12261  }
12262 
12263  void async_send_unsuback(
12264  packet_id_t packet_id, async_handler_t func) {
12265  switch (version_) {
12266  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
12267  do_async_write(
12268  v3_1_1::basic_unsuback_message<PacketIdBytes>(packet_id), force_move(func)
12269  );
12270  break;
12271  case protocol_version::v5:
12272  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
12273  break;
12274  default:
12275  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
12276  break;
12277  }
12278  }
12279 
12280  template <typename... Args>
12281  void async_send_unsuback(
12282  std::vector<v5::unsuback_reason_code> params,
12283  packet_id_t packet_id,
12284  v5::unsuback_reason_code payload,
12285  Args&&... args) {
12286  params.push_back(payload);
12287  async_send_unsuback(force_move(params), packet_id, std::forward<Args>(args)...);
12288  }
12289 
12290  void async_send_unsuback(
12291  std::vector<v5::unsuback_reason_code> params,
12292  packet_id_t packet_id,
12293  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
12294  async_handler_t func
12295  ) {
12296  switch (version_) {
12297  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
12298  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
12299  break;
12300  case protocol_version::v5:
12301  do_async_write(
12302  v5::basic_unsuback_message<PacketIdBytes>(
12303  force_move(params),
12304  packet_id,
12305  force_move(props)
12306  ),
12307  force_move(func)
12308  );
12309  break;
12310  default:
12311  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
12312  break;
12313  }
12314  }
12315 
12316  void async_send_pingreq(async_handler_t func) {
12317  switch (version_) {
12318  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
12319  do_async_write(v3_1_1::pingreq_message(), force_move(func));
12320  break;
12321  case protocol_version::v5:
12322  do_async_write(v5::pingreq_message(), force_move(func));
12323  break;
12324  default:
12325  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
12326  break;
12327  }
12328  }
12329 
12330  void async_send_pingresp(async_handler_t func) {
12331  switch (version_) {
12332  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
12333  do_async_write(v3_1_1::pingresp_message(), force_move(func));
12334  break;
12335  case protocol_version::v5:
12336  do_async_write(v5::pingresp_message(), force_move(func));
12337  break;
12338  default:
12339  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
12340  break;
12341  }
12342  }
12343 
12344  void async_send_auth(
12345  v5::auth_reason_code reason,
12346  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
12347  async_handler_t func
12348  ) {
12349  switch (version_) {
12350  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
12351  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
12352  break;
12353  case protocol_version::v5:
12354  do_async_write(v5::auth_message(reason, force_move(props)), force_move(func));
12355  break;
12356  default:
12357  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
12358  break;
12359  }
12360  }
12361 
12362  void async_send_disconnect(
12363  v5::disconnect_reason_code reason,
12364  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
12365  async_handler_t func
12366  ) {
12367  switch (version_) {
12368  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
12369  do_async_write(v3_1_1::disconnect_message(), force_move(func));
12370  break;
12371  case protocol_version::v5:
12372  do_async_write(v5::disconnect_message(reason, force_move(props)), force_move(func));
12373  break;
12374  default:
12375  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
12376  break;
12377  }
12378  }
12379 
12380  void async_send_store(std::function<void()> func) {
12381  auto g = shared_scope_guard(
12382  [func = force_move(func)] {
12383  func();
12384  }
12385  );
12386  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
12387  auto const& idx = store_.template get<tag_seq>();
12388  for (auto const& e : idx) {
12389  do_async_write(
12390  e.message(),
12391  [g]
12392  (boost::system::error_code const& /*ec*/) {
12393  }
12394  );
12395  }
12396  }
12397 
12398  // Non blocking (async) write
12399 
12400  class async_packet {
12401  public:
12402  async_packet(
12403  basic_message_variant<PacketIdBytes> mv,
12404  async_handler_t h = async_handler_t())
12405  : mv_(force_move(mv))
12406  , handler_(force_move(h)) {}
12407  basic_message_variant<PacketIdBytes> const& message() const {
12408  return mv_;
12409  }
12410  basic_message_variant<PacketIdBytes>& message() {
12411  return mv_;
12412  }
12413  async_handler_t const& handler() const { return handler_; }
12414  async_handler_t& handler() { return handler_; }
12415  private:
12416  basic_message_variant<PacketIdBytes> mv_;
12417  async_handler_t handler_;
12418  };
12419 
12420  struct write_completion_handler {
12421  write_completion_handler(
12422  std::shared_ptr<this_type> self,
12423  async_handler_t func,
12424  std::size_t num_of_messages,
12425  std::size_t expected)
12426  :self_(force_move(self)),
12427  func_(force_move(func)),
12428  num_of_messages_(num_of_messages),
12429  bytes_to_transfer_(expected)
12430  {
12431  // write_completion_handler is only constructed in one place
12432  // and a handler is provided in that location.
12433  // Since we don't check that the handler is valid before calling it
12434  // it's a bug if the handler is invalid when constructed.
12435  BOOST_ASSERT(func_);
12436  }
12437  void operator()(boost::system::error_code const& ec) const {
12438  func_(ec);
12439  for (std::size_t i = 0; i != num_of_messages_; ++i) {
12440  self_->queue_.pop_front();
12441  }
12442  if (ec || // Error is handled by async_read.
12443  !self_->connected_) {
12444  self_->connected_ = false;
12445  while (!self_->queue_.empty()) {
12446  // Handlers for outgoing packets need not be valid.
12447  if(auto&& h = self_->queue_.front().handler()) h(ec);
12448  self_->queue_.pop_front();
12449  }
12450  return;
12451  }
12452  if (!self_->queue_.empty()) {
12453  self_->do_async_write();
12454  }
12455  }
12456  void operator()(
12457  boost::system::error_code const& ec,
12458  std::size_t bytes_transferred) const {
12459  func_(ec);
12460  for (std::size_t i = 0; i != num_of_messages_; ++i) {
12461  self_->queue_.pop_front();
12462  }
12463  if (ec || // Error is handled by async_read.
12464  !self_->connected_) {
12465  self_->connected_ = false;
12466  while (!self_->queue_.empty()) {
12467  // Handlers for outgoing packets need not be valid.
12468  if(auto&& h = self_->queue_.front().handler()) h(ec);
12469  self_->queue_.pop_front();
12470  }
12471  return;
12472  }
12473  if (bytes_to_transfer_ != bytes_transferred) {
12474  self_->connected_ = false;
12475  while (!self_->queue_.empty()) {
12476  // Handlers for outgoing packets need not be valid.
12477  if(auto&& h = self_->queue_.front().handler()) h(ec);
12478  self_->queue_.pop_front();
12479  }
12480  throw write_bytes_transferred_error(bytes_to_transfer_, bytes_transferred);
12481  }
12482  if (!self_->queue_.empty()) {
12483  self_->do_async_write();
12484  }
12485  }
12486  std::shared_ptr<this_type> self_;
12487  async_handler_t func_;
12488  std::size_t num_of_messages_;
12489  std::size_t bytes_to_transfer_;
12490  };
12491 
12492  void do_async_write() {
12493  // Only attempt to send up to the user specified maximum items
12494  using difference_t = typename decltype(queue_)::difference_type;
12495  std::size_t iterator_count = (max_queue_send_count_ == 0)
12496  ? queue_.size()
12497  : std::min(max_queue_send_count_, queue_.size());
12498  auto const& start = queue_.cbegin();
12499  auto end = std::next(start, boost::numeric_cast<difference_t>(iterator_count));
12500 
12501  // And further, only up to the specified maximum bytes
12502  std::size_t total_bytes = 0;
12503  std::size_t total_const_buffer_sequence = 0;
12504  for (auto it = start; it != end; ++it) {
12505  auto const& elem = *it;
12506  auto const& mv = elem.message();
12507  std::size_t const size = MQTT_NS::size<PacketIdBytes>(mv);
12508 
12509  // If we hit the byte limit, we don't include this buffer for this send.
12510  if (max_queue_send_size_ != 0 && max_queue_send_size_ < total_bytes + size) {
12511  end = it;
12512  iterator_count = boost::numeric_cast<std::size_t>(std::distance(start, end));
12513  break;
12514  }
12515  total_bytes += size;
12516  total_const_buffer_sequence += num_of_const_buffer_sequence(mv);
12517  }
12518 
12519  std::vector<as::const_buffer> buf;
12520  std::vector<async_handler_t> handlers;
12521 
12522  buf.reserve(total_const_buffer_sequence);
12523  handlers.reserve(iterator_count);
12524 
12525  for (auto it = start; it != end; ++it) {
12526  auto const& elem = *it;
12527  auto const& mv = elem.message();
12528  auto const& cbs = const_buffer_sequence(mv);
12529  std::copy(cbs.begin(), cbs.end(), std::back_inserter(buf));
12530  handlers.emplace_back(elem.handler());
12531  }
12532 
12533  on_pre_send();
12534 
12535  socket_->async_write(
12536  force_move(buf),
12537  write_completion_handler(
12538  this->shared_from_this(),
12539  [handlers = force_move(handlers)]
12540  (boost::system::error_code const& ec) {
12541  for (auto const& h : handlers) {
12542  if (h) h(ec);
12543  }
12544  },
12545  iterator_count,
12546  total_bytes
12547  )
12548  );
12549  }
12550 
12551  void do_async_write(basic_message_variant<PacketIdBytes> mv, async_handler_t func) {
12552  // Move this job to the socket's strand so that it can be queued without mutexes.
12553  socket_->post(
12554  [this, self = this->shared_from_this(), mv = force_move(mv), func = force_move(func)]
12555  () mutable {
12556  if (!connected_) {
12557  // offline async publish is successfully finished, because there's nothing to do.
12558  if (func) func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::success));
12559  return;
12560  }
12561  queue_.emplace_back(force_move(mv), force_move(func));
12562  // Only need to start async writes if there was nothing in the queue before the above item.
12563  if (queue_.size() > 1) return;
12564  do_async_write();
12565  }
12566  );
12567  }
12568 
12569  static constexpr std::uint16_t make_uint16_t(char b1, char b2) {
12570  return
12571  static_cast<std::uint16_t>(
12572  ((static_cast<std::uint16_t>(b1) & 0xff)) << 8 |
12573  (static_cast<std::uint16_t>(b2) & 0xff)
12574  );
12575  }
12576 
12577 protected:
12578  // Ensure that only code that knows the *exact* type of an object
12579  // inheriting from this abstract base class can destruct it.
12580  // This avoids issues of the destructor not triggering destruction
12581  // of derived classes, and any member variables contained in them.
12582  // Note: Not virtual to avoid need for a vtable when possible.
12583  ~endpoint() = default;
12584 
12585 protected:
12586  bool clean_session_{false};
12587 
12588 private:
12589  optional<MQTT_NS::socket> socket_;
12590  std::atomic<bool> connected_{false};
12591  std::atomic<bool> mqtt_connected_{false};
12592 
12593  std::array<char, 10> buf_;
12594  std::uint8_t fixed_header_;
12595  std::size_t remaining_length_multiplier_;
12596  std::size_t remaining_length_;
12597  std::vector<char> payload_;
12598 
12599  Mutex store_mtx_;
12600  mi_store store_;
12601  std::set<packet_id_t> qos2_publish_handled_;
12602  std::deque<async_packet> queue_;
12603  packet_id_t packet_id_master_{0};
12604  std::set<packet_id_t> packet_id_;
12605  bool auto_pub_response_{true};
12606  bool auto_pub_response_async_{false};
12607  bool async_send_store_ { false };
12608  bool async_read_on_message_processed_ { true };
12609  bool disconnect_requested_{false};
12610  bool connect_requested_{false};
12611  std::size_t max_queue_send_count_{1};
12612  std::size_t max_queue_send_size_{0};
12613  protocol_version version_{protocol_version::undetermined};
12614  std::size_t packet_bulk_read_limit_ = 256;
12615  std::size_t props_bulk_read_limit_ = packet_bulk_read_limit_;
12616  static constexpr std::uint8_t variable_length_continue_flag = 0b10000000;
12617 };
12618 
12619 } // namespace MQTT_NS
